original: chags pa med pa'i ye shes sgo //
analyzed: chags pa med pa'i ye shes sgo //
translated: The wisdom of nonattachment is the door.

original: ji lta zhe na /
analyzed: ji lta zhe na /
translated: How so?üîΩA sutra declares:

original: mdo las snying rje chen por mngon par bsgrub pa dang / sems can gyi tshogs yongs su mi gtong bas chags pa med pa'i ye shes la mngon par phyogs pa zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas @84b gnas pas snang ba'i tshul gyis mngon sum du 'gyur ro zhes 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mdo las snying rje chen por mngon par bsgrub pa dang / sems can gyi tshogs yongs su mi gtong bas chags pa med pa'i ye shes la mngon par phyogs pa zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas @84b gnas pas snang ba'i tshul gyis mngon sum du 'gyur ro zhes 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: The wisdom of nonattachment is directly realized by the perfection of wisdom through the mode of illumination, because it is the accomplishment of great compassion and the nonabandonment of the multitude of sentient beings.

original: de la de bzhin gshegs pa yi //
analyzed: de la de bzhin gshegs pa yi //
translated: The wisdom of the tathagatas

original: ye shes chags pa med ces brjod //
analyzed: ye shes chags pa med ces brjod //
translated: is said to be nonattached.

original: shes rab grub pa med pa'i phyir //
analyzed: shes rab grub pa med pa'i phyir //
translated: Because of the nonaccomplishment of wisdom,

original: snang ba'i tshul shes yongs su bsgrags //
analyzed: snang ba'i tshul shes yongs su bsgrags //
translated: it is proclaimed as the mode of illumination.üîΩMoreover,

original: gzhan yang / 'khor ba dang ni mya ngan 'das //
analyzed: gzhan yang / 'khor ba dang ni mya ngan 'das //
translated: because samsara and nirvana

original: mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pa'i phyir //
analyzed: mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pa'i phyir //
translated: are realized as equality,

original: mi 'grogs shing ni mi gnas te //üîΩde'i tshogs ni yongs su ma rdzogs pa'i phyir /
analyzed: mi 'grogs shing ni mi gnas te // de'i tshogs ni yongs su ma rdzogs pa'i phyir /
translated: one neither associates with nor abides in samsara.üîΩBecause the accumulations are not complete,

original: tshogs yongs su ma rdzogs pa ni /
analyzed: tshogs yongs su ma rdzogs pa ni /
translated: the accumulations are not complete.

original: byang chub kyi yan lag gi tshogs yongs su ma rdzogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag gi tshogs yongs su ma rdzogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the collection of the limbs of enlightenment is not complete.

original: de ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: de ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: What is it like?

original: de ye shes de lta bu dang ldan zhing zhes bya ba nas /
analyzed: de ye shes de lta bu dang ldan zhing zhes bya ba nas /
translated: It is said, ‚ÄúEndowed with such knowledge, he does not abide in the sphere of nirvana for the sake of beings.

original: de bzhin du byang chub kyi yan lag yongs su ma rdzogs pa'i phyir de la yang mi gnas te zhes bya ba'i bar 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de bzhin du byang chub kyi yan lag yongs su ma rdzogs pa'i phyir de la yang mi gnas te zhes bya ba'i bar 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Similarly, he does not abide in nirvana because the limbs of enlightenment are not complete.‚Äù

original: bcu tshan lhag ma gsum dag gi //
analyzed: bcu tshan lhag ma gsum dag gi //
translated: The remaining three sets of tenüîΩare concentrations that can be attained,

original: ting 'dzin bsam par nus pa dag / grangs bzhin du ni shes bya ste //
analyzed: ting 'dzin bsam par nus pa dag / grangs bzhin du ni shes bya ste //
translated: in order,

original: mdor na 'di ni bsdus pa yin //
analyzed: mdor na 'di ni bsdus pa yin //
translated: in brief, this is the summary.

original: de'i 'khor ting nge 'dzin rnams dang bcas pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: de'i 'khor ting nge 'dzin rnams dang bcas pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: It is said that ‚Äútogether with its retinue, it is the concentration of emptiness of engagement.‚Äù

original: de yang rgyu bzhis zhes bya ba la sogs pa ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: de yang rgyu bzhis zhes bya ba la sogs pa ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: What is it like?

original: gang zag la bdag med pa la dmigs pa ni 'jug pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin skye bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: gang zag la bdag med pa la dmigs pa ni 'jug pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin skye bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: It is said, ‚ÄúThe concentration of emptiness of engagement arises when one focuses on the selflessness of persons.‚Äù

original: chos la bdag med pa la dmigs pa la ni ngo bo nyid ces gsungs pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: chos la bdag med pa la dmigs pa la ni ngo bo nyid ces gsungs pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: The reality of the objective selflessness of things is the emptiness of essential nature.

original: de la 'dzin pa stong pa nyid la dmigs pa ni don dam pa stong pa nyid ces gsungs pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: de la 'dzin pa stong pa nyid la dmigs pa ni don dam pa stong pa nyid ces gsungs pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: The objective emptiness of the subjective selflessness is the emptiness of the ultimate.

original: de'i gnas kun gzhi rnam par shes pa la dmigs pa ni chen po stong pa nyid ces gsungs pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: de'i gnas kun gzhi rnam par shes pa la dmigs pa ni chen po stong pa nyid ces gsungs pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: The objective emptiness of the foundation consciousness is the emptiness of the great.

original: 'jug pa'i rnam par shes pa la dmigs pa ni mtshungs par ldan pa stong pa nyid ces gsungs pa gang yin pa ste rgyu dang po'o //
analyzed: 'jug pa'i rnam par shes pa la dmigs pa ni mtshungs par ldan pa stong pa nyid ces gsungs pa gang yin pa ste rgyu dang po'o //
translated: The objective emptiness of the active consciousnesses is the emptiness of the similar.

original: bag yod pa yongs su 'dzin pas gzhi rnam par gzhag ste /
analyzed: bag yod pa yongs su 'dzin pas gzhi rnam par gzhag ste /
translated: The second cause is the establishment of the basis by the possession of heedfulness.

original: rnam pa stong pa nyid ces gsungs pa gang yin pas so //
analyzed: rnam pa stong pa nyid ces gsungs pa gang yin pas so //
translated: The objective emptiness of the objective realm is the emptiness of aspects.

original: ji lta zhe na /
analyzed: ji lta zhe na /
translated: How is that?

original: shin tu bsgoms pa'i phyir bsgom pa chog mi shes pas na bag med par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir te rgyu gnyis pa yin no //
analyzed: shin tu bsgoms pa'i phyir bsgom pa chog mi shes pas na bag med par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir te rgyu gnyis pa yin no //
translated: Because of the non-occurrence of heedlessness due to the insatiable cultivation of meditation, because of the extreme cultivation of meditation.

original: khyad zhugs pa thob pas ni bdun pa rnam par gzhag ste mngon par sgrub pa stong pa nyid ces gsungs pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: khyad zhugs pa thob pas ni bdun pa rnam par gzhag ste mngon par sgrub pa stong pa nyid ces gsungs pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: The seventh is established by the attainment of a special quality, which is called the emptiness of accomplishment.

original: ji lta zhe na /
analyzed: ji lta zhe na /
translated: How is that?

original: yon tan rnams khyad zhugs pa thob par sgrub pas so //
analyzed: yon tan rnams khyad zhugs pa thob par sgrub pas so //
translated: It is accomplished by the attainment of a special quality.

original: rgyu nyid kyis ni lhag ma rnams te ji lta zhe na /üîΩshes bya'i sgrib pa rnam par dag pa'i rgyur @85a * //
analyzed: rgyu nyid kyis ni lhag ma rnams te ji lta zhe na / shes bya'i sgrib pa rnam par dag pa'i rgyur @85a * //
translated: The remaining ones are by reason of cause. How is that?

original: gyur pas ni ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par mi rtog pa stong pa nyid ces gsungs pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: gyur pas ni ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par mi rtog pa stong pa nyid ces gsungs pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: The emptiness of non-apprehension is said to be the cause of the purification of the obscurations of the knowable.

original: ji lta zhe na /
analyzed: ji lta zhe na /
translated: How is that?

original: rnam par rtog pa ni sgrib pa yin pas rnam par mi rtog pa'i sgo nas kun brtags pa'i chos kyi stong pa nyid rtogs pa'i phyir sgrib pa dang bral bar 'gyur bas so //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa ni sgrib pa yin pas rnam par mi rtog pa'i sgo nas kun brtags pa'i chos kyi stong pa nyid rtogs pa'i phyir sgrib pa dang bral bar 'gyur bas so //
translated: Since conceptualization is an obscuration, by way of non-conceptualization, the emptiness of the imagined nature is realized, and thus one becomes free from obscurations.

original: sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'i rgyur gyur pas ni lta ba dang bcas pa stong pa nyid ces gsungs pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'i rgyur gyur pas ni lta ba dang bcas pa stong pa nyid ces gsungs pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: The emptiness of essential nature is said to be the cause of the purification of the obscurations of the afflictions.

original: ji lta zhe na /
analyzed: ji lta zhe na /
translated: How is that?

original: stong pa nyid bsgoms pa na snying rje dang bral ba'i phyir nyan thos bzhin du sems can la mi lta bar bsgom pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: stong pa nyid bsgoms pa na snying rje dang bral ba'i phyir nyan thos bzhin du sems can la mi lta bar bsgom pa ma yin gyi /
translated: When one cultivates emptiness, one does not cultivate it without regard for sentient beings, as do the ≈õrƒÅvakas, because one is devoid of compassion.

original: 'o na ci zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ci zhe na /
translated: What then?

original: sems can gyi don gyi bsam pa kho nas bsgom mo //
analyzed: sems can gyi don gyi bsam pa kho nas bsgom mo //
translated: One cultivates it with the intention of benefiting sentient beings.

original: bsams bzhin du srid pa yongs su 'dzin pa'i rgyur gyur pas ni bral ba dang ma bral ba stong pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin skye bar 'gyur te zhes gsungs pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: bsams bzhin du srid pa yongs su 'dzin pa'i rgyur gyur pas ni bral ba dang ma bral ba stong pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin skye bar 'gyur te zhes gsungs pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: The cause for taking up existence as one wishes is the arising of the meditative stabilization called ‚Äúempty of separation and non-separation.‚Äù

original: ji lta zhe na /
analyzed: ji lta zhe na /
translated: What is it?

original: nyon mongs pa rnams dang bral ba ni bral ba ste /
analyzed: nyon mongs pa rnams dang bral ba ni bral ba ste /
translated: ‚ÄúSeparation‚Äù is being devoid of afflictions.

original: slob dpon gyis kun nas nyon mongs pa dang mi ldan pa zhes smras pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: slob dpon gyis kun nas nyon mongs pa dang mi ldan pa zhes smras pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: This is what the master said about ‚Äúnot possessing the afflictions.‚Äù

original: srid pa dang ma bral ba ni ma bral ba ste /
analyzed: srid pa dang ma bral ba ni ma bral ba ste /
translated: ‚ÄúNon-separation‚Äù is not being devoid of existence.

original: srid pa'i mtshan nyid dang mi ldan pa ma yin pa zhes smras pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: srid pa'i mtshan nyid dang mi ldan pa ma yin pa zhes smras pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: This is what the master said about ‚Äúnot being devoid of the characteristics of existence.‚Äù

original: 'di ni rgyu bzhi pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di ni rgyu bzhi pa yin te /
translated: This is the fourth cause.

original: 'di dag gis ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par rnam par gzhag par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: 'di dag gis ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par rnam par gzhag par shes par bya'o //
translated: One should understand that these are the distinctions of meditative concentration.

original: de la mi phyed pa'i bsam pa nyid ji lta zhe na /
analyzed: de la mi phyed pa'i bsam pa nyid ji lta zhe na /
translated: How is it that the thought is unshakable?

original: brtan pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: brtan pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because it is firm.

original: brtan pa nyid ni 'jigs pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: brtan pa nyid ni 'jigs pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Firmness is because there is no fear.

original: de yang don dgur rig par bya ste /
analyzed: de yang don dgur rig par bya ste /
translated: That is known to have nine meanings.

original: ji lta zhe na /
analyzed: ji lta zhe na /
translated: How is that?

original: dmigs pa la mos pas nges pa'i bsam pa nyid ces gsungs pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: dmigs pa la mos pas nges pa'i bsam pa nyid ces gsungs pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: It is the unshakable thought that is taught as the thought of conviction about the object.

original: ji lta zhe na /
analyzed: ji lta zhe na /
translated: How is that?

original: dmigs pa ni de bzhin nyid kho na yin gyi gzhan ni ma yin no zhes /
analyzed: dmigs pa ni de bzhin nyid kho na yin gyi gzhan ni ma yin no zhes /
translated: The object is just thusness, not otherwise.

original: de ltar lhag par mos pas nges pa'i phyir nges pa'i bsam pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: de ltar lhag par mos pas nges pa'i phyir nges pa'i bsam pa nyid yin no //
translated: Because of conviction in that way, it is the unshakable thought.

original: 'khrul pa la mi mjed pa ni /
analyzed: 'khrul pa la mi mjed pa ni /
translated: Not being disturbed by error

original: dge ba'i bsam pa nyid ces gsungs pa gang yin pa ste /
analyzed: dge ba'i bsam pa nyid ces gsungs pa gang yin pa ste /
translated: is taught as the virtuous thought.

original: gser bzang po bzhin te /
analyzed: gser bzang po bzhin te /
translated: It is like good gold.

original: don zab cing rgya che ba la nges pa dag dang / sems can log par sgrub pa dag gis 'gyur ba med do //
analyzed: don zab cing rgya che ba la nges pa dag dang / sems can log par sgrub pa dag gis 'gyur ba med do //
translated: It is not changed by certainty about the profound and vast meaning or by beings who practice wrongly.

original: gsang ba'i gnas la mi skrag pa zab pa'i bsam pa nyid ces bya ba ste /
analyzed: gsang ba'i gnas la mi skrag pa zab pa'i bsam pa nyid ces bya ba ste /
translated: The intention of non-fear in regard to the secret is the very profound intention.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba la sogs pa zab mo dag mthong na skrag par mi 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba la sogs pa zab mo dag mthong na skrag par mi 'gyur ba'o //
translated: When one sees the profound secret of the Tathagata, etc. , one does not fear it.

original: theg pa las mi g-yo ba ni phyir mi ldog pa'i bsam pa nyid ces bya ba ste /
analyzed: theg pa las mi g-yo ba ni phyir mi ldog pa'i bsam pa nyid ces bya ba ste /
translated: The intention of non-wavering from the vehicle is the very irreversible intention.

original: de byang chub @85b chen po la sems pas mi dge ba'i grogs po dag gis mi bzlogs pas na theg pa las mi g-yo ba yin no //
analyzed: de byang chub @85b chen po la sems pas mi dge ba'i grogs po dag gis mi bzlogs pas na theg pa las mi g-yo ba yin no //
translated: Since one is intent on the great enlightenment, one is not turned back by unfavorable conditions, and so one does not waver from the vehicle.

original: brtson 'grus rtsom pa ni rgyun mi gcod pa'i bsam pa nyid cas bya ba ste /
analyzed: brtson 'grus rtsom pa ni rgyun mi gcod pa'i bsam pa nyid cas bya ba ste /
translated: The intention of the performance of effort is the very uninterrupted intention.

original: sems can yongs su smin par bya ba la 'jug cing sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yang dag par sgrub pa ni bar skabs su brtson 'grus lhod pa dang 'dor bar mi 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: sems can yongs su smin par bya ba la 'jug cing sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yang dag par sgrub pa ni bar skabs su brtson 'grus lhod pa dang 'dor bar mi 'gyur ba'o //
translated: One engages in the evolutionary development of living beings and the realization of the qualities of the Buddha, and one does not relax or abandon effort in the meantime.

original: ser sna dang 'chal ba'i tshul khrims kyi dri ma dang bral ba ni dri ma med pa'i bsam pa nyid ces bya ba ste /
analyzed: ser sna dang 'chal ba'i tshul khrims kyi dri ma dang bral ba ni dri ma med pa'i bsam pa nyid ces bya ba ste /
translated: The intention of freedom from the stains of greed and immorality is the very stainless intention.

original: dri ma gnyis dang bral bas bsam pa dri ma med pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: dri ma gnyis dang bral bas bsam pa dri ma med pa nyid yin no //
translated: The intention is pure because it is free from the two defilements.

original: sems can gyi don byed pa ni mtha' yas pa'i bsam pa zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: sems can gyi don byed pa ni mtha' yas pa'i bsam pa zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The intention is infinite because it is applied to the benefit of infinite sentient beings.

original: bsam pa mtha' yas pa nyid ni sems can gyi khams sgong dang mngal nas skye ba la sogs pa'i bye brag gis tha dad pa ji snyed pa thams cad theg pa gsum la dgod par bya'o snyam pa'o //
analyzed: bsam pa mtha' yas pa nyid ni sems can gyi khams sgong dang mngal nas skye ba la sogs pa'i bye brag gis tha dad pa ji snyed pa thams cad theg pa gsum la dgod par bya'o snyam pa'o //
translated: The intention is infinite because it is applied to the establishment in the three vehicles of all sentient beings, as many as they are, differentiated by the various species of womb birth, egg birth, etc.

original: rnam par thar pa mchog 'dod pa ni ye shes la mngon par 'dod pa'i bsam pa nyid ces bya ba ste /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa mchog 'dod pa ni ye shes la mngon par 'dod pa'i bsam pa nyid ces bya ba ste /
translated: The intention is directed to direct intuition because it desires the highest liberation.

original: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mngon par 'dod na thar pa mchog don du gnyer ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mngon par 'dod na thar pa mchog don du gnyer ba'i phyir ro //
translated: If one desires the direct intuition of an Omniscient One, one strives for the highest liberation.

original: sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'i sbyor ba ni thabs dang shes rab dang ldan pa'i bsam pa nyid ces bya'o //
analyzed: sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'i sbyor ba ni thabs dang shes rab dang ldan pa'i bsam pa nyid ces bya'o //
translated: The application to the evolutionary development of sentient beings is the intention endowed with means and intuition.

original: rgyu gnyis kyis na sems can rnams yongs su smin par bya bar brtson par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: rgyu gnyis kyis na sems can rnams yongs su smin par bya bar brtson par mi 'gyur te /
translated: For two reasons one does not strive to evolve sentient beings:

original: snying rje ni sems can gyi don bya ba'i thabs yin na snying rje chen po dang bral ba dang / shes rab kyi khams dang dbang po dang / bag la nyal ba la sogs pa ji lta ba bzhin yongs su shes nas sems can gyi don la rab tu brtson pa yin na /
analyzed: snying rje ni sems can gyi don bya ba'i thabs yin na snying rje chen po dang bral ba dang / shes rab kyi khams dang dbang po dang / bag la nyal ba la sogs pa ji lta ba bzhin yongs su shes nas sems can gyi don la rab tu brtson pa yin na /
translated: And it is the thorough knowledge of the elements, faculties, and latent propensities of wisdom, etc., and the striving for the welfare of sentient beings.

original: shes rab dang bral ba'o //
analyzed: shes rab dang bral ba'o //
translated: So it is the absence of wisdom.

original: de gnyis dang mtshungs par ldan pa ni rgyun mi 'chad par sems can yongs su smin par byed do //
analyzed: de gnyis dang mtshungs par ldan pa ni rgyun mi 'chad par sems can yongs su smin par byed do //
translated: Endowed with those two, one brings sentient beings to full maturity without interruption.üîΩAnd those thoughts of the bodhisattva are fully directed toward the enlightenment of the tathƒÅgatas.

original: de'i byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub la shin tu song ba yin no zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sa 'di la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa phul du phyin pa thob pas gnas pa ni
analyzed: de'i byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub la shin tu song ba yin no zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sa 'di la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa phul du phyin pa thob pas gnas pa ni
translated: The bodhisattva who is established in this stage, by attaining the perfection of the perfection of wisdom,

original: sangs rgyas kyi byang chub la ring du zhugs pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi byang chub la ring du zhugs pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: is far advanced toward the enlightenment of the buddhas.

original: phas kyi rgol ba tshar bcod pa'i nus pa ni phas kyi rgol ba mu stegs can thams cad kyi brtson 'grus phyir mi ldog pa ste /
analyzed: phas kyi rgol ba tshar bcod pa'i nus pa ni phas kyi rgol ba mu stegs can thams cad kyi brtson 'grus phyir mi ldog pa ste /
translated: The power to crush opponents is the irreversible striving of all tirthika opponents.

original: 'di ltar byang chub sems dpas de dag nyid tshar gcod nus pa'i phyir ro //üîΩthe tshom gcod @86a * //
analyzed: 'di ltar byang chub sems dpas de dag nyid tshar gcod nus pa'i phyir ro // the tshom gcod @86a * //
translated: Thus, the bodhisattva is able to crush them.

original: pa'i nus pa'i ye shes kyi /
analyzed: pa'i nus pa'i ye shes kyi /
translated: The power of the knowledge to cut off doubts isüîΩthe power of the knowledge to cut off doubts.

original: sa yul gang yang rung ba de la yang dag par zhugs pa ni the tshom thams cad gcod pas so //
analyzed: sa yul gang yang rung ba de la yang dag par zhugs pa ni the tshom thams cad gcod pas so //
translated: The power to enter any place is the power to enter any place.

original: theg pa las mi g-yo ba'i nus pa ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: theg pa las mi g-yo ba'i nus pa ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: What is the power of not moving from the vehicle?

original: skyon du mthong bas nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dag las log pa'i phyir theg pa chen po las mi g-yo ba ste /
analyzed: skyon du mthong bas nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dag las log pa'i phyir theg pa chen po las mi g-yo ba ste /
translated: It is not moving from the Great Vehicle, because one turns away from the Disciple and Solitary Buddha Vehicles, seeing them as faults.

original: theg pa chen po ni yon tan thams cad kyi gzhi yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: theg pa chen po ni yon tan thams cad kyi gzhi yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The Great Vehicle is the basis of all virtues.

original: gsang ba'i gnas la mos pa'i nus pa ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la sogs pa gsang ba'i bye brag gis shes par bya bar mngon du phyogs pa na gcig tu nges pa yin te /
analyzed: gsang ba'i gnas la mos pa'i nus pa ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la sogs pa gsang ba'i bye brag gis shes par bya bar mngon du phyogs pa na gcig tu nges pa yin te /
translated: The power of interest in the secret is certain with regard to the body of the Buddha Bhagavat, etc., because it is directed toward understanding the secrets.

original: gsang ba'i gnas dag yin no zhes mos pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gsang ba'i gnas dag yin no zhes mos pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is the secret, because it is the object of interest.

original: rnam par mi 'thor ba'i nus pa ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: rnam par mi 'thor ba'i nus pa ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is the power of non-loss?

original: bdud phyir rgol ba thams cad dang / nyon mongs pa kun du 'byung ba rnams kyis dbrog par mi nus pas na de dag gis rnam par mi 'thor ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bdud phyir rgol ba thams cad dang / nyon mongs pa kun du 'byung ba rnams kyis dbrog par mi nus pas na de dag gis rnam par mi 'thor ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is not lost through all the attacks of Mara and the arising of the defilements.

original: nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa rnam par dag pa'i dbang du byas nas gnyen po brtan pa'i nus pa ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa rnam par dag pa'i dbang du byas nas gnyen po brtan pa'i nus pa ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: What is the power of the firm antidote, from the point of view of the purification of the obstacle of the defilements?

original: byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi snang ba'i de bzhin nyid la shin tu rnam par gnas pa na kun brtags pa'i chos la mngon par zhen pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams kyis gnod par mi 'gyur ba gnyen po brtan pa yin no //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi snang ba'i de bzhin nyid la shin tu rnam par gnas pa na kun brtags pa'i chos la mngon par zhen pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams kyis gnod par mi 'gyur ba gnyen po brtan pa yin no //
translated: When the bodhisattva is well-established in the suchness of the illumination of the bodhisattva‚Äôs intuition, he is not harmed by the addictions which are the adherence to the imagined reality of things. This is the firmness of the antidote.

original: gnyen po shin tu rgyas pa'i nus pa ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: gnyen po shin tu rgyas pa'i nus pa ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: What is the capacity for the vastness of the antidote?

original: stong pa nyid la sogs pa'i chos rnams mngon du byed pa na de dag yongs su bsgom pa'i phyir gnyen po shin tu rgyas shing chen po nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: stong pa nyid la sogs pa'i chos rnams mngon du byed pa na de dag yongs su bsgom pa'i phyir gnyen po shin tu rgyas shing chen po nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: When he realizes the emptiness, etc., dharmas, he cultivates them thoroughly, so that the antidote becomes vast and great.

original: sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'i nus pa ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'i nus pa ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: What is the capacity for the maturation of beings?

original: sems can gyi don thabs snying rje chen po dang shes rab kyis rnam par dpyad pa rnam par brtags pa dag dang mtshungs par ldan pa ni sems can yongs su smin par byed nus pa yin no //
analyzed: sems can gyi don thabs snying rje chen po dang shes rab kyis rnam par dpyad pa rnam par brtags pa dag dang mtshungs par ldan pa ni sems can yongs su smin par byed nus pa yin no //
translated: When he is endowed with the investigation of great compassion and wisdom, which are the means for the benefit of beings, he has the capacity for the maturation of beings.

original: shes bya'i sgrib pa rnam par dag pa'i nus pa ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: shes bya'i sgrib pa rnam par dag pa'i nus pa ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: What is the power of the purification of the obscurations to knowledge?

original: byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa'i chos stobs dang mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa gang dag yin pa de dag mngon par sgrub cing de dag dang 'brel ba na sems can yongs su smin par bya bar nus pa yin no //
analyzed: byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa'i chos stobs dang mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa gang dag yin pa de dag mngon par sgrub cing de dag dang 'brel ba na sems can yongs su smin par bya bar nus pa yin no //
translated: When one accomplishes the factors of enlightenment, the powers, the fearlessnesses, etc., and is connected with them, one has the power to ripen beings.

original: nus pa'i khyad par gyis yongs su bsdus pa'i chos de dag la mthun pa ni de dag dang mthun par gnas pa'o //
analyzed: nus pa'i khyad par gyis yongs su bsdus pa'i chos de dag la mthun pa ni de dag dang mthun par gnas pa'o //
translated: The Dharma that is included in the special power is concordant with them, and one abides in concordance with them.

original: don gyi gzungs thob par yongs su ston to zhes bya ba @86b ni yi ge'i gzungs ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: don gyi gzungs thob par yongs su ston to zhes bya ba @86b ni yi ge'i gzungs ma yin pa'o //
translated: It is shown that one obtains the meaning-dhƒÅra·πáƒ´, not the letter-dhƒÅra·πáƒ´.

original: ltag mthong dang zhi gnas kyi snang ba ni rgyu mtshan yin te /
analyzed: ltag mthong dang zhi gnas kyi snang ba ni rgyu mtshan yin te /
translated: The light of insight and calm abiding is the sign.

original: de la rab tu brtson pa des 'thob bo //
analyzed: de la rab tu brtson pa des 'thob bo //
translated: One obtains it through striving in that.

original: de'i sgrib pa las rnam par grol nas zhes bya ba ni sgrub pa'i sgrib pa las rnam par grol nas te /
analyzed: de'i sgrib pa las rnam par grol nas zhes bya ba ni sgrub pa'i sgrib pa las rnam par grol nas te /
translated: Having been liberated from the obscurations to that, means having been liberated from the obscurations to accomplishment.

original: sgrub pa'i don la rig pa'i phyir /
analyzed: sgrub pa'i don la rig pa'i phyir /
translated: Because one knows the meaning of accomplishment,

original: zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: This is the meaning.

original: chos kyi mdzod thob pa yin no zhes bya ba ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la rnam pa bcur so sor rtog pa la sogs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: chos kyi mdzod thob pa yin no zhes bya ba ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la rnam pa bcur so sor rtog pa la sogs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: He has attained the treasury of the Dharma, because he possesses the qualities of discernment of dependent origination in ten aspects, and so on. This is the meaning.

original: thabs dang shes rab dag nyid mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa yin pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: thabs dang shes rab dag nyid mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa yin pa'i phyir te /
translated: It is non-abiding nirvana, because it is both method and wisdom.

original: thabs snying rjes ni mya ngan las 'das pa la mi gnas pa shes rab kyis ni 'khor ba la mi gnas pas so //
analyzed: thabs snying rjes ni mya ngan las 'das pa la mi gnas pa shes rab kyis ni 'khor ba la mi gnas pas so //
translated: It is non-abiding in nirvana because of method, and non-abiding in samsara because of wisdom.

original: yul gyi cha dpag tu yod pa ni 'od kyi dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: yul gyi cha dpag tu yod pa ni 'od kyi dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: The part of the object that is measurable is the ma·πá·∏çala of light.

original: yul gyi cha dpag tu med pa'i 'od yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yul gyi cha dpag tu med pa'i 'od yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is the light of the immeasurable part of the object.

original: kun du 'dzin pa dang / yongs su skems pa dang / yongs su 'jog pa dang / g-yo bar byed pa dag gis zhes bya ba'i tha tshig ste /
analyzed: kun du 'dzin pa dang / yongs su skems pa dang / yongs su 'jog pa dang / g-yo bar byed pa dag gis zhes bya ba'i tha tshig ste /
translated: It is the meaning of ‚Äúgrasping, drying up, placing, and moving.

original: rlung gi dkyil 'khor bzhis zhes gsungs pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: rlung gi dkyil 'khor bzhis zhes gsungs pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: ‚Äù It is what is referred to as ‚Äúthe four ma·πá·∏çalas of wind.‚Äù

original: bdud kyi lam rnams kyi spyod pa ni 'jug pa dag ste /
analyzed: bdud kyi lam rnams kyi spyod pa ni 'jug pa dag ste /
translated: The practices of the paths of the demons are the entrances.

original: bshad pa la /
analyzed: bshad pa la /
translated: The explanation:

original: bdud bzhi'i lam gyi spyod pa ngan pa dag gis zhes bya ba ni zhes bshad pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: bdud bzhi'i lam gyi spyod pa ngan pa dag gis zhes bya ba ni zhes bshad pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: The bad practices of the paths of the four demons are what is called ‚Äúthe bad practices of the paths of the demons.‚Äù

original: snga ma'i tshul gyis zhes bya ba ni sa dang por bstan pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: snga ma'i tshul gyis zhes bya ba ni sa dang por bstan pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: ‚ÄúIn the former way‚Äù means ‚Äúin the way taught in the first stage.‚Äù

original: sa bdun pa yi 'brel ba ni //üîΩsa bdun pa ni rgyu lnga yis //
analyzed: sa bdun pa yi 'brel ba ni // sa bdun pa ni rgyu lnga yis //
translated: The connection with the seventh stageüîΩThe seventh stage is considered

original: rnam par gzhag par 'dod pa ste //üîΩ'du mi byed la dga' ba yi //
analyzed: rnam par gzhag par 'dod pa ste // 'du mi byed la dga' ba yi //
translated: to be established by five causes.üîΩThe first establishment is

original: gnyen po rnam gzhag dang po yin //üîΩde yi rnam g-yeng spong ba yis //
analyzed: gnyen po rnam gzhag dang po yin // de yi rnam g-yeng spong ba yis //
translated: the antidote to the delight in non-performance.üîΩThe second establishment is considered

original: gzhag pa gnyis par 'dod pa yin //üîΩzung du 'brel ba'i lam thob nas //
analyzed: gzhag pa gnyis par 'dod pa yin // zung du 'brel ba'i lam thob nas //
translated: to be the abandonment of the distraction of that.

original: gsum pa mngon par brjod pa yin //üîΩsnga phyi yi ni khyad par gyis //
analyzed: gsum pa mngon par brjod pa yin // snga phyi yi ni khyad par gyis //
translated: The third is the expression of the attainmentüîΩof the path of union.üîΩThe fourth establishment is considered

original: gzhag pa bzhi par 'dod pa yin //üîΩde yi 'bras bu rnam gzhag pas //
analyzed: gzhag pa bzhi par 'dod pa yin // de yi 'bras bu rnam gzhag pas //
translated: to be the difference between the former and the latter.üîΩThe fifth establishment is declared

original: gzhag pa lnga par brjod pa yin //
analyzed: gzhag pa lnga par brjod pa yin //
translated: to be the establishment of its result.

original: dang po 'du byed med dga' ba'i //
analyzed: dang po 'du byed med dga' ba'i //
translated: The first is the delight in non-performance.

original: gnyen po thabs dang shes pa las //
analyzed: gnyen po thabs dang shes pa las //
translated: The antidotes are the method and wisdom.üîΩ

original: yang dag 'byung ba'i lam gzhan rtsom //
analyzed: yang dag 'byung ba'i lam gzhan rtsom //
translated: The path of correct origination is created from the antidotes of method and wisdom.

original: khyad par ldan pa bcu po yin //
analyzed: khyad par ldan pa bcu po yin //
translated: It is the tenth stage, which has special qualities.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: gang phyir byang chub sems dpa' 'di //üîΩmtshan med pa yi yul can gyi //
analyzed: gang phyir byang chub sems dpa' 'di // mtshan med pa yi yul can gyi //
translated: Because these bodhisattvasüîΩare engaged in the wisdom

original: shes rab phal cher mngon byed pas //
analyzed: shes rab phal cher mngon byed pas //
translated: that is the object of signlessness.üîΩThey do not actualize it

original: 'jug phyir mngon du mi byed la //
analyzed: 'jug phyir mngon du mi byed la //
translated: because they are engaged in it.

original: phyir zhing blo dga' 'jug pa la //
analyzed: phyir zhing blo dga' 'jug pa la //
translated: Their minds are engaged in it

original: ji ltar yang ni ma yin pa //üîΩde'i phyir de yi gnyen @87a * //
analyzed: ji ltar yang ni ma yin pa // de'i phyir de yi gnyen @87a * //
translated: and not in anything else.üîΩTherefore, the path of meditation

original: por ni // lam sgom rnam pa bcu yin no //
analyzed: por ni // lam sgom rnam pa bcu yin no //
translated: is the tenfold antidote to that.

original: ji lta zhe na /
analyzed: ji lta zhe na /
translated: How is that?

original: chags pa med pa'i ye shes la mngon par phyogs pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa gang yin pa de mngon du gyur pas mngon par 'du byed pa med pa nyid la rtsom pa med pa nyid la sems dga' ba yin gyi mngon
analyzed: chags pa med pa'i ye shes la mngon par phyogs pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa gang yin pa de mngon du gyur pas mngon par 'du byed pa med pa nyid la rtsom pa med pa nyid la sems dga' ba yin gyi mngon
translated: The bodhisattvas who abide in the perfection of wisdom that is directed toward nonconceptual wisdom do not actualize the nonconceptual state.

original: par mtho ba'i lam mngon par 'du byed pa la ni ma yin te /
analyzed: par mtho ba'i lam mngon par 'du byed pa la ni ma yin te /
translated: They do not actualize the path of higher rebirth.

original: de'i phyir mngon par 'du byed pa med pa la mngon par dga' ba'i gnyen po zhes bya bar rnam par gnas so //
analyzed: de'i phyir mngon par 'du byed pa med pa la mngon par dga' ba'i gnyen po zhes bya bar rnam par gnas so //
translated: Therefore, it is called the antidote to delight in non-performance.

original: de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' la mngon par 'du mi byed pa las bslang ste //
analyzed: de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' la mngon par 'du mi byed pa las bslang ste //
translated: Thus, the bodhisattva is roused from non-performance,

original: mngon par 'du byed cing 'byung ba'i lam mngon par mtho ba zhes bya ba la 'jug par ston pa yin no //
analyzed: mngon par 'du byed cing 'byung ba'i lam mngon par mtho ba zhes bya ba la 'jug par ston pa yin no //
translated: and is shown to enter the path of arising through performance, called the path of high rebirth.

original: thabs ni snying rje ste /
analyzed: thabs ni snying rje ste /
translated: The means is compassion,

original: des sems can rnams la lta'o //
analyzed: des sems can rnams la lta'o //
translated: by which one looks at sentient beings.

original: de'i phyir chos la bdag med pa'i ye shes sems can la lta ba dang bcas pa'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir chos la bdag med pa'i ye shes sems can la lta ba dang bcas pa'o //
translated: Therefore, the knowledge of the selflessness of dharmas is accompanied by the view of sentient beings.

original: thabs dang shes rab kyis yongs su zin pa'i phyir mngon par mtho ba'i lam gnyen pos yongs su zin pa ste /
analyzed: thabs dang shes rab kyis yongs su zin pa'i phyir mngon par mtho ba'i lam gnyen pos yongs su zin pa ste /
translated: Because it is fully grasped by means and wisdom, the path of high rebirth is fully grasped by the antidote.

original: de nyid lam gzhan yin no //
analyzed: de nyid lam gzhan yin no //
translated: That itself is another path.

original: de 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa gzhan las khyad par du 'phags zhes bya ba ni dang po ni gnyen po med pa'i phyir la /
analyzed: de 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa gzhan las khyad par du 'phags zhes bya ba ni dang po ni gnyen po med pa'i phyir la /
translated: It is superior to other mundane and supramundane paths.

original: cig shos ni srid pa la gcig tu rgyab kyis phyogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: cig shos ni srid pa la gcig tu rgyab kyis phyogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The other is completely averse to existence.

original: 'di ni yon tan rnam pa bzhis khyad par du 'phags pa ste /
analyzed: 'di ni yon tan rnam pa bzhis khyad par du 'phags pa ste /
translated: It is superior by way of four qualities:

original: longs spyod dang lus kyi khyad par gyi rgyu nyid la ji ltar 'dod pa zhes bya ba ni bsam pa'i dbang gis so //
analyzed: longs spyod dang lus kyi khyad par gyi rgyu nyid la ji ltar 'dod pa zhes bya ba ni bsam pa'i dbang gis so //
translated: The cause of the excellence of enjoyment and body is just as one wishes, that is, by the power of intention.

original: ji srid 'dod pa zhes bya ba ni dus la ltos pa ste /
analyzed: ji srid 'dod pa zhes bya ba ni dus la ltos pa ste /
translated: As long as one wishes is in relation to time.

original: 'khor ba ji srid kyi bar du gnas par lus dang longs spyod kyi khyad par ngo bo sna tshogs thob pa'i rgyu yang dag par sgrub pa'i phyir rgyu dang po yin te /
analyzed: 'khor ba ji srid kyi bar du gnas par lus dang longs spyod kyi khyad par ngo bo sna tshogs thob pa'i rgyu yang dag par sgrub pa'i phyir rgyu dang po yin te /
translated: It is the first cause because it is the cause for attaining the excellence of body and enjoyment in various forms for as long as cyclic existence endures, by correctly accomplishing the great accumulation of merit.

original: bsod nams kyi tshogs chen po stsogs pa yang stsogs pa yin zhes gang gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: bsod nams kyi tshogs chen po stsogs pa yang stsogs pa yin zhes gang gsungs pa'o //
translated: It is the cause for the accumulation of the great accumulation of merit.

original: bdag la sogs pa la mngon par zhen nas tshad med pa sgom pa ni nyes par spyod pa'o //
analyzed: bdag la sogs pa la mngon par zhen nas tshad med pa sgom pa ni nyes par spyod pa'o //
translated: The meditation on the immeasurables while clinging to self and so on is faulty conduct.

original: de las kun du bsrung ba'i rgyu ni chos bdag med pa la 'jug pa rtogs pa'o //
analyzed: de las kun du bsrung ba'i rgyu ni chos bdag med pa la 'jug pa rtogs pa'o //
translated: The cause for guarding against that is the realization of the entry to the objective selflessness of dharmas.

original: des na de ltar khyad par thob pa tshad med pa bsgoms pas sems can rnams la log pa mi sgrub ste /
analyzed: des na de ltar khyad par thob pa tshad med pa bsgoms pas sems can rnams la log pa mi sgrub ste /
translated: Thus, by cultivating immeasurable special qualities, one does not practice wrongly with regard to sentient beings.

original: tshad med pa bzhi mngon par sgrub pa yang mi gtong ba yin zhes gsungs pa gang yin pa ste rgyu gnyis pa'o //
analyzed: tshad med pa bzhi mngon par sgrub pa yang mi gtong ba yin zhes gsungs pa gang yin pa ste rgyu gnyis pa'o //
translated: And one does not abandon the practice of the four immeasurables. This is the second cause.

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kun du bsrung ba'i rgyu ni chos rnams la mngon par zhen pa med pa yin @87b te ;
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kun du bsrung ba'i rgyu ni chos rnams la mngon par zhen pa med pa yin @87b te ;
translated: The cause of protecting the roots of virtue is non-attachment to phenomena.

original: des na dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams khyad par du 'gyur ba'i rgyu gang dag yin pa de dag legs par 'phel bar byed do //
analyzed: des na dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams khyad par du 'gyur ba'i rgyu gang dag yin pa de dag legs par 'phel bar byed do //
translated: Thus, one causes the roots of virtue to increase, which are the causes of special qualities.

original: ji lta zhe na /
analyzed: ji lta zhe na /
translated: How is that?

original: bsod nams kyi ngo bo nyid kyi chos kyi tshogs gang dag yin pa de dag mngon par 'du byed pa ni gang dag gis de dag mngon par 'du byed pa'o //
analyzed: bsod nams kyi ngo bo nyid kyi chos kyi tshogs gang dag yin pa de dag mngon par 'du byed pa ni gang dag gis de dag mngon par 'du byed pa'o //
translated: The accumulation of meritorious dharmas is the accumulation of those.

original: de dag kyang pha rol tu phyin pa rnams te /
analyzed: de dag kyang pha rol tu phyin pa rnams te /
translated: And those are the perfections.

original: de dag legs par byed pas yongs su rdzogs par byed pas so //
analyzed: de dag legs par byed pas yongs su rdzogs par byed pas so //
translated: By practicing them well, one perfects them.

original: de'i khyad par 'thob pa'i rgyu 'phel ba'i phyir zhes bya ba la de'i zhes bya ba'i sgra ni 'dir longs spyod dang lus kyi khyad par dang sbyar te /
analyzed: de'i khyad par 'thob pa'i rgyu 'phel ba'i phyir zhes bya ba la de'i zhes bya ba'i sgra ni 'dir longs spyod dang lus kyi khyad par dang sbyar te /
translated: The word that refers to the special enjoyments and bodies.

original: de thob par bya ba'i rgyu'o //
analyzed: de thob par bya ba'i rgyu'o //
translated: That is the cause of obtaining them.

original: de 'phel ba'i phyir te chos gang la yang mngon par zhen pa med pa yin zhes gang gsungs pa ste gsum pa'o //
analyzed: de 'phel ba'i phyir te chos gang la yang mngon par zhen pa med pa yin zhes gang gsungs pa ste gsum pa'o //
translated: Because that is increased, one is not attached to any dharma.

original: rgyu rnam bdun po gang yin pa //
analyzed: rgyu rnam bdun po gang yin pa //
translated: The seven causes are

original: rgyu bzhi par ni 'dod pa yin //
analyzed: rgyu bzhi par ni 'dod pa yin //
translated: considered to be four causes.

original: sems can rnams la phan 'dogs rgyu //
analyzed: sems can rnams la phan 'dogs rgyu //
translated: The cause of benefiting sentient beings

original: sgo bdun dag nas brjod pa yin //
analyzed: sgo bdun dag nas brjod pa yin //
translated: is stated from seven doors.

original: ji lta zhe na /
analyzed: ji lta zhe na /
translated: How is that?

original: gco dang rjes mthun byed pa yis //
analyzed: gco dang rjes mthun byed pa yis //
translated: By acting in accordance with the chief,

original: bsam bzhin srid pa 'dzin pa yin //
analyzed: bsam bzhin srid pa 'dzin pa yin //
translated: intentionally taking existence,

original: gtso bo dang mthun par byed pas /
analyzed: gtso bo dang mthun par byed pas /
translated: By acting in accordance with the chief,

original: gtso bo dam pas sems can gzhan gdul ba'i phyir gtso bor gyur cing de byed do zhes bya ste /
analyzed: gtso bo dam pas sems can gzhan gdul ba'i phyir gtso bor gyur cing de byed do zhes bya ste /
translated: the excellent chief acts for the sake of subduing other sentient beings, saying ‚ÄúI am the chief and do that.‚Äù

original: khams gsum pa'i rgyan rnam par sgrub pa yang mngon par sgrub pa yin no zhes gsungs pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: khams gsum pa'i rgyan rnam par sgrub pa yang mngon par sgrub pa yin no zhes gsungs pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: It is also the establishment of the adornment of the three realms.

original: rgyan zhes bya ba'i sgra 'di ni /
analyzed: rgyan zhes bya ba'i sgra 'di ni /
translated: The term ‚Äúadornment‚Äù

original: khams gsum pa'i rgyan zhes bya bar rim pa bzhin du sbyar bar bya ba yin no //
analyzed: khams gsum pa'i rgyan zhes bya bar rim pa bzhin du sbyar bar bya ba yin no //
translated: is to be applied in order to the three realms.üîΩIt is the teaching of the antidote

original: nyon mongs rnams ni spong ba'i phyir //üîΩgnyen po nye bar ston pa'o //
analyzed: nyon mongs rnams ni spong ba'i phyir // gnyen po nye bar ston pa'o //
translated: for the abandonment of the defilements.

original: de ni nyon mongs pa spang ba'i phyir gnyen po nye bar ston te /
analyzed: de ni nyon mongs pa spang ba'i phyir gnyen po nye bar ston te /
translated: It is the teaching of the antidote for the abandonment of the defilements.

original: 'di ltar bdag nyid kun nas dkris pa dang / bag la nyal 'gags pas shin tu zhi zhing nye bar zhi bas so //
analyzed: 'di ltar bdag nyid kun nas dkris pa dang / bag la nyal 'gags pas shin tu zhi zhing nye bar zhi bas so //
translated: It is the complete pacification and utter pacification of the defilements and the latent tendencies.

original: kun nas dkris pa ni nyon mongs pa kun du 'byung ba ste /üîΩde med pas zhi ba'o //
analyzed: kun nas dkris pa ni nyon mongs pa kun du 'byung ba ste / de med pas zhi ba'o //
translated: The defilements are the arising of the defilements.

original: bag la nyal ni /
analyzed: bag la nyal ni /
translated: Because of the absence of that, there is pacification.

original: nyon mongs pa'i sa bon te /
analyzed: nyon mongs pa'i sa bon te /
translated: The latent tendencies are the seeds of the defilements.

original: de med pas nye bar zhi ba'o //
analyzed: de med pas nye bar zhi ba'o //
translated: Because of the absence of that, there is utter pacification.

original: 'di gnyi ga yang nyon mongs pa dang 'bar ba thams cad dang 'brel bas zhes bya bas bstan te /
analyzed: 'di gnyi ga yang nyon mongs pa dang 'bar ba thams cad dang 'brel bas zhes bya bas bstan te /
translated: Both of these are taught by ‚Äúfree from all the defilements and burning‚Äù.

original: 'bar ba ni nyon mongs pa'i bag la nyal yin no //
analyzed: 'bar ba ni nyon mongs pa'i bag la nyal yin no //
translated: Burning refers to the latent states of the afflictions.

original: 'di ltar sems can thams cad kyi 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug gi nyon mongs pa dang 'bar ba rab tu zhi bar bya ba mngon par sgrub pa yang mngon par sgrub pa yin zhes 'byung ba la rab tu zhi bar bya ba ni chos bstanüîΩpa yin te /üîΩ'dis nyon mongs pa @88a * //üîΩrnams rab tu zhi bar 'gyur bas so //üîΩgnod pa rab tu zhi bar byed pa ni sa lnga pa las gnod pa rnam pa bzhi po don dang bya ba brjed pa'i gnod pa dang / lta ba ngan pa dang / blo chung ba'i gnod pa dang / yongs su blangs pa'i nor ma sbas pa'i gnod pa dang /
analyzed: 'di ltar sems can thams cad kyi 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug gi nyon mongs pa dang 'bar ba rab tu zhi bar bya ba mngon par sgrub pa yang mngon par sgrub pa yin zhes 'byung ba la rab tu zhi bar bya ba ni chos bstan pa yin te / 'dis nyon mongs pa @88a * // rnams rab tu zhi bar 'gyur bas so // gnod pa rab tu zhi bar byed pa ni sa lnga pa las gnod pa rnam pa bzhi po don dang bya ba brjed pa'i gnod pa dang / lta ba ngan pa dang / blo chung ba'i gnod pa dang / yongs su blangs pa'i nor ma sbas pa'i gnod pa dang /
translated: Thus, the establishment of the meditative development of the Dharma is also the establishment of the pacification of the burning afflictions of desire, hatred and ignorance of all sentient beings.

original: 'du ba dang 'god pa la rmongs pa'i gnod pa bshad pa gang yin pa ste /
analyzed: 'du ba dang 'god pa la rmongs pa'i gnod pa bshad pa gang yin pa ste /
translated: The pacification of harm refers to the four types of harm that were mentioned on the fifth spiritual level, namely, the harm of forgetting the meaning and the rite, the harm of bad views and of little understanding, the harm of not concealing the wealth that has been acquired and the harm of being confused about the assembly and the arrangement.

original: las bya ba rnam par phye ba tshad med pa'i bsam pa yang mngon par sgrub pa yin zhes gang gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: las bya ba rnam par phye ba tshad med pa'i bsam pa yang mngon par sgrub pa yin zhes gang gsungs pa'o //
translated: He also accomplishes the immeasurable intention of the analysis of action.

original: las bya ba ni byed pa'o //
analyzed: las bya ba ni byed pa'o //
translated: Action is what is to be done.

original: rnam par phye ba ni tha dad pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par phye ba ni tha dad pa'o //
translated: Analysis is differentiation.

original: de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam pa tshad med de thabs du ma mngon par bsgrub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam pa tshad med de thabs du ma mngon par bsgrub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The intention of the bodhisattvas is immeasurable because it is accomplished by many means.

original: yang na de nyid tshad med pa yin te rnam pa mang ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yang na de nyid tshad med pa yin te rnam pa mang ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Or else, it is immeasurable because it is manifold.

original: de la bsam pa ni de sgrub par sems pa ste /
analyzed: de la bsam pa ni de sgrub par sems pa ste /
translated: Therein, intention is the will to accomplish that.

original: de'i phyir las bya ba las su bya ba de mngon par sgrub po //
analyzed: de'i phyir las bya ba las su bya ba de mngon par sgrub po //
translated: Therefore, he accomplishes the action that is to be done.

original: chos mnyam pa'i phyir 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnams su sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su sems can rnams 'du pa nye bar sgrub pa ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan rnams sgrub pa yang mngon par sgrub pa yin zhes gang gsungs pa ste /
analyzed: chos mnyam pa'i phyir 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnams su sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su sems can rnams 'du pa nye bar sgrub pa ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan rnams sgrub pa yang mngon par sgrub pa yin zhes gang gsungs pa ste /
translated: He also accomplishes the adornment of the buddhaverse, accomplishing the assembly of beings in the buddhaverse through the equality of phenomena in the circles of assembly.

original: 'dir yang rgyan zhes bya ba'i sgra ni rim pa gzhan du sbyar ba yin no //
analyzed: 'dir yang rgyan zhes bya ba'i sgra ni rim pa gzhan du sbyar ba yin no //
translated: Here, the term ‚Äúornament‚Äù is applied in a different sense.

original: bsod nams 'phel bar byed pa ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: bsod nams 'phel bar byed pa ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: How does it increase merit?

original: dad pa dang lhan cig pas gzugs kyi sku lta ba dang ; chos mnyan pa dang / gus par smra ba dang / phyag 'tshal ba la sogs pa'i bsnyen pas bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan la sogs pa rab tu dbul ba mchod pa sbyar ba rnams kyis te /
analyzed: dad pa dang lhan cig pas gzugs kyi sku lta ba dang ; chos mnyan pa dang / gus par smra ba dang / phyag 'tshal ba la sogs pa'i bsnyen pas bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan la sogs pa rab tu dbul ba mchod pa sbyar ba rnams kyis te /
translated: It is the application of worship, which is the seeing of the body of the Buddha, the hearing of the Dharma, the service of the Sa·πÖgha, the respectful address, the prostration, etc., and the offering of parasols, banners, and lamps, etc.,

original: gzugs dang mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po'i rgyan rnam par sgrub ces gsungs pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: gzugs dang mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po'i rgyan rnam par sgrub ces gsungs pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: which is the accomplishment of the ornament of the body, the marks, and the signs.

original: chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: How does it turn the wheel of the Dharma?

original: dbyangs dang yan lag thams cad rnam par phye bas rnam par dag pa'i rgyan mngon par sgrub pa yang mngon par sgrub bo zhes gsungs pa gang yin pa ste /
analyzed: dbyangs dang yan lag thams cad rnam par phye bas rnam par dag pa'i rgyan mngon par sgrub pa yang mngon par sgrub bo zhes gsungs pa gang yin pa ste /
translated: It is the accomplishment of the ornament of the purification of all the aspects of speech, which is the accomplishment of the ornament of the purification of all the aspects of speech.

original: dbyangs rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba las bstan pa lta bu yan lag thams cad rnam par phye ba ni rnam pa tha dad pa ste /
analyzed: dbyangs rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba las bstan pa lta bu yan lag thams cad rnam par phye ba ni rnam pa tha dad pa ste /
translated: The different aspects are the different divisions of the vowels and consonants, as taught in the TathƒÅgataguhya S≈´tra.

original: des rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: des rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because they are purified by those aspects.

original: byang chub gsum gyi rgyan ni de dang mthun par ston pa ste /
analyzed: byang chub gsum gyi rgyan ni de dang mthun par ston pa ste /
translated: The ornaments of the three enlightenments are taught in accordance with that.

original: 'di dag gis byang chub gsum po brgyan par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'di dag gis byang chub gsum po brgyan par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because they become the ornaments of the three enlightenments.

original: de'i phyir de dag mngon par sgrub po //
analyzed: de'i phyir de dag mngon par sgrub po //
translated: Therefore they are accomplished.

original: @88b dris pa lung ston pa ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: @88b dris pa lung ston pa ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: How is the prediction of questions?

original: 'di ltar sems can gyi bsam pa brjod pa'i phyir /üîΩbskal pa bgrangs pa'i mchan nyid tha dad pa shes pa la yang 'jug pa yin zhes 'byung ba'i phyir te /
analyzed: 'di ltar sems can gyi bsam pa brjod pa'i phyir / bskal pa bgrangs pa'i mchan nyid tha dad pa shes pa la yang 'jug pa yin zhes 'byung ba'i phyir te /
translated: In order to express the thoughts of sentient beings,üîΩthey also engage in the knowledge of the different characteristics of enumerated eons.

original: bskal pa bgrangs pa rnams kyi chos kyi mtshan nyid tha dad pa gang gis shes par 'gyur ba de dag la yang 'jug cing rtog par byed do //
analyzed: bskal pa bgrangs pa rnams kyi chos kyi mtshan nyid tha dad pa gang gis shes par 'gyur ba de dag la yang 'jug cing rtog par byed do //
translated: They also engage in and contemplate the different characteristics of enumerated eons by which they become known.

original: ji lta zhe na /
analyzed: ji lta zhe na /
translated: How is that?

original: sems can gyi bsam pa brjod pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: sems can gyi bsam pa brjod pa'i phyir te /
translated: because it expresses the thoughts of sentient beings.

original: rab tu brjod pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: rab tu brjod pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: It is said that it is for the sake of their expression.üîΩThus, this fourth cause is the sevenfold cause of benefiting sentient beings.üîΩThe path is the tenfold path of action,üîΩwhich is the antidote to the four causes.üîΩThe path is the tenfold path of action, which is the antidote to the four causes.

original: de ltar na sems can la phan 'dogs pa'i rgyu rnam pa bdun po 'di ni rgyu bzhi pa yin no //üîΩde dag gnyen po dang bcas pa //
analyzed: de ltar na sems can la phan 'dogs pa'i rgyu rnam pa bdun po 'di ni rgyu bzhi pa yin no // de dag gnyen po dang bcas pa //
translated: The path is the tenfold path of action, which is the antidote to the four causes.

original: lam ni bcu po rnams yin te //üîΩstong pa nyid bsgom la sogs pa //
analyzed: lam ni bcu po rnams yin te // stong pa nyid bsgom la sogs pa //
translated: The path is the tenfold path of action, which is the antidote to the four causes.

original: gnyen po yin par shes par bya //üîΩstong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la sogs pa shin tu bsgoms pa'i yid dang yang ldan la /
analyzed: gnyen po yin par shes par bya // stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la sogs pa shin tu bsgoms pa'i yid dang yang ldan la /
translated: The path is the tenfold path of action, which is the antidote to the four causes.

analyzed: bsod nams kyi tshogs chen po yang stsogs par byed pa 'di ni shin tu ya mtshan che ste /
