original: smon pa med pas ni mi smon pa yin na /üîΩtshogs stsogs par byed ces bya ba ngo mtshar che'o //
analyzed: smon pa med pas ni mi smon pa yin na /üîΩtshogs stsogs par byed ces bya ba ngo mtshar che'o //
translated: The path is the tenfold path of action

original: de bzhin du gzhan la yang shes par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du gzhan la yang shes par bya'o //
translated: The same should be understood for the others.

original: de yongs su 'dzin pa ni mngon par 'du byed pa la dga' ba bzlog pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: de yongs su 'dzin pa ni mngon par 'du byed pa la dga' ba bzlog pa'i phyir te /
translated: The retention of the Dharma is for the sake of turning away from delight in the performance of action.

original: mngon par 'du byed pa med pa la dga' ba bzlog pa bzhin du shes par bya'o //
analyzed: mngon par 'du byed pa med pa la dga' ba bzlog pa bzhin du shes par bya'o //
translated: It should be understood as the opposite of delight in the absence of performance of action.

original: ji lta zhe na /
analyzed: ji lta zhe na /
translated: How is that?

original: ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' chags pa med pa'i ye shes la mngon par phyogs pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa mngon du gyur pas mngon par 'du byed pa med pa nyid la sems dga' ba yin gyi /
analyzed: ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' chags pa med pa'i ye shes la mngon par phyogs pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa mngon du gyur pas mngon par 'du byed pa med pa nyid la sems dga' ba yin gyi /
translated: The bodhisattva who is intent on nonattached knowledge, who is established in the perfection of wisdom, who is manifest, delights in the mind that is without performance of action.

original: mngon par mtho ba'i lam mngon par 'du byed pa la ni ma yin pa mkhyen nas /
analyzed: mngon par mtho ba'i lam mngon par 'du byed pa la ni ma yin pa mkhyen nas /
translated: He knows that it is not the performance of action on the path of high status.

original: de la dga' ba bzlog pa'i phyir mngon par mtho ba'i lam bstan pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' mngon par mtho ba'i lam mngon par 'du byed pa la brtson pas de mngon par 'du byed pa la dga' bar gyur na mi rung zhes mngon par mtho
analyzed: de la dga' ba bzlog pa'i phyir mngon par mtho ba'i lam bstan pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' mngon par mtho ba'i lam mngon par 'du byed pa la brtson pas de mngon par 'du byed pa la dga' bar gyur na mi rung zhes mngon par mtho
translated: In the same way, when a bodhisattva who is striving to manifest the path of high status becomes delighted in that manifestation, it is not suitable.

original: ba'i lam mngon par 'du byed pa la dga' ba bzlog pa'i phyir gnyen po yongs su 'dzin pa rnam pa bcu bstan pa mdzad do //
analyzed: ba'i lam mngon par 'du byed pa la dga' ba bzlog pa'i phyir gnyen po yongs su 'dzin pa rnam pa bcu bstan pa mdzad do //
translated: In order to turn him away from delight in the manifestation of the path of high status, the ten kinds of antidotes are taught.

original: snang bar gyur pa de dag mngon par bsgrubs pas zhes bya ba ni shes rab kyi yul du gyur pa rnams yang dang @89a * //
analyzed: snang bar gyur pa de dag mngon par bsgrubs pas zhes bya ba ni shes rab kyi yul du gyur pa rnams yang dang @89a * //
translated: By accomplishing those that have become manifest means by repeatedly actualizing those that have become objects of wisdom.

original: yang mngon sum du byed pas zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //üîΩde yi mi mthun phyogs kyi ni //
analyzed: yang mngon sum du byed pas zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // de yi mi mthun phyogs kyi ni //
translated: This is what is meant by the phrase,

original: gnyen po gzhan rnams gnyis su brjod //üîΩtshad med rnam pa dag gis ni //
analyzed: gnyen po gzhan rnams gnyis su brjod // tshad med rnam pa dag gis ni //
translated: The other antidotes to their resistant tendencies are said to be two-fold.üîΩThe cultivation of the antidotes by means of the four immeasurables,

original: gnyen po sgom pa gang yin dang // 'du byed med cing brtsal med par //
analyzed: gnyen po sgom pa gang yin dang // 'du byed med cing brtsal med par //
translated: and the effortless and spontaneous antidotes,üîΩare the two kinds of antidote.

original: 'byung ba'i lam la sbyor ba'o ;üîΩ/ de yi rnam par g-yeng ba ni //
analyzed: 'byung ba'i lam la sbyor ba'o ; / de yi rnam par g-yeng ba ni //
translated: It is the application to the path of emergence.üîΩIts distraction is

original: de yi rnam par g-yeng ba ste //
analyzed: de yi rnam par g-yeng ba ste //
translated: Its distraction is

original: lam gzhan rtsom pa'i khyad par gyi //
analyzed: lam gzhan rtsom pa'i khyad par gyi //
translated: The distinction of undertaking another path.

original: zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: This is the meaning.

original: de la sgom rnam 'di dag ste /
analyzed: de la sgom rnam 'di dag ste /
translated: There are these aspects of cultivation:üîΩBy whom, for whose sake,üîΩIn what place, by what means,

original: gang dag gi don byed pa dang // gnas gang yin dang gang gis dang // ji ltar gang du'i bye brag gis //
analyzed: gang dag gi don byed pa dang // gnas gang yin dang gang gis dang // ji ltar gang du'i bye brag gis //
translated: In what way, and for what length of time.

original: mdor na sgom pa'i rnam pa ni //
analyzed: mdor na sgom pa'i rnam pa ni //
translated: In brief, the aspects of cultivation

original: bcu po 'di dag rab tu bsgrags //
analyzed: bcu po 'di dag rab tu bsgrags //
translated: Are proclaimed to be these ten.üîΩBy whom is the questioner.

original: gang dag gi don byed pa dang zhes bya ba ni sems can rnams kyi ste /üîΩsems can gyi khams tshad med pa la yang 'jug la zhes gsungs pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: gang dag gi don byed pa dang zhes bya ba ni sems can rnams kyi ste /üîΩsems can gyi khams tshad med pa la yang 'jug la zhes gsungs pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: For whose sake is the one for whose sake.

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa dang / 'dul ba'i phrin las tshad med pa la yang 'jug go zhes bya ba ni brtson pa mi gtang bar bya ba'i phyir thabs gang gis bya ba de tshig gnyis pas bstan te /
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa dang / 'dul ba'i phrin las tshad med pa la yang 'jug go zhes bya ba ni brtson pa mi gtang bar bya ba'i phyir thabs gang gis bya ba de tshig gnyis pas bstan te /
translated: The second line shows by what means one acts, in order not to abandon striving.

original: gnyi ga bya ba gcig pa'i phyir rnam pa gcig nyid yin no //
analyzed: gnyi ga bya ba gcig pa'i phyir rnam pa gcig nyid yin no //
translated: It is a single aspect because both are a single activity.

original: 'og ma rnams kyang de bzhin du shes par bya'o ;
analyzed: 'og ma rnams kyang de bzhin du shes par bya'o ;
translated: The others should be understood in the same way.

original: / gnas gang yin pa zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: / gnas gang yin pa zhes bya ba ni /
translated: As for the abode,

original: 'jig rten gyi khams mang po tshad med pa la yang 'jug la zhes bya ba yin te des 'jig rten gyi khams mang po tshad med pa rnam par dag par byed pa yid ches par bya ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams mang po tshad med pa la yang 'jug la zhes bya ba yin te des 'jig rten gyi khams mang po tshad med pa rnam par dag par byed pa yid ches par bya ba'i phyir ro //
translated: one enters into the immeasurable many world systems, in order to inspire confidence in the purification of the many immeasurable world systems.

original: gang gis zhes bya ba ni rnam pa gnyis kyis so //
analyzed: gang gis zhes bya ba ni rnam pa gnyis kyis so //
translated: As for by what means, it is by two aspects.

original: ji lta zhe na /
analyzed: ji lta zhe na /
translated: How so?

original: chos tha dad pa tshad med pa la yang 'jug pa ni sems can gyi bsam pa dang bag la nyal tha dad pas chos bstan pa la tha dad pa nyid thabs yin pa'o //
analyzed: chos tha dad pa tshad med pa la yang 'jug pa ni sems can gyi bsam pa dang bag la nyal tha dad pas chos bstan pa la tha dad pa nyid thabs yin pa'o //
translated: And also, he penetrates the immeasurable different Dharmas, because the teaching of the Dharma is different for the different inclinations and proclivities of beings.

original: ye shes mngon par rdzogs par thugs su chud pa tshad med pa la yang 'jug go zhes bya ba ni sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs pa dang las sna tshogs pa shes par nus pa nyid do //üîΩbskal pa bgrangs pa tshad med pa rtogs pa la 'jug la zhes bya ba ni rnam pa gnyis te /
analyzed: ye shes mngon par rdzogs par thugs su chud pa tshad med pa la yang 'jug go zhes bya ba ni sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs pa dang las sna tshogs pa shes par nus pa nyid do // bskal pa bgrangs pa tshad med pa rtogs pa la 'jug la zhes bya ba ni rnam pa gnyis te /
translated: And also, he penetrates the immeasurable realization of the full comprehension of knowledge, because he is able to know the various afflictions and actions of beings.

original: sems can rnams kyi dus kyi tshad nyid shes par nur par bya ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sems can rnams kyi dus kyi tshad nyid shes par nur par bya ba'i phyir ro //
translated: And also, he penetrates the realization of the immeasurable enumeration of eons, because he is able to know the measure of the time of beings.

original: ji lta bu zhes bya ba ni rnam pa gsum gyis so //
analyzed: ji lta bu zhes bya ba ni rnam pa gsum gyis so //
translated: In what way? In three ways:

original: ji lta zhe na sems 'dra bar 'jug pa ni ji @89b ltar dkon mchog brtsegs pa las dge slong lnga brgya'i sems dang mthun par dge slong gnyis sprul par 'byung ba lta bu'o //
analyzed: ji lta zhe na sems 'dra bar 'jug pa ni ji @89b ltar dkon mchog brtsegs pa las dge slong lnga brgya'i sems dang mthun par dge slong gnyis sprul par 'byung ba lta bu'o //
translated: In the same way that the two emanated monks appeared in the Ratnakuta, in accord with the minds of the five hundred monks.

original: lus 'dra bar 'jug pa ni bram ze la sogs pas gdul bar bya ba de lta bu'i lus kun du ston pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: lus 'dra bar 'jug pa ni bram ze la sogs pas gdul bar bya ba de lta bu'i lus kun du ston pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The bodhisattva's body is like a reflection because he manifests bodies of that kind in order to convert brahmins, etc.üîΩThe bodhisattva turns away their devotion to those bodies because he causes them to turn away from and abandon their devotion to the gods, since both are alike in being reflections.

original: de dag la mos pa bzlog pa ni de gnyi ga mthun par 'jug pas lha la mos pa gang yin pa de dag zlog par byed cing sel bar byed pa'o //üîΩsngon gyi bsam pa las byung ba ni sngon gyi tshe rabs gzhan na goms ba de'i rgyus dbang po rtul po dang 'bring dang rnon po rnams su 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de dag la mos pa bzlog pa ni de gnyi ga mthun par 'jug pas lha la mos pa gang yin pa de dag zlog par byed cing sel bar byed pa'o // sngon gyi bsam pa las byung ba ni sngon gyi tshe rabs gzhan na goms ba de'i rgyus dbang po rtul po dang 'bring dang rnon po rnams su 'gyur ro //
translated: The bodhisattva's body is like a magical creation because he creates magical creations in order to convert sentient beings.üîΩThe bodhisattva's body is like an echo because he preaches the Dharma in accordance with the inclinations of sentient beings.

original: de dag la ci rigs pa ni gang la chos gang zhig 'tsham pa de ston pa ste /
analyzed: de dag la ci rigs pa ni gang la chos gang zhig 'tsham pa de ston pa ste /
translated: The bodhisattva's body is like a cloud because he is the basis of the rain of the great Dharma.üîΩThe bodhisattva's body is like the earth because he is the support of sentient beings.üîΩThe bodhisattva's body is like water because he is the cause of the purification of sentient beings' virtue.üîΩThe bodhisattva's body is like fire because he burns the fuel of all the afflictions of sentient beings.üîΩThe bodhisattva's body is like wind because he is the cause of the growth of the crops of virtue of sentient beings.

original: sems can gyi bsam pas dbang po tshad med pa la 'ang 'jug ces gang gsungs pa ste /üîΩbsam pas dang po tha dad pa nyid ces bya bar tshig rnam par sbyar ro //
analyzed: sems can gyi bsam pas dbang po tshad med pa la 'ang 'jug ces gang gsungs pa ste /üîΩbsam pas dang po tha dad pa nyid ces bya bar tshig rnam par sbyar ro //
translated: The bodhisattva's body is like a wish-fulfilling gem because he fulfills the wishes of all sentient beings.üîΩThe bodhisattva's body is like a great king because he is the lord of all sentient beings.üîΩThe bodhisattva's body is like a servant because he serves all sentient beings.üîΩThe bodhisattva's body is like a conveyance because he carries all sentient beings.üîΩThe bodhisattva's body is like a boat or a floating bag because he does not abandon all sentient beings who are in the great river of suffering.

original: gsung brjod pas sems can gzhan tshim par mdzad pa tshad med pa la yang 'jug go zhes bya ba ni rim pa 'dis sems can rnams la phan gdags pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gsung brjod pas sems can gzhan tshim par mdzad pa tshad med pa la yang 'jug go zhes bya ba ni rim pa 'dis sems can rnams la phan gdags pa'i phyir ro //
translated: And he enters into the immeasurable satisfaction of other sentient beings by his speech.

original: sems can rnams kyi spyod pa ji lta ba bzhin du gnyen po'i gdams ngag rjes su ston pa ni sems can rnams kyi sems kyi spyod pa tha dad pa tshad med pa la yang 'jug la zhes gsungs pa gang yin pa ste /
analyzed: sems can rnams kyi spyod pa ji lta ba bzhin du gnyen po'i gdams ngag rjes su ston pa ni sems can rnams kyi sems kyi spyod pa tha dad pa tshad med pa la yang 'jug la zhes gsungs pa gang yin pa ste /
translated: He enters into the immeasurable different mental behaviors of sentient beings by teaching the instruction of the antidote in accordance with the behavior of sentient beings.

original: de dang mthun pa'i gnyen po rnam par sbyar ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de dang mthun pa'i gnyen po rnam par sbyar ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because he applies the antidote in accordance with that.

original: ye shes rab 'byam tshad med pa rjes su rtogs pa la yang 'jug go zhes bya ba ni des gnyen po yang dag par bstan par bya ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ye shes rab 'byam tshad med pa rjes su rtogs pa la yang 'jug go zhes bya ba ni des gnyen po yang dag par bstan par bya ba'i phyir ro //
translated: And he enters into the realization of the immeasurable variety of knowledge, because he teaches the antidote by that.

original: gang du zhes bya ba ni theg pa gsum la ste rnam pa gsum gyis lam bstan pa la 'jug pa la mos pa yin pas sems can tshad med pa dag ni nyan thos kyi theg pa la gzung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gang du zhes bya ba ni theg pa gsum la ste rnam pa gsum gyis lam bstan pa la 'jug pa la mos pa yin pas sems can tshad med pa dag ni nyan thos kyi theg pa la gzung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: In the three vehicles, in the three aspects of the path, he is interested in engaging in the teaching.

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa yang dag par sgrub pa 'grub pa la yang 'jug la zhes bya ba ni der tshogs bstsags pa rnams zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa yang dag par sgrub pa 'grub pa la yang 'jug la zhes bya ba ni der tshogs bstsags pa rnams zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: He is interested in the establishment of the vehicle of the Solitary Buddhas, in the accumulation of the equipment there.

original: ye shes zab mo'i sgor 'jug pa bstan pa tshad med pa la yang 'jug go zhes bya ba ni des de dag gi rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa bsgrubs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ye shes zab mo'i sgor 'jug pa bstan pa tshad med pa la yang 'jug go zhes bya ba ni des de dag gi rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa bsgrubs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: He is interested in the teaching of the entrance into the door of profound intuition, in the teaching of the vehicle of the Solitary Buddhas, because of that.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la sbyor ba tshad med ba la yang 'jug go zhes bya ba ni des de dag khyad par du gzung nus pa nyid du shes par bya ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la sbyor ba tshad med ba la yang 'jug go zhes bya ba ni des de dag khyad par du gzung nus pa nyid du shes par bya ba'i phyir ro //
translated: He is interested in the immeasurable application to the practice of the career of the bodhisattva, in order to show that he is able to take up that special practice.

original: theg pa chen po yang dag par sgrub pa la 'jug pa bstan pa tshad med @90a * //
analyzed: theg pa chen po yang dag par sgrub pa la 'jug pa bstan pa tshad med @90a * //
translated: He enters into the teaching of the immeasurable entrance into the practice of the Great Vehicle.

original: pa la yang 'jug go zhes bya ba ni des spyod pa la zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams theg pa chen po yang dag par 'byung ba la gzud pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: pa la yang 'jug go zhes bya ba ni des spyod pa la zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams theg pa chen po yang dag par 'byung ba la gzud pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because he causes the bodhisattvas who have entered into the practice to enter into the origination of the Great Vehicle.üîΩThe path is perfected

original: lhun grub rtog pa med pa yis //
analyzed: lhun grub rtog pa med pa yis //
translated: by the effortless, nonconceptualüîΩIt is taught that the applicationüîΩis on the path without exertion.üîΩThe path is perfected by the effortless, nonconceptual, he says.üîΩEffortless means without exertion.üîΩNonconceptual means without conceptualization.

original: lam ni yongs su rdzogs 'gyur ba //
analyzed: lam ni yongs su rdzogs 'gyur ba //
translated: The path is perfected means that the path is completed.

original: mngon par 'du byed med lam gyi //
analyzed: mngon par 'du byed med lam gyi //
translated: By the effortless, nonconceptual means by the path without exertion.

original: sbyor ba yin par yongs su bstan //üîΩngo bo nyid dang bye brag la rnam par rtog pa med par zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: sbyor ba yin par yongs su bstan // ngo bo nyid dang bye brag la rnam par rtog pa med par zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The application is taught to be on the path without exertion.üîΩThe application is taught to be on the path without exertion.üîΩThe path is perfected by the effortless, nonconceptual.

original: rang dang spyi'i mtshan nyid la rnam par rtog pa med par zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: rang dang spyi'i mtshan nyid la rnam par rtog pa med par zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: The path is perfected by the effortless, nonconceptual.üîΩThe path is perfected by the effortless, nonconceptual.üîΩThe path is perfected by the effortless, nonconceptual.üîΩThe path is perfected by the effortless, nonconceptual.üîΩThe path is perfected by the effortless, nonconceptual.üîΩThe path is perfected by the effortless, nonconceptual.

original: de ltar rnam par dpyod ldan pa //üîΩde yi rnam g-yeng spang ba'i phyir //üîΩlam gzhan dag la mi g-yo ba'i //
analyzed: de ltar rnam par dpyod ldan pa // de yi rnam g-yeng spang ba'i phyir // lam gzhan dag la mi g-yo ba'i //
translated: The path is perfected by the effortless, nonconceptual.üîΩThe path is perfected by the effortless, nonconceptual.üîΩThe path is perfected by the effortless, nonconceptual.üîΩThe path is perfected by the effortless, nonconceptual.üîΩThe path is perfected by the effortless, nonconceptual.üîΩThe path is perfected by the effortless, nonconceptual.üîΩThe path is perfected by the effortless, nonconceptual.üîΩThe path is perfected by the effortless, nonconceptual.üîΩThe path is perfected by the effortless, nonconceptual.üîΩThe path is perfected by the effortless, nonconceptual.üîΩThe path is perfected by the effortless, nonconceptual.üîΩThe path is perfected by the effortless, nonconceptual.üîΩThe path is perfected by the effortless, nonconceptual.üîΩThe path is perfected by the effortless, nonconceptual.üîΩThe path is perfected by the effortless, nonconceptual.üîΩThe path is perfected by the effortless, nonconceptual.üîΩThe path is perfected by the effortless, nonconceptual.üîΩThe path is perfected by the effortless, nonconceptual.üîΩThe path is perfected by the effortless, nonconceptual.üîΩThe path is perfected by the effortless, nonconceptual.üîΩThe path is perfected by the effortless, nonconceptual.

original: rab tu gnas pa thob par 'gyur //
analyzed: rab tu gnas pa thob par 'gyur //
translated: The path is perfected by the effortless, nonconceptual.üîΩThe path is perfected by the effortless, non

original: de'i rnam par g-yeng ba'i gnyen po yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni lam gzhan rtsom pa'i rnam par g-yeng ba'i gnyen po yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i tha tshig ste /
analyzed: de'i rnam par g-yeng ba'i gnyen po yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni lam gzhan rtsom pa'i rnam par g-yeng ba'i gnyen po yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i tha tshig ste /
translated: This means that it is the antidote to distraction from undertaking another path.

original: mi g-yo ba'i tshul gyis shin tu gnas pa yin no zhes gang gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: mi g-yo ba'i tshul gyis shin tu gnas pa yin no zhes gang gsungs pa'o //
translated: It is said that it is very stable by the method of immovability.

original: zung du 'brel ba rgyu bzhi yis //
analyzed: zung du 'brel ba rgyu bzhi yis //
translated: The path is posited as having four causes

original: rnam par gzhag par 'dod pa ste //
analyzed: rnam par gzhag par 'dod pa ste //
translated: For the union of serenity and insight.

original: lam ni cig car 'byung 'gyur zhing //
analyzed: lam ni cig car 'byung 'gyur zhing //
translated: The path arises simultaneouslyüîΩAnd also arises in a continuum,üîΩAnd it is the purification of interest

original: de yang rgyun chags 'byung ba dang // mos pa rnam par dag pa dang // don chen byed pa gang yin gyi //
analyzed: de yang rgyun chags 'byung ba dang // mos pa rnam par dag pa dang // don chen byed pa gang yin gyi //
translated: And the performance of great meaning.

original: byang chub phyogs ni rab dbye ba //
analyzed: byang chub phyogs ni rab dbye ba //
translated: The factors of enlightenment are divided

original: rgyu bzhi pa ni yin par 'dod //üîΩde la skad cig gcig 'byung ba ;
analyzed: rgyu bzhi pa ni yin par 'dod // de la skad cig gcig 'byung ba ;
translated: Into four causes.üîΩThe simultaneous arising

original: / cig car 'byung ba yin par 'dod //
analyzed: / cig car 'byung ba yin par 'dod //
translated: Is asserted to be the arising of one moment.

original: zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gi lam mngon sum du byed pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gi lam mngon sum du byed pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because it manifests the path of serenity and insight.

original: de skad cig gcig la yang mngon par sgrub cing mi ldang ste zhes gsungs pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: de skad cig gcig la yang mngon par sgrub cing mi ldang ste zhes gsungs pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: He does not rise from that in even a single moment.

original: spyod lam kun du 'byung ba'i phyir //
analyzed: spyod lam kun du 'byung ba'i phyir //
translated: Because it occurs in all activities,

original: bar chad med par 'byung bar bshad //
analyzed: bar chad med par 'byung bar bshad //
translated: it is said to occur without interruption.

original: de 'gro 'am zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: de 'gro 'am zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: He goes, etc.

original: sgrib pa yang dag spang ba'i phyir //
analyzed: sgrib pa yang dag spang ba'i phyir //
translated: Because it is the complete abandonment of obscurations,

original: mos pa rnam par dag 'gyur te //
analyzed: mos pa rnam par dag 'gyur te //
translated: devotion becomes pure.

original: gang phyir sgrib las rnam dag pas //
analyzed: gang phyir sgrib las rnam dag pas //
translated: Because of the purity from obscurations,

original: sgrib pa med par bshad pa yin //
analyzed: sgrib pa med par bshad pa yin //
translated: it is explained as being without obscurations.

original: sgrib pa med pas spyod lam thams cad la gnas shing zhes gsungs pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: sgrib pa med pas spyod lam thams cad la gnas shing zhes gsungs pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: Because of being without obscurations, he abides in all activities.

original: ye shes tshad med de dag la //
analyzed: ye shes tshad med de dag la //
translated: In those immeasurable wisdoms,

original: bkra bar byed pa rnam gnas pa //
analyzed: bkra bar byed pa rnam gnas pa //
translated: it is the vividness that abides.

original: 'du shes sems 'dun byed pa'i phyir //
analyzed: 'du shes sems 'dun byed pa'i phyir //
translated: Because it is the mental orientation of perception,

original: de ni yid la byed pa yin //
analyzed: de ni yid la byed pa yin //
translated: it is mental orientation.

original: 'du shes yid la byed pa de lta bu dag dang mi 'bral ba yin zhes gsungs pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: 'du shes yid la byed pa de lta bu dag dang mi 'bral ba yin zhes gsungs pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: He is never without such mental orientation of perception.

original: ye shes tshad med pa de dag la zhes bya ba ni sems can @90b gyi khams tshad med pa la yang 'jug pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa sngar bshad pa rnams la'o //
analyzed: ye shes tshad med pa de dag la zhes bya ba ni sems can @90b gyi khams tshad med pa la yang 'jug pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa sngar bshad pa rnams la'o //
translated: Those immeasurable wisdoms refers to the previously explained engagement in the immeasurable realm of sentient beings and so on.

original: bkra bar byed pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni gsal bar 'dzin pa la sogs pas mtshan ma yang dag par rtogs pa'i phyir 'dus zhes so //
analyzed: bkra bar byed pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni gsal bar 'dzin pa la sogs pas mtshan ma yang dag par rtogs pa'i phyir 'dus zhes so //
translated: Because it makes them clear means that it is called accumulation because it correctly realizes signs through clear apprehension and so on.

original: mngon du nyid 'dun pa ste de byed pa'i phyir yid la byed pa'o //
analyzed: mngon du nyid 'dun pa ste de byed pa'i phyir yid la byed pa'o //
translated: It is the intentionality of manifestation itself. Because it produces that, it is attention.

original: sems kun la ni yod pa'i phyir //
analyzed: sems kun la ni yod pa'i phyir //
translated: Because it exists in all minds,

original: pha rol phyin zhes bya ba yi //
analyzed: pha rol phyin zhes bya ba yi //
translated: it is called the perfection.

original: chos bcu yang dag 'grub pa ni //
analyzed: chos bcu yang dag 'grub pa ni //
translated: The accomplishment of the ten dharmas

original: don chen nyid du shes par bya //
analyzed: don chen nyid du shes par bya //
translated: should be known as the great meaning.

original: de'i sems bskyed pa re re la yang byang chub sems dpa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bcu yang dag par sgrub pa yang dag par 'grub po zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: de'i sems bskyed pa re re la yang byang chub sems dpa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bcu yang dag par sgrub pa yang dag par 'grub po zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: In each generation of the thought of enlightenment, the accomplishment of the ten perfections of the bodhisattva is accomplished.

original: 'di ni mdo nyid las legs par bkrol zin pa'i phyir rnam par ma phye ba'o //
analyzed: 'di ni mdo nyid las legs par bkrol zin pa'i phyir rnam par ma phye ba'o //
translated: Since this has been well explained in the sutra itself, it is not analyzed here.

original: gzhi ni slob dpon nyid kyis rnam par phye bar zad do //üîΩrgyu bzhi dag gis byang chub kyi //
analyzed: gzhi ni slob dpon nyid kyis rnam par phye bar zad do // rgyu bzhi dag gis byang chub kyi //
translated: The basis is analyzed by the master himself.üîΩThe factors conducive to enlightenment

original: phyogs mthun rnam par gzhag par 'dod //
analyzed: phyogs mthun rnam par gzhag par 'dod //
translated: are established by four causes.

original: theg pa chen po'i skabs kyis na //
analyzed: theg pa chen po'i skabs kyis na //
translated: In the context of the Great Vehicle,

original: pha rol phyin pa bcur gzhag go //
analyzed: pha rol phyin pa bcur gzhag go //
translated: they are established as the ten perfections.

original: sems can smin byed skabs kyis na //
analyzed: sems can smin byed skabs kyis na //
translated: In the context of ripening sentient beings,

original: de sdud byed pa yang dag gzhag //
analyzed: de sdud byed pa yang dag gzhag //
translated: the means of gathering them are properly established.

original: nyon mongs sgrib pa dag bya'i phyir //
analyzed: nyon mongs sgrib pa dag bya'i phyir //
translated: For the sake of purifying the obscurations of affliction,

original: gnas la sogs pa yang dag gzhan //
analyzed: gnas la sogs pa yang dag gzhan //
translated: the bases and so forth are properly established.

original: gang la gnas te gang sgom zhing //
analyzed: gang la gnas te gang sgom zhing //
translated: What is the basis, what is cultivated,

original: sgo gang dag gis dag 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: sgo gang dag gis dag 'gyur ba'o //
translated: and by what means is it purified?üîΩThe bases are wisdom, the truths,

original: gnas dag ni shes rab dang bden pa dang ; nyon mongs pa spang ba dang / sdug bsngal nye bar zhi ba'i gnas rnams te /
analyzed: gnas dag ni shes rab dang bden pa dang ; nyon mongs pa spang ba dang / sdug bsngal nye bar zhi ba'i gnas rnams te /
translated: the abandonment of afflictions, and the pacification of suffering.

original: shes rab kyis bden pa rnams la nyon mongs pa rnams kyang spang la sdug bsngal yang nye bar zhi bar byed do //
analyzed: shes rab kyis bden pa rnams la nyon mongs pa rnams kyang spang la sdug bsngal yang nye bar zhi bar byed do //
translated: And by means of wisdom, one abandons the afflictions with regard to the truths and also pacifies suffering.

original: de lta bas na 'dis ni bden pa bzhi bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: de lta bas na 'dis ni bden pa bzhi bstan pa yin no //
translated: Thus, this verse teaches the four noble truths.

original: shes rab kyis ni lam gyi bden pa bstan to //
analyzed: shes rab kyis ni lam gyi bden pa bstan to //
translated: By means of wisdom, one teaches the truth of the path.

original: spangs pa dang nye bar zhi ba dag gis ni 'gog pa'o //
analyzed: spangs pa dang nye bar zhi ba dag gis ni 'gog pa'o //
translated: By means of abandonment and pacification, one teaches cessation.

original: nyon mongs pa dang / sdug bsngal dag ni kun 'byung dang sdug bsngal gyi bden pa ste /
analyzed: nyon mongs pa dang / sdug bsngal dag ni kun 'byung dang sdug bsngal gyi bden pa ste /
translated: The afflictions and suffering are the truth of origination and the truth of suffering.

original: bden pa gnas su gyur pa de dag la gnas te'o //
analyzed: bden pa gnas su gyur pa de dag la gnas te'o //
translated: One abides in those truths that have been made one‚Äôs own.

original: gang zhig bsgoms te zhes bya ba ni byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa rnams so //
analyzed: gang zhig bsgoms te zhes bya ba ni byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa rnams so //
translated: ‚ÄúOne who cultivates‚Äù refers to the factors of awakening.

original: sgo gang gis zhes bya ba ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum po dag gis so //
analyzed: sgo gang gis zhes bya ba ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum po dag gis so //
translated: ‚ÄúBy means of which door‚Äù refers to the three doors of liberation.

original: shes bya'i sgrib pa dag bya'i phyir //
analyzed: shes bya'i sgrib pa dag bya'i phyir //
translated: For the sake of purifying the obscurations to omniscience,

original: byang chub yan lag rnam gzhag go //
analyzed: byang chub yan lag rnam gzhag go //
translated: The factors of awakening are arranged.

original: rgyu bzhi pa yin te /

translated: The one called ‚Äúthorough analysis‚Äù is in terms of the meaning of non-conceptuality.

original: ting nge 'dzin gang la rnam par dbye ba shin tu rnam par dpyad pa yod pa de la snyoms par 'jug go zhes bya ba'i don te /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gang la rnam par dbye ba shin tu rnam par dpyad pa yod pa de la snyoms par 'jug go zhes bya ba'i don te /
translated: One enters into meditative stabilization in which there is thorough analysis of thorough investigation.

original: chos kyi dbyings dang / de'i rten gang la rnam par rtog pa med pa de dang rnam par rtog pa'i don las brtsams pa'o //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings dang / de'i rten gang la rnam par rtog pa med pa de dang rnam par rtog pa'i don las brtsams pa'o //
translated: The meaning of that is in terms of the dharmadhƒÅtu and the basis of that, which is non-conceptuality.

original: tshig gcig la don gyi khyad par du mar 'byed pa rnam par brtags pa ni don du mar mngon par brjod pa nyid de /
analyzed: tshig gcig la don gyi khyad par du mar 'byed pa rnam par brtags pa ni don du mar mngon par brjod pa nyid de /
translated: The analysis of a single word with many different meanings is the expression of many meanings.

original: khyad par gyi blo gros zhes gang gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: khyad par gyi blo gros zhes gang gsungs pa'o //
translated: This is what is called ‚Äúspecial intelligence.‚Äù

original: khyad par ni bye brag ste /
analyzed: khyad par ni bye brag ste /
translated: ‚ÄúSpecial‚Äù means ‚Äúparticular.‚Äù

original: de la blo gros sems pa yod pas zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de la blo gros sems pa yod pas zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning of ‚Äúthere is thought, there is intelligence‚Äù is that.

original: don gcig la rnam grangs du ma dag gis ston pa de las brtsams nas rab tu phye ba'i don gyi mdzod ces gsungs pa gang yin pa ste don gyi mdzod bzhi ni sgra'o /
analyzed: don gcig la rnam grangs du ma dag gis ston pa de las brtsams nas rab tu phye ba'i don gyi mdzod ces gsungs pa gang yin pa ste don gyi mdzod bzhi ni sgra'o /
translated: The treasury of meaning that is taught by means of many synonyms for a single meaning.

original: de las nyan pa po rnams kyis don 'dren cing sgrub par byed pas na 'di'i ngo bo du ma pa yin no zhes ston par byed do //
analyzed: de las nyan pa po rnams kyis don 'dren cing sgrub par byed pas na 'di'i ngo bo du ma pa yin no zhes ston par byed do //
translated: The listeners draw out and establish the meaning from that, and so it is said to be the many-faceted nature of the Dharma.

original: rig pa thams cad kyi gnas ni rgyu nyid de de shes pa'o //
analyzed: rig pa thams cad kyi gnas ni rgyu nyid de de shes pa'o //
translated: The basis of all knowledge is the cause, which is the knowledge of that.

original: rnam pa gcig tu de nyid shes pa yin te /
analyzed: rnam pa gcig tu de nyid shes pa yin te /
translated: In one sense, it is the knowledge of that itself.

original: don ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par 'byed pa zhes gsungs pa gang yin pa ste /
analyzed: don ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par 'byed pa zhes gsungs pa gang yin pa ste /
translated: It is said to be the discernment of the meaning as it is.

original: ting nge 'dzin gang la don ji lta ba bzhin phyin ci ma log par rab tu rnam par 'byed pa yod pa de la snyoms par 'jug go zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gang la don ji lta ba bzhin phyin ci ma log par rab tu rnam par 'byed pa yod pa de la snyoms par 'jug go zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that one enters into that meditative absorption in which the meaning is discerned just as it is, without error.

original: ting nge 'dzin gang rtsa ba shin tu gnas pas brtan pa yod pa ste /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gang rtsa ba shin tu gnas pas brtan pa yod pa ste /
translated: It is the meditative absorption that has a firm root.

original: ji lta zhe na /
analyzed: ji lta zhe na /
translated: How is that?

original: de bzhin nyid la dmigs pas rtsa ba brtan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de bzhin nyid la dmigs pas rtsa ba brtan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is stable, since it focuses on suchness.

original: tshig lhag ma bzhi ni sgrib pa rnam pa bzhi rnam par sbyong ba las rig par bya ste /
analyzed: tshig lhag ma bzhi ni sgrib pa rnam pa bzhi rnam par sbyong ba las rig par bya ste /
translated: The remaining four phrases should be understood as purifying the four types of obscurations.

original: ye shes dang mngon par shes @92b pa'i sgo ni rgyu ste sgo zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: ye shes dang mngon par shes @92b pa'i sgo ni rgyu ste sgo zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The gateway of knowledge and higher knowledge is the cause, the meaning of the word gateway.

original: ting nge 'dzin de la yang snyoms par 'jug go //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin de la yang snyoms par 'jug go //
translated: He enters into that meditative absorption.

original: de nyid kyi phyir ting nge 'dzin 'di ni yon tan khyad par can rnams la sgrib pa gang yin pa de rnam par sbyong bar byed do //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir ting nge 'dzin 'di ni yon tan khyad par can rnams la sgrib pa gang yin pa de rnam par sbyong bar byed do //
translated: Therefore, this meditative absorption purifies whatever obscures the special qualities.

original: ting nge 'dzin gang la chos kyi dbyings de bzhin nyid yongs su sbyong bar byed pa yod pa de la yang snyoms par 'jug ste /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gang la chos kyi dbyings de bzhin nyid yongs su sbyong bar byed pa yod pa de la yang snyoms par 'jug ste /
translated: He enters into that meditative absorption in which the realm of phenomena, suchness, is purified.

original: de nyid kyi phyir chags pa med pa'i ye shes la sgrib pa gang yin pa de rnam par sbyong bar byed do //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir chags pa med pa'i ye shes la sgrib pa gang yin pa de rnam par sbyong bar byed do //
translated: Therefore, it purifies whatever obscures the knowledge that is free from attachment.

original: ting nge 'dzin gang la de bzhin gshegs pa la phan yon rab tu brjod pa yod pa de la yang snyoms par 'jug ste /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gang la de bzhin gshegs pa la phan yon rab tu brjod pa yod pa de la yang snyoms par 'jug ste /
translated: He enters meditative stabilization in which the benefits of the Tathagata are fully explained.

original: de nyid kyi phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos zab pa dang / rgya che ba rnams yang dag par sgrub pa la zhum pa med pa yin no //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos zab pa dang / rgya che ba rnams yang dag par sgrub pa la zhum pa med pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, he is not discouraged in the accomplishment of the profound and vast qualities of the Buddha.

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba sna tshogs zhes bya ba ni theg pa gsum gyi bdag nyid kyi don sna tshogs kyi mdzod ston par byed pa ste /üîΩde bzhin du 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa gnyis kyi sgo /
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba sna tshogs zhes bya ba ni theg pa gsum gyi bdag nyid kyi don sna tshogs kyi mdzod ston par byed pa ste / de bzhin du 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa gnyis kyi sgo /
translated: The various roots of virtue are the various objects of the three vehicles.

original: sgo mo gang yin pa'i ting nge 'dzin de la yang snyoms par 'jug go //
analyzed: sgo mo gang yin pa'i ting nge 'dzin de la yang snyoms par 'jug go //
translated: He enters meditative stabilization which is the door to both cyclic existence and nirvana.

original: de nyid kyi phyir thabs dang shes rab bsgoms pa'i stobs kyis mi gnas pa'i lam la sgrib pa gang yin pa de'i gnyen po yang byed de /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir thabs dang shes rab bsgoms pa'i stobs kyis mi gnas pa'i lam la sgrib pa gang yin pa de'i gnyen po yang byed de /
translated: Therefore, by the power of cultivating method and wisdom, he also acts as the antidote to the obscurations to the non-abiding path.

original: thabs dang shes rab kyis yongs su sbyangs pa'i ting nge 'dzin de dag ces gsungs pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: thabs dang shes rab kyis yongs su sbyangs pa'i ting nge 'dzin de dag ces gsungs pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: Those concentrations that are purified by means of wisdom and skillful means.

original: snying rje'i stobs dang zhes bya ba ni snying brtse ba dang snying rje'i stobs kyis zhes gsungs pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: snying rje'i stobs dang zhes bya ba ni snying brtse ba dang snying rje'i stobs kyis zhes gsungs pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: The power of compassion is the power of love and compassion.

original: zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gi lam sgrub pa ni rtsol ba med par 'byung ba nyid kyis rnam par smin par gyur pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gi lam sgrub pa ni rtsol ba med par 'byung ba nyid kyis rnam par smin par gyur pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The path of serenity and insight is the path of serenity and insight.

original: mtshan ma med par mtshungs pa la //
analyzed: mtshan ma med par mtshungs pa la //
translated: In the equality of signlessness,

original: sems can kun gyi dbang gis na //
analyzed: sems can kun gyi dbang gis na //
translated: by the power of all beings,

original: las kyi bye brag dag gis yang //
analyzed: las kyi bye brag dag gis yang //
translated: by the distinctions of karma,

original: khyad par rab tu bstan pa yin //
analyzed: khyad par rab tu bstan pa yin //
translated: the distinctions are fully taught.

original: sbyor ba yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir //
analyzed: sbyor ba yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir //
translated: Because of the completion of application,üîΩthe seventh stage is purified,

original: sa bdun pa ni yongs sbyangs dang // snang ba dag gis snga ma yin //
analyzed: sa bdun pa ni yongs sbyangs dang // snang ba dag gis snga ma yin //
translated: and the first is by the light.

original: sa rnams la ni khyad zhugs te //
analyzed: sa rnams la ni khyad zhugs te //
translated: The stages have distinctions.

original: shin tu yongs su sbyangs pa mi skye ba'i chos la bzod par snang bar gyur pa zhes gsungs pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: shin tu yongs su sbyangs pa mi skye ba'i chos la bzod par snang bar gyur pa zhes gsungs pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: It is the acceptance of the non-arising of dharmas, which is the appearance of complete purification.

original: blo ldan sbyor ba mthar thug pa'i //
analyzed: blo ldan sbyor ba mthar thug pa'i //
translated: The wise one, having attained the culmination of practice,

original: yid la byed pa thob pa'i phyir //üîΩrang gi yul ni shes pa la //
analyzed: yid la byed pa thob pa'i phyir // rang gi yul ni shes pa la //
translated: attains the mental attentions.

original: gnas pa yin zhes mngon par brjod //
analyzed: gnas pa yin zhes mngon par brjod //
translated: It is said that he abides in the knowledge of his own object.

original: tshad med ces ni rab brjod na //
analyzed: tshad med ces ni rab brjod na //
translated: It is said to be immeasurable,

original: mang ba nyid du nges par 'dzin //üîΩmthu dag gi ni sgo nas kyang //üîΩtshad @93a * //
analyzed: mang ba nyid du nges par 'dzin // mthu dag gi ni sgo nas kyang // tshad @93a * //
translated: because it is definitely great.üîΩIt is also taught to be immeasurable

original: med ces ni yang dag bstan //
analyzed: med ces ni yang dag bstan //
translated: from the point of view of its power.

original: ji lta zhe na /
analyzed: ji lta zhe na /
translated: How is that?

original: sngon gyi las las khyad par du //
analyzed: sngon gyi las las khyad par du //
translated: It is said that it is attained by the karma of the past,

original: zab cing rnam par dben pa dang // rab tu rgyu ba med pa'i las //üîΩde yis thob pa yin zhes bshad //
analyzed: zab cing rnam par dben pa dang // rab tu rgyu ba med pa'i las // de yis thob pa yin zhes bshad //
translated: which is profound, isolated, and without activity.

original: ring du song phyir zab pa yin //
analyzed: ring du song phyir zab pa yin //
translated: It is profound because it has gone far.

original: nyon mongs spangs phyir dben pa yin //
analyzed: nyon mongs spangs phyir dben pa yin //
translated: It is isolated because it has abandoned the afflictions.

original: 'og ma'i sa la mi rgyu phyir ;
analyzed: 'og ma'i sa la mi rgyu phyir ;
translated: It is without activity because it does not move to lower levels.

original: / rgyu ba med ces bshad pa yin //
analyzed: / rgyu ba med ces bshad pa yin //
translated: It is said to be without activity.

original: yang dag mtha' la gnas gyur cing //
analyzed: yang dag mtha' la gnas gyur cing //
translated: It is the transformation of the basis,

original: 'gog pa mngon sum mi byed pa //üîΩgang yin 'di ni gnas pa yi //
analyzed: 'gog pa mngon sum mi byed pa // gang yin 'di ni gnas pa yi //
translated: The one who does not manifest cessation

original: khyad par du ni 'dod pa nyid /
analyzed: khyad par du ni 'dod pa nyid /
translated: is said to abide in the distinctive

original: snyoms par 'jug pas gnas pa yi //
analyzed: snyoms par 'jug pas gnas pa yi //
translated: aspiration for the cessation of the world.

original: khyad par rab tu bstan nas ni //
analyzed: khyad par rab tu bstan nas ni //
translated: Having taught the distinctive abidingüîΩin meditative concentration,

original: rgyu ba'i sbyor ba'i khyad par ni //
analyzed: rgyu ba'i sbyor ba'i khyad par ni //
translated: the distinctive application to movement

original: rnam pa brgyad dag yang bshad do //
analyzed: rnam pa brgyad dag yang bshad do //
translated: is explained in eight topics.

original: bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa'i sbyor ba ni 'khor ba'i sgo yang ston la zhes bya ba yin te /
analyzed: bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa'i sbyor ba ni 'khor ba'i sgo yang ston la zhes bya ba yin te /
translated: The application to the creation of merit is the display of the door of samsara,

original: 'di'i gnyen po ni 'di'i bsam pa mya ngan las 'das pa la gnas pa yang yin zhes bya ba yang yin no //
analyzed: 'di'i gnyen po ni 'di'i bsam pa mya ngan las 'das pa la gnas pa yang yin zhes bya ba yang yin no //
translated: and the antidote to that is the aspiration for nirvana.

original: de bzhin du 'og ma dag la yang tshig gnyis pa ni gnyen po 'dzin pa yin par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du 'og ma dag la yang tshig gnyis pa ni gnyen po 'dzin pa yin par shes par bya'o //
translated: In the same way, the second topic in the following lines should be understood as the antidote to the first.

original: phung po yongs su 'dzin pa'i sbyor ba ni 'khor mang pos kun nas bskor bar yang snang la zhes bya ba yin te /
analyzed: phung po yongs su 'dzin pa'i sbyor ba ni 'khor mang pos kun nas bskor bar yang snang la zhes bya ba yin te /
translated: The application to the possession of the aggregates is the appearance of the many retinues,

original: phung po ni phung po rnams so //
analyzed: phung po ni phung po rnams so //
translated: because the aggregates are the aggregates of the body.

original: de yongs su gzung ba'i sbyor ba ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: de yongs su gzung ba'i sbyor ba ni 'di yin te /
translated: This is the application to their possession.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is as follows:

original: mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa'i phyir 'khor mang po nyid do //
analyzed: mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa'i phyir 'khor mang po nyid do //
translated: It is a great retinue because it is endowed with the perfection of the major and minor marks.

original: smon lam gyi stobs kyis khams gsum par kun du skye ste /
analyzed: smon lam gyi stobs kyis khams gsum par kun du skye ste /
translated: It is born in the three realms by the power of vows.

original: de nyid kyi phyir bsams bzhin du srid pa yongs su 'dzin pa'i sbyor ba zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir bsams bzhin du srid pa yongs su 'dzin pa'i sbyor ba zhes bya ba'o //
translated: For that very reason, it is called the application of the deliberate assumption of existence.

original: thabs thabs kyis kyang rab tu 'bar te zhes bya ba ni bu la sogs pa kun du ston pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: thabs thabs kyis kyang rab tu 'bar te zhes bya ba ni bu la sogs pa kun du ston pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is also a great conflagration by means of skillful means, because it manifests as sons and so on.

original: de nyid kyi phyir 'di ni rigs kyi rgyud la sbyor ba yin te /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir 'di ni rigs kyi rgyud la sbyor ba yin te /
translated: For that very reason, it is the application in the family lineage,

original: sems can rnams theg pa gsum la dgod par bya ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sems can rnams theg pa gsum la dgod par bya ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is for the purpose of establishing sentient beings in the three vehicles.

original: ma bor ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la yang 'jug la nyan thos la sogs pa'i sa la brten nas kyang 'grub pa yin no //
analyzed: ma bor ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la yang 'jug la nyan thos la sogs pa'i sa la brten nas kyang 'grub pa yin no //
translated: It is also the entry into the knowledge of the Buddha, because it is not cast off, and it is also the establishment of the stage of the sravaka and so on.

original: de nyid kyi phyir 'di ni 'jug par byed pa'i sbyor ba yin te /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir 'di ni 'jug par byed pa'i sbyor ba yin te /
translated: For that very reason, it is the application of engagement,

original: de dag gis gdul bar bya ba rnams la de ltar kun du bstan pas theg pa gnyis la 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de dag gis gdul bar bya ba rnams la de ltar kun du bstan pas theg pa gnyis la 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because they demonstrate this to those who are to be trained, in order to introduce them to the two vehicles.

original: bdud kyi yul ni zas dang nyal ba dag yin te /
analyzed: bdud kyi yul ni zas dang nyal ba dag yin te /
translated: The domain of Mara is food and sleep.

original: de la gnas pa'o //
analyzed: de la gnas pa'o //
translated: One who is established in that is a bodhisattva.

original: de nyid kyi phyir 'di ni ston pa la sbyor ba yin te /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir 'di ni ston pa la sbyor ba yin te /
translated: Therefore, this is the application to the teacher,

original: de gnyis ni yul ston par byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de gnyis ni yul ston par byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because those two are the domain of the teacher.

original: bdud kyi spyod yul yang ston @93b pa yin no //
analyzed: bdud kyi spyod yul yang ston @93b pa yin no //
translated: The domain of Mara is also the domain of the teacher.

original: de nyid kyi phyir 'di ni 'chi 'pho'i sbyor ba yin te /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir 'di ni 'chi 'pho'i sbyor ba yin te /
translated: Therefore, this is the application to death,

original: na ba dang rga ba dang 'chi ba kun du bstan pas 'chi 'pho ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: na ba dang rga ba dang 'chi ba kun du bstan pas 'chi 'pho ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because one demonstrates illness, aging, and death in order to die.

original: mu stegs can gyi gnas thams cad du nye bar 'gro ba na skal ba mnyam par nye bar 'gro bas lta ba ngan pa bzlog pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: mu stegs can gyi gnas thams cad du nye bar 'gro ba na skal ba mnyam par nye bar 'gro bas lta ba ngan pa bzlog pa'i phyir te /
translated: One goes to all the abodes of the tirthikas, because one goes to the same place as they do, in order to turn them away from bad views.

original: de nyid kyi phyir 'di ni lta ba ngan pa la chags pa las rnam par bzlog pa'i sbyor ba yin no //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir 'di ni lta ba ngan pa la chags pa las rnam par bzlog pa'i sbyor ba yin no //
translated: Therefore, this is the application to turn them away from attachment to bad views.

original: 'jig rten gyi bya ba thams cad dang mthun par 'gro ba ni 'jig rten pa'i bzo'i gnas kyi lam la sogs pa mngon par bsgrub pas /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi bya ba thams cad dang mthun par 'gro ba ni 'jig rten pa'i bzo'i gnas kyi lam la sogs pa mngon par bsgrub pas /
translated: It is the path of the mundane crafts, etc.

original: sngar bshad pa'i gnod pa rnam pa bzhi rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: sngar bshad pa'i gnod pa rnam pa bzhi rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i phyir te /
translated: because it pacifies the four kinds of harm explained above.

original: de nyid kyi phyir 'di ni gnod pa las rnam par bzlog pa'i sbyor ba yin no //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir 'di ni gnod pa las rnam par bzlog pa'i sbyor ba yin no //
translated: Therefore, this is the application that wards off harm.

original: lha la sogs pa thams cad kyi lus gang dag yin pa de dag las lhag pa'i lus yongs su 'dzin pas rnam par bzlog pas sems can rnams mi dga' ba dang bral ba'i phyir te /
analyzed: lha la sogs pa thams cad kyi lus gang dag yin pa de dag las lhag pa'i lus yongs su 'dzin pas rnam par bzlog pas sems can rnams mi dga' ba dang bral ba'i phyir te /
translated: Because it wards off the bodies of all gods, etc.

original: de nyid kyi phyir 'di ni chags pa rnam par bzlog pa'i sbyor ba yin no //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir 'di ni chags pa rnam par bzlog pa'i sbyor ba yin no //
translated: Therefore, this is the application that wards off attachment.

original: de 'dzin pa'i mchog yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni bstan pa yang dag par 'dzin pa'i gtso bo yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de 'dzin pa'i mchog yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni bstan pa yang dag par 'dzin pa'i gtso bo yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is the supreme support.

original: sa 'di ni sems can la phan 'dogs pa dang chos kyi bzod pas rab tu phye bar rig par bya zhes bya ba ni mdo las ji skad 'byung ba bzhin no //
analyzed: sa 'di ni sems can la phan 'dogs pa dang chos kyi bzod pas rab tu phye bar rig par bya zhes bya ba ni mdo las ji skad 'byung ba bzhin no //
translated: This level is distinguished by the benefit for sentient beings and by the acceptance of the Dharma.

original: 'di yan chad mngon par 'du byed pa'i sbyor ba med bas na sbyor ba'i mthar phyin par 'gro ba'o //
analyzed: 'di yan chad mngon par 'du byed pa'i sbyor ba med bas na sbyor ba'i mthar phyin par 'gro ba'o //
translated: From here on, there is no more application of effort, so one proceeds to the end of application.

original: de nyid kyi phyir sbyor ba'i lam yongs su rdzogs pas dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams shin tu 'od gsal ba zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir sbyor ba'i lam yongs su rdzogs pas dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams shin tu 'od gsal ba zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Therefore, because the path of application is perfected, the roots of virtue are extremely bright.

original: nyi ma'i 'od kyi dpes ni zla ba'i 'od kyi dpes bstan pas snga ma'i ye shes pas 'di rgya che ba'i phyir khyad par bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: nyi ma'i 'od kyi dpes ni zla ba'i 'od kyi dpes bstan pas snga ma'i ye shes pas 'di rgya che ba'i phyir khyad par bstan pa yin no //
translated: The example of the light of the sun shows that this is superior to the previous wisdom by the example of the light of the moon, because it is more vast.

original: ji lta zhe na /
analyzed: ji lta zhe na /
translated: How so?

original: nyi ma'i 'od kyis de'i 'od zil gyis gnon pa mthong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nyi ma'i 'od kyis de'i 'od zil gyis gnon pa mthong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is seen that the light of the sun outshines that light.

original: tshogs shin tu bstsags pa zhes bya ba ni sa bdun po de dag nyid la tshogs shin tu rab tu bstsags pa'i phyir sbyor bas bsdus pa'i tshogs yongs su rdzogs par byed pa zhes smras pa gang yin pa ste /

translated: The thorough accumulation of the collections refers to the seven stages, because the collections are thoroughly and well accumulated there. It is said that the thorough training in the path is the completion of the collection subsumed by the path of preparation.

original: spyir bsdu ba ni de lta bu yin no //
analyzed: spyir bsdu ba ni de lta bu yin no //
translated: This is the general summary.

original: smon lam shin tu btab pa zhes //
analyzed: smon lam shin tu btab pa zhes //

original: bya ba la sogs rnams kyi tshig / lhag ma brgya po dag kho nas //
analyzed: bya ba la sogs rnams kyi tshig / lhag ma brgya po dag kho nas //

original: so so nas ni bsdu ba yin //
analyzed: so so nas ni bsdu ba yin //
translated: Each is a summary.

original: smon lam chen po shin tu btab pa zhes bya ba ni sa dang po bsdu ba mdzad pa yin no //
analyzed: smon lam chen po shin tu btab pa zhes bya ba ni sa dang po bsdu ba mdzad pa yin no //
translated: The thorough establishment of great prayers is the first stage.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis shin tu byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba ni sa gnyis pa ste //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis shin tu byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba ni sa gnyis pa ste //
translated: The thorough establishment by the empowerment of the Tathagata is the second stage.

original: de de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis theg pa dman pa bor te thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kho na la bsam pa ches brtan par byin gyis rlob par mdzad do //
analyzed: de de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis theg pa dman pa bor te thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kho na la bsam pa ches brtan par byin gyis rlob par mdzad do //
translated: The Tathagatas cause them to give up the Lesser Vehicle and to stabilize their intention for omniscience alone.

original: rang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i stobs bskyed pa rjes su thob pa zhes bya ba ni sa gsum pa ste /
analyzed: rang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i stobs bskyed pa rjes su thob pa zhes bya ba ni sa gsum pa ste /
translated: The third stage is called ‚Äúattained through the power of one‚Äôs own roots of virtue.‚Äù

original: ji lta zhe na /
analyzed: ji lta zhe na /
translated: How so?

original: 'dod chags dang bral ba las mi nyams pa'i bsam gtan la sogs pa thob pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'dod chags dang bral ba las mi nyams pa'i bsam gtan la sogs pa thob pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because one attains the meditative concentrations, etc., without falling back into the passionless state.

original: de bzhin @94b gshegs pa'i stobs la sogs pa yid la byed pa zhes bya ba ni sa bzhi pa ste /
analyzed: de bzhin @94b gshegs pa'i stobs la sogs pa yid la byed pa zhes bya ba ni sa bzhi pa ste /
translated: The fourth stage is called ‚Äúattention to the TathƒÅgata‚Äôs powers, etc.‚Äù

original: ji lta zhe na /
analyzed: ji lta zhe na /
translated: How so?

original: rnam par gzhag pa'i chos lung gi chos ji ltar rtogs pa bzhin du rnam par 'jog pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam par gzhag pa'i chos lung gi chos ji ltar rtogs pa bzhin du rnam par 'jog pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because one establishes the Dharma of the scriptures just as one has understood it.

original: de ni rtogs pa ston par byed de gnyi ga zhes bya ba ji lta ba bzhin du zhugs pa nyid kyis de dang mtshungs par rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ni rtogs pa ston par byed de gnyi ga zhes bya ba ji lta ba bzhin du zhugs pa nyid kyis de dang mtshungs par rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: That is taught in the realization, because one has entered into the two just as they are, i.e., because one realizes them in that way.

original: de'i phyir shes bya'i sgrib pa rnam par dag pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos 'thob pa'i rgyu ste /
analyzed: de'i phyir shes bya'i sgrib pa rnam par dag pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos 'thob pa'i rgyu ste /
translated: Therefore, the purification of the obscurations to knowledge is the cause for attaining the qualities of a Buddha.

original: de thob pa'i phyir de yid la byed pa dang ldan pa yin no //
analyzed: de thob pa'i phyir de yid la byed pa dang ldan pa yin no //
translated: Because of that attainment, he is endowed with mental attention to that.

original: lhag pa'i bsam pa'i brnag pa shin tu yongs su sbyangs pa zhes bya ba ni sa lnga pa ste /
analyzed: lhag pa'i bsam pa'i brnag pa shin tu yongs su sbyangs pa zhes bya ba ni sa lnga pa ste /
translated: The fifth stage is called Thoroughly Purifying the Commitment of Superior Intention.

original: ji lta zhe na /
analyzed: ji lta zhe na /
translated: How so?

original: rnam par dag pa la sems kyi bsam pa mnyam pa nyid ji skad bshad pa dag gis lhag pa'i bsam pa'i brnag pa shin tu yongs su sbyangs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam par dag pa la sems kyi bsam pa mnyam pa nyid ji skad bshad pa dag gis lhag pa'i bsam pa'i brnag pa shin tu yongs su sbyangs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because of the purification of the equality of mental intention in the way explained above, the commitment of superior intention is thoroughly purified.

original: bsod nams dang ye shes kyi stobs kyis mngon par 'phags pa zhes bya ba ni sa drug pa ste /
analyzed: bsod nams dang ye shes kyi stobs kyis mngon par 'phags pa zhes bya ba ni sa drug pa ste /
translated: The sixth stage is called Exalted by the Power of Merit and Intuition.

original: ji lta zhe na /
analyzed: ji lta zhe na /
translated: How so?

original: rim bzhin du snying rje chen pos ni bsod nams kyi stobs kyis mngon par 'phags pa nyid do //
analyzed: rim bzhin du snying rje chen pos ni bsod nams kyi stobs kyis mngon par 'phags pa nyid do //
translated: Because of great compassion, it is exalted by the power of merit.

original: rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba rnam par dpyod pas ni ye shes kyi stobs kyis mngon par 'phags pa nyid do //
analyzed: rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba rnam par dpyod pas ni ye shes kyi stobs kyis mngon par 'phags pa nyid do //
translated: By analyzing dependent origination, one is exalted by the power of wisdom.

original: snying rje dang byams pa chen po dag gis sems can thams cad la sbyor ba mi gtong ba ye shes kyi lam tshad med pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni sa bdun pa bsdu ba yin te /
analyzed: snying rje dang byams pa chen po dag gis sems can thams cad la sbyor ba mi gtong ba ye shes kyi lam tshad med pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni sa bdun pa bsdu ba yin te /
translated: The seventh stage is summarized by the line, never abandoning the application to all beings through great compassion and love, possessing the immeasurable path of wisdom.

original: ji lta zhe na //
analyzed: ji lta zhe na //
translated: How is this so?

original: rim bzhin du lam gzhan rtsom pa'i khyad par rnams kyis ni sems can thams cad la sbyor ba mi gtong ba nyid la /
analyzed: rim bzhin du lam gzhan rtsom pa'i khyad par rnams kyis ni sems can thams cad la sbyor ba mi gtong ba nyid la /
translated: By the distinctions of beginning the other paths in order, one never abandons the application to all beings.

original: sems can gyi khams tshad med pa la sogs pa la 'jug pa rnams kyis ni ye shes kyi lam tshad med pa dang ldan pa nyid du rig par bya ste ;
analyzed: sems can gyi khams tshad med pa la sogs pa la 'jug pa rnams kyis ni ye shes kyi lam tshad med pa dang ldan pa nyid du rig par bya ste ;

analyzed: 'dir bsdu ba ni tshig gnyis kyis bstan pa yin no //
