analyzed: 'on kyang 'di dag snga nas rnam par gnas pa kho na'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: and the stages of distinction are three.üîΩThe stages

original: mtshan nyid yod pa de'i gnyen por mtshan nyid med pa nyid ces bya ba ste /
analyzed: mtshan nyid yod pa de'i gnyen por mtshan nyid med pa nyid ces bya ba ste /
translated: The antidote to the existence of characteristics is the absence of characteristics.

original: gang gis 'di dag mtshon par 'gyur ba'i mtshan nyid de dag med do //
analyzed: gang gis 'di dag mtshon par 'gyur ba'i mtshan nyid de dag med do //
translated: The characteristics by which these are characterized do not exist.

original: phyi ma'i mthar yod pa de'i gnyen por byung ba med pa nyid ces bya ba ste /
analyzed: phyi ma'i mthar yod pa de'i gnyen por byung ba med pa nyid ces bya ba ste /
translated: The antidote to existence in the future is the absence of origination.

original: byung ba ni phyi ma'i mthar yod pa yin gyi ma byung ba ni ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: byung ba ni phyi ma'i mthar yod pa yin gyi ma byung ba ni ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Origination exists in the future, but not non-origination.

original: rnam par byang ba'i phyogs la ni de lta bu yin no //
analyzed: rnam par byang ba'i phyogs la ni de lta bu yin no //
translated: This is the case for the factors of purification.

original: kun nas nyon mongs pa'i phyogs la sngon gyi mtha' na yod pa de'i gnyen por 'jig pa med pa nyid ces bya ba ste /
analyzed: kun nas nyon mongs pa'i phyogs la sngon gyi mtha' na yod pa de'i gnyen por 'jig pa med pa nyid ces bya ba ste /
translated: The antidote to existence at the prior limit in the sphere of affliction is the absence of destruction.

original: byung ba ni gdon mi za bar 'jig gi ma byung ba ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: byung ba ni gdon mi za bar 'jig gi ma byung ba ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: It is said that what has originated will certainly be destroyed, but not what has not originated.

original: rdzogs pa yod pa de'i gnyen por thug pa med pa nyid ces bya ba ste /
analyzed: rdzogs pa yod pa de'i gnyen por thug pa med pa nyid ces bya ba ste /
translated: The antidote to existence in completion is the absence of termination.

original: thug pa ni rdzogs pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: thug pa ni rdzogs pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because termination is completion.

original: rnam par byang ba la kun nas nyon mongs pa nyid yod pa gang yin pa de'i gnyen por 'jug pa med pa nyid ces bya ba ste /
analyzed: rnam par byang ba la kun nas nyon mongs pa nyid yod pa gang yin pa de'i gnyen por 'jug pa med pa nyid ces bya ba ste /
translated: The antidote to the existence of the defilement of purification is the absence of engagement.

original: 'jug pa ni kun nas nyon mongs par 'gyur gyi mi 'jug pa ni ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'jug pa ni kun nas nyon mongs par 'gyur gyi mi 'jug pa ni ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because engagement is the defilement, but non-engagement is not.

original: rang bzhin kho nas skye ba med //
analyzed: rang bzhin kho nas skye ba med //
translated: It is non-production by intrinsic nature.

original: chos la bdag med ces bya ba //
analyzed: chos la bdag med ces bya ba //
translated: It is the selflessness of dharmas.

original: bdag med ngo bo nyid kyi phyir //
analyzed: bdag med ngo bo nyid kyi phyir //
translated: Because of the nature of selflessness.

original: dngos po med pa zhes bya ba //
analyzed: dngos po med pa zhes bya ba //
translated: It is the characteristic of non-existence.

original: rang bzhin gyis skye ba med pa yin no //
analyzed: rang bzhin gyis skye ba med pa yin no //
translated: It is non-production by intrinsic nature.

original: gnyis med pa'i mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni gnyis po med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gnyis med pa'i mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni gnyis po med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because of the characteristic of non-duality.

original: dngos po'i mtshan nyid kyang ma yin la /
analyzed: dngos po'i mtshan nyid kyang ma yin la /
translated: It is not the characteristic of an existent.üîΩBecause of the existence of non-duality.

original: gnyis po med pa yod pa'i phyir dngos po med pa'i mtshan nyid kyang ma yin pa ste /
analyzed: gnyis po med pa yod pa'i phyir dngos po med pa'i mtshan nyid kyang ma yin pa ste /
translated: It is not the characteristic of a non-existent.üîΩBecause of the nature of non-existence.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid ces gsungs pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid ces gsungs pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: This is what is referred to as the nature of non-existence.

original: kun nas nyon mongs rnam byang dag /'phel 'bri med pa'i ngo bo yis //
analyzed: kun nas nyon mongs rnam byang dag /'phel 'bri med pa'i ngo bo yis //
translated: The reality of the non-increase and non-decrease of the pure and the defiled,

original: dus gsum du ni mnyam pa nyid //
analyzed: dus gsum du ni mnyam pa nyid //
translated: is the same in the three times.

original: de la grangs kyi bye brag med //
analyzed: de la grangs kyi bye brag med //
translated: There is no difference in number.

original: 'di ni grangs kyi bye brag mi skye ba ste /
analyzed: 'di ni grangs kyi bye brag mi skye ba ste /
translated: This is the non-production of difference in number.

original: thog ma dang dbus dang tha ma mnyam pa nyid ces 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: thog ma dang dbus dang tha ma mnyam pa nyid ces 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is said, ‚ÄúThe sameness of the beginning, middle, and end.‚Äù

original: las rnams kyi ni bye brag gang //
analyzed: las rnams kyi ni bye brag gang //
translated: What is the difference in karma?

original: rnam pa mang por yongs brtags pa //
analyzed: rnam pa mang por yongs brtags pa //
translated: It is thoroughly imagined in many ways.

original: de bzhin nyid dang mnyam mthong phyir //
analyzed: de bzhin nyid dang mnyam mthong phyir //
translated: Because of seeing the sameness of reality,

original: de yi bye brag ma skyes pa //
analyzed: de yi bye brag ma skyes pa //
translated: its difference is not produced.

original: las kyi bye brag mi skye ste //
analyzed: las kyi bye brag mi skye ste //
translated: The difference in karma is not produced.

original: de bzhin nyid ltar thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes @95b rnam par mi rtog pa rtogs par bya ba nyid las brtsams nas 'jug go zhes gsungs pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin nyid ltar thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes @95b rnam par mi rtog pa rtogs par bya ba nyid las brtsams nas 'jug go zhes gsungs pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: It is said that one enters into the realization of the non-discriminating knowledge of the Omniscient One, just as it is in reality.

original: de ltar na mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa ni mi skye ba rnam pa bzhi la 'jug pa yin no //
analyzed: de ltar na mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa ni mi skye ba rnam pa bzhi la 'jug pa yin no //
translated: Thus, the acceptance of the non-production of dharmas is the entry into the four kinds of non-production.

original: bzod pa'i dmigs pa rab brtan nas //
analyzed: bzod pa'i dmigs pa rab brtan nas //
translated: The object of acceptance is well-established.

original: rnam par rtog pa'i 'du shes dang // bral bas 'jug par rab tu ston //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa'i 'du shes dang // bral bas 'jug par rab tu ston //
translated: He shows the entry into the non-conceptual state,

original: 'dir rnam par smin pa ni sems so //
analyzed: 'dir rnam par smin pa ni sems so //
translated: Here, the mind is the result of evolution.

original: rlom sems ni yid do //
analyzed: rlom sems ni yid do //
translated: The intellect is the conceiver.

original: yul rnam par rig pa ni rnam par shes pa ste //
analyzed: yul rnam par rig pa ni rnam par shes pa ste //
translated: Consciousness is the perception of objects.

original: de dag gis bsdus pa dag go //
analyzed: de dag gis bsdus pa dag go //
translated: They are included in those.

original: sems dang yid dang rnam par shes pa de dag dang zhes bya ba'i tha tshig ste /
analyzed: sems dang yid dang rnam par shes pa de dag dang zhes bya ba'i tha tshig ste /
translated: The meaning is: the mind, the intellect, and consciousness.

original: de thams cad du sems dang yid dang rnam par shes pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i 'du shes dang bral ba zhes gsungs pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: de thams cad du sems dang yid dang rnam par shes pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i 'du shes dang bral ba zhes gsungs pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: It is said that ‚Äúhe is free from the discriminations of the conceptualizations of mind, intellect, and consciousness.‚Äù

original: rnam par rtog pa dang bral ba zhes brjod par bya ba yin pa la 'du shes smos pa ni 'du shes khyad par can shes par bya ba'i phyir te /
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa dang bral ba zhes brjod par bya ba yin pa la 'du shes smos pa ni 'du shes khyad par can shes par bya ba'i phyir te /
translated: It should be said that he is free from conceptualization, but he is said to be free from discrimination in order to show a special discrimination.

original: 'di la mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi 'du shes dang bral ba'i phyir gzhan ni yod do zhes 'du shes gzhan brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: 'di la mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi 'du shes dang bral ba'i phyir gzhan ni yod do zhes 'du shes gzhan brjod pa yin no //
translated: He is said to have another discrimination, because he is free from the discrimination of the counteragent.

original: thogs pa med pa zhes bya ba la thogs pa ni rtsol ba'o //
analyzed: thogs pa med pa zhes bya ba la thogs pa ni rtsol ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúUnimpeded‚Äù means without effort.

original: de med pa'i phyir lhun gyis grub par rgyu ba'o //
analyzed: de med pa'i phyir lhun gyis grub par rgyu ba'o //
translated: Since it is without that, it moves spontaneously.

original: nam mkha' 'dra zhes bya ba ni khyab pas so //üîΩbla gab med pa'i rang bzhin du zhugs pas zhes bya ba ni de bzhin nyid du zhugs pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: nam mkha' 'dra zhes bya ba ni khyab pas so // bla gab med pa'i rang bzhin du zhugs pas zhes bya ba ni de bzhin nyid du zhugs pa'i phyir te /
translated: ‚ÄúLike space‚Äù means it is all-pervading.

original: de bzhin nyid ni sgrib pa med pa nyid kyis bla gab med pa yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin nyid ni sgrib pa med pa nyid kyis bla gab med pa yin no //
translated: ‚ÄúIt enters into the nature of the open sky‚Äù means it enters into reality because reality is the open sky, being without obscuration.

original: zab mo thob phyir khyad par du //
analyzed: zab mo thob phyir khyad par du //
translated: It is distinguished by the attainment of the profound.

original: 'phags pa'i gnas pa thob pa ste //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i gnas pa thob pa ste //
translated: It is the attainment of the noble stations.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i gnas pa zab mo rjes su thob pa yin no zhes gsungs pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i gnas pa zab mo rjes su thob pa yin no zhes gsungs pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: It is the attainment of the bodhisattva‚Äôs profound station.

original: de'i zab pa nyid ni mdo las 'byung ba'i sgo nas rnam pa bdun du shes par bya ste //
analyzed: de'i zab pa nyid ni mdo las 'byung ba'i sgo nas rnam pa bdun du shes par bya ste //
translated: Its profundity should be understood in seven ways, as stated in the sutra.

original: ring ba'i ye shes tha mi dad //
analyzed: ring ba'i ye shes tha mi dad //
translated: It is not differentiated in its distant knowledge.

original: de bzhin mtshan ma bral ba dang // tshad med pa dang mi 'phrogs dang // nyes pa spangs phyir dben pa dang // gnyen po la ni mngon phyogs phyir //
analyzed: de bzhin mtshan ma bral ba dang // tshad med pa dang mi 'phrogs dang // nyes pa spangs phyir dben pa dang // gnyen po la ni mngon phyogs phyir //
translated: isolated from faults, and oriented toward the antidote.

original: dben pa mngon du gyur pa'o //
analyzed: dben pa mngon du gyur pa'o //
translated: It is the actualization of isolation.

original: ring ba'i ye shes ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: ring ba'i ye shes ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: How is it distant?

original: mngon par 'du byed pa dang bcas pa'i sa bzlog pas rtogs par bya ba yin pa'i phyir 'jug pa zab pa nyid kyis ring ba yin no //
analyzed: mngon par 'du byed pa dang bcas pa'i sa bzlog pas rtogs par bya ba yin pa'i phyir 'jug pa zab pa nyid kyis ring ba yin no //
translated: It is distant because of the profundity of its activity, since it is to be realized by the reversal of the stage of the one who is still forming the resolve.

original: tha mi dad pa ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: tha mi dad pa ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: How is it nondifferent?

original: byang chub sems dpa' sa dag pa pa rnams dang / thun mong ba'i zab pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sa dag pa pa rnams dang / thun mong ba'i zab pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because of the profundity that is common to the pure stages of the bodhisattva.

original: yul zab pa nyid ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: yul zab pa nyid ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: How is it the profundity of its object?

original: gzung ba dang 'dzin par snang ba med par gyur bas de bzhin @96a * //
analyzed: gzung ba dang 'dzin par snang ba med par gyur bas de bzhin @96a * //
translated: It is suchness, since it is the nonappearance of the subject-object dichotomy.

original: nyid la bya ste /
analyzed: nyid la bya ste /
translated: This is the profundity of the object.

original: mtshan ma thams cad dang bral ba zhes gsungs pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: mtshan ma thams cad dang bral ba zhes gsungs pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: It is the profundity of the object, since it is the suchness that is the nonappearance of the subject-object dichotomy.

original: de nyid 'du shes kyi 'dzin pa ngan pa thams cad las phyir bzlog pa yin te /
analyzed: de nyid 'du shes kyi 'dzin pa ngan pa thams cad las phyir bzlog pa yin te /
translated: That is the reversal of all bad grasping of the discriminations.

original: mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi 'du shes dgag pa'i phyir 'dzin pa ngan pa smos so //
analyzed: mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi 'du shes dgag pa'i phyir 'dzin pa ngan pa smos so //
translated: The bad grasping is mentioned in order to stop the discrimination of the adverse side.

original: tshad med pa ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: tshad med pa ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: How is it immeasurable?

original: bdag dang gzhan gyi don la zhugs pas sgrub pa zab pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: bdag dang gzhan gyi don la zhugs pas sgrub pa zab pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: It is the profound accomplishment of the engagement for the sake of self and other.

original: mi 'phrogs pa ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: mi 'phrogs pa ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: How is it unassailable?

original: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis mi 'phrogs pa'i phyir zil gyis mi gnon pa zab pa nyid do //
analyzed: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis mi 'phrogs pa'i phyir zil gyis mi gnon pa zab pa nyid do //
translated: It is the profound non-subjugation, because it cannot be subjugated by any of the Sravakas and Pratyekabuddhas.

original: dben pa ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs bsrabs pa zab pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: dben pa ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs bsrabs pa zab pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: It is the profound thinning out of the adverse side.

original: thams cad las dben pa mngon du gyur pa ni gnyen po la mngon du phyogs pa zab pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: thams cad las dben pa mngon du gyur pa ni gnyen po la mngon du phyogs pa zab pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: It is the profound orientation toward the antidote, because it is the actualization of the isolation from everything.

original: ji lta zhe na /
analyzed: ji lta zhe na /
translated: How is that?

original: de bzhin nyid ni thams cad las dben pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de bzhin nyid ni thams cad las dben pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because suchness is isolated from everything.

original: de ltar na mdo las ji skad 'byung ba'i sgo nas gnas pa zab mo nyid rnam pa bdun no //
analyzed: de ltar na mdo las ji skad 'byung ba'i sgo nas gnas pa zab mo nyid rnam pa bdun no //
translated: Thus, the profound abiding reality is sevenfold, as it is described in the sutra.

original: g-yo ba dang rlom sems thams cad dang bral ba yin no zhes bya ba ni de dag gi gnas sems yid kyi rnam par shes pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: g-yo ba dang rlom sems thams cad dang bral ba yin no zhes bya ba ni de dag gi gnas sems yid kyi rnam par shes pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is free from all movement and conceit means that the mind which is the abode of those two, the mental consciousness, does not exist.

original: 'bad pa dang bcas pa mngon par 'du byed pa dang bcas pa'i lam las yang dag par 'das pa'i phyir 'bad pa thams cad dang bral te zhes bya ste /
analyzed: 'bad pa dang bcas pa mngon par 'du byed pa dang bcas pa'i lam las yang dag par 'das pa'i phyir 'bad pa thams cad dang bral te zhes bya ste /
translated: It is free from all effort means that it transcends the path that is accompanied by exertion and accompanied by formation.

original: ji skad du mdo las 'byung ba bzhin no //
analyzed: ji skad du mdo las 'byung ba bzhin no //
translated: This is as it appears in the sutra.

original: lhun gyis grub pa'i chos nyid thob pa ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: lhun gyis grub pa'i chos nyid thob pa ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: How does one attain the reality that is spontaneously present?

original: rtsol ba de'i gnyen po thob pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rtsol ba de'i gnyen po thob pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because one attains the antidote to that exertion.

original: da ni lhun gyis grub cing rtsol ba med pa nyid kyis lhun gyis grub pa'i chos nyid thob pa de ston par byed do //
analyzed: da ni lhun gyis grub cing rtsol ba med pa nyid kyis lhun gyis grub pa'i chos nyid thob pa de ston par byed do //
translated: Now, it is shown that one who has attained the reality that is spontaneously present through spontaneous presence and effortless activity.

original: lhun gyis grub pa nyid rtsol ba med pa yin te /
analyzed: lhun gyis grub pa nyid rtsol ba med pa yin te /
translated: Spontaneous presence is effortless.

original: lus dang ngag dang sems kyi rtsol ba dang bral nas zhes 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: lus dang ngag dang sems kyi rtsol ba dang bral nas zhes 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is said that ‚Äúit is free from the exertion of body, speech, and mind.‚ÄùüîΩ

original: rnam par smin pa la gnas pa nyid kyis ni /
analyzed: rnam par smin pa la gnas pa nyid kyis ni /
translated: Abiding in karmic maturation means

original: mdo las ji skad du 'byung ba bzhin te /
analyzed: mdo las ji skad du 'byung ba bzhin te /
translated: as it is said in the sutra.

original: rnam par smin pa kun gzhi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de la shin tu gnas pa'i phyir /
analyzed: rnam par smin pa kun gzhi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de la shin tu gnas pa'i phyir /
translated: Because it abides in the suchness of the karmic maturation of the foundation consciousness,

original: rnam par smin pa la gnas pa nyid do //
analyzed: rnam par smin pa la gnas pa nyid do //
translated: it is called abiding in karmic maturation.

original: dper na gnyid kyis log pa las sad pa la 'du shes yod pa de bzhin du gnas pa de la yang snyoms par 'jug pa las bzlog pa'i 'du shes yod do //
analyzed: dper na gnyid kyis log pa las sad pa la 'du shes yod pa de bzhin du gnas pa de la yang snyoms par 'jug pa las bzlog pa'i 'du shes yod do //
translated: Just as when one awakens from sleep, one has discernment, so too, when one arises from meditative attainment, one has discernment that is the opposite of that meditative attainment.

original: bzlog pa 'di gang zhig yin zhe na /
analyzed: bzlog pa 'di gang zhig yin zhe na /
translated: What is this opposite?

original: zhi ba nyid la gnas pa la //
analyzed: zhi ba nyid la gnas pa la //
translated: Abiding in peace,

original: 'du shes yod du zin kyang ni //
analyzed: 'du shes yod du zin kyang ni //
translated: even though one has discernment,

original: yang dag shes pa'i dbang gis ni //
analyzed: yang dag shes pa'i dbang gis ni //
translated: due to the power of right knowledge,

original: mtshan ma rnams ni 'jig phyir ro //
analyzed: mtshan ma rnams ni 'jig phyir ro //
translated: signs are destroyed.

original: kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di lta ste /
analyzed: kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di lta ste /
translated: O children of the Victor, it is like this.

original: @96b dper na mi zhig gnyid kyis log pa'i rmi lam na zhes bya ba nas bzung ste /
analyzed: @96b dper na mi zhig gnyid kyis log pa'i rmi lam na zhes bya ba nas bzung ste /
translated: ‚ÄúA person who is asleep in a dream...

original: 'bad pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur te zhes bya ba'i bar 'byung ba'i phyir te /
analyzed: 'bad pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur te zhes bya ba'i bar 'byung ba'i phyir te /
translated: ...will be free from all effort.‚Äù

original: de kho na nyid kyi ye shes khyad bar du 'phags pa dang ldan pa'i phyir 'bad pa thams cad dang bral ba yin no //
analyzed: de kho na nyid kyi ye shes khyad bar du 'phags pa dang ldan pa'i phyir 'bad pa thams cad dang bral ba yin no //
translated: Because it possesses the special exalted wisdom of reality, it is free from all effort.

original: rnam par dag pa'i dbang du byas nas /üîΩ'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa gnyis su kun du spyod pa snang bar mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: rnam par dag pa'i dbang du byas nas / 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa gnyis su kun du spyod pa snang bar mi 'gyur te /
translated: In terms of purity,üîΩit says:üîΩ‚ÄúThe conduct of both cyclic existence and nirvana will not appear.‚Äù

original: de'i gnyis su kun du spyod pa thams cad kyi thams cad du snang bar mi 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: de'i gnyis su kun du spyod pa thams cad kyi thams cad du snang bar mi 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: All conduct of both will not appear at all.üîΩIn terms of the enjoyment of objects, it says:

original: yul la yongs su spyod pa'i dbang du byas nas mtshan ma kun du spyod pa snang bar mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: yul la yongs su spyod pa'i dbang du byas nas mtshan ma kun du spyod pa snang bar mi 'gyur te /
translated: ‚ÄúThe conduct of signs will not appear.‚Äù

original: mtshan ma kun du spyod pa thams cad du mi snang bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: mtshan ma kun du spyod pa thams cad du mi snang bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: All conduct of signs will not appear.

original: tshangs pa'i 'jig rten skye ba dang // 'dra ba'i dpe ni gang yin pa //üîΩde ni 'og ma'i sa pa yi //
analyzed: tshangs pa'i 'jig rten skye ba dang // 'dra ba'i dpe ni gang yin pa // de ni 'og ma'i sa pa yi //
translated: The example of birth in the Brahma worldüîΩis that of the one who is far removed

original: kun nas nyon mongs ring gyur 'dod //
analyzed: kun nas nyon mongs ring gyur 'dod //
translated: from the afflictions of the lower level.

original: de la 'jug pa'i phyogs la ni //
analyzed: de la 'jug pa'i phyogs la ni //
translated: In the context of engagement,

original: sems la sogs pa'i kun du 'byung ba med pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: sems la sogs pa'i kun du 'byung ba med pa'i phyir te /
translated: there is no occurrence of mind and so on,

original: sems dang yid dang rnam par shes pa'i kun du 'byung ba yang kun du mi 'byung ste zhes 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sems dang yid dang rnam par shes pa'i kun du 'byung ba yang kun du mi 'byung ste zhes 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it says, ‚ÄúThe occurrence of mind, mentation, and consciousness also does not occur.‚Äù

original: ldog pa'i phyogs la ni sangs rgyas la sogs pa la kun du 'byung ba med pa ste /
analyzed: ldog pa'i phyogs la ni sangs rgyas la sogs pa la kun du 'byung ba med pa ste /
translated: In the context of turning away, there is no occurrence in buddhas and so on,

original: sangs rgyas la kun du 'byung ba'am zhes bya ba nas bzung ste /
analyzed: sangs rgyas la kun du 'byung ba'am zhes bya ba nas bzung ste /
translated: because it says, ‚ÄúThe occurrence of a buddha‚Äù and so on,

original: rgyun du zhugs pa la kun du 'byung ba thams cad kyang kun du mi 'byung na zhes bya ba'i bar 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa la kun du 'byung ba thams cad kyang kun du mi 'byung na zhes bya ba'i bar 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: up to ‚ÄúIf all occurrences do not occur in a stream enterer.‚Äù

original: de la theg pa chen po'i bye brag gis ni sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang byang chub kyi yan lag la kun du 'byung ba rnams so //
analyzed: de la theg pa chen po'i bye brag gis ni sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang byang chub kyi yan lag la kun du 'byung ba rnams so //
translated: The specific divisions of the Great Vehicle are the perfections of the Buddhas and Bodhisattvas and the perfections of the branches of enlightenment.

original: nyan thos kyi theg pa'i bye brag gis ni mya ngan las 'das pa dang / nyan thos la sogs pa la kun du 'byung ba'o //
analyzed: nyan thos kyi theg pa'i bye brag gis ni mya ngan las 'das pa dang / nyan thos la sogs pa la kun du 'byung ba'o //
translated: The specific divisions of the Disciples' Vehicle are the perfections of Nirvana and the perfections of the Disciples, etc.

original: theg pa chen po la yang gang zag gi bye brag gis ni sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' la kun du 'byung ba dag go //
analyzed: theg pa chen po la yang gang zag gi bye brag gis ni sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' la kun du 'byung ba dag go //
translated: In the Great Vehicle, the specific divisions of persons are the perfections of the Buddhas and Bodhisattvas.

original: chos kyi bye brag gis ni byang chub la kun du 'byung ba'o //üîΩnyan thos kyi theg pa la yang mi slob pa dang / smon pa'i bye brag dang chos kyi bye brag gis mya ngan las 'das pa la kun du 'byung ba ste /
analyzed: chos kyi bye brag gis ni byang chub la kun du 'byung ba'o // nyan thos kyi theg pa la yang mi slob pa dang / smon pa'i bye brag dang chos kyi bye brag gis mya ngan las 'das pa la kun du 'byung ba ste /
translated: The specific divisions of teachings are the perfections of enlightenment.üîΩIn the Disciples' Vehicle, the specific divisions of persons are the perfections of the Arhats, etc.

original: mi slob pa'i bye brag gis ni dgra bcom pa la kun du 'byung ba'o //
analyzed: mi slob pa'i bye brag gis ni dgra bcom pa la kun du 'byung ba'o //
translated: The specific divisions of teachings are the perfections of Nirvana.

original: slob pa'i bye brag gis ni phyir mi 'ong ba la sogs pa la kun du 'byung ba'o //
analyzed: slob pa'i bye brag gis ni phyir mi 'ong ba la sogs pa la kun du 'byung ba'o //
translated: The Buddha, in the state of a Bodhisattva, has been the cause of the attainment of the fruit of the path of the Arhat, etc.

original: de yi 'og tu gnas skabs @97a * //
analyzed: de yi 'og tu gnas skabs @97a * //
translated: After that, in that state,

original: der // kun mkhyen thugs rje'i bdag nyid rnams //üîΩdang por de bzhin gshegs pa yi //
analyzed: der // kun mkhyen thugs rje'i bdag nyid rnams // dang por de bzhin gshegs pa yi //
translated: the Omniscient Ones, whose nature is compassion,üîΩfirst of all,

original: ye shes nye bar sgrub mdzad nas //
analyzed: ye shes nye bar sgrub mdzad nas //
translated: having established the knowledge of the Tathagata,

original: ci zhig mdzad ce na /
analyzed: ci zhig mdzad ce na /
translated: what do they do?

original: sems can la ni byams mdzad nas //üîΩgnas pa tsam la mngon dga' ba //
analyzed: sems can la ni byams mdzad nas // gnas pa tsam la mngon dga' ba //
translated: Having generated love for sentient beings,üîΩthey turn away from the difficulty of turning away

original: bzlog par dka' ba bzlog mdzad de //
analyzed: bzlog par dka' ba bzlog mdzad de //
translated: those who delight in mere abiding.üîΩHere, they praise what has been done,üîΩthey exhort what has not been done,

original: 'di la byas pa bsngags pa dang // ma byas pa la bskul ba dang // de la gnas pa mi 'dor bas //üîΩsangs rgyas chos rnams ma thob pa //
analyzed: 'di la byas pa bsngags pa dang // ma byas pa la bskul ba dang // de la gnas pa mi 'dor bas // sangs rgyas chos rnams ma thob pa //
translated: and they do not abandon those who abide in that.üîΩHaving gained power over those who have not attained

original: nus pa nyid kyi dbang mdzad nas //
analyzed: nus pa nyid kyi dbang mdzad nas //
translated: the qualities of the Buddha,

original: yang dang yang rgyu sna tshogs kyis //
analyzed: yang dang yang rgyu sna tshogs kyis //
translated: again and again, by various means,

original: zhi ba'i dbyings ni de dag las //üîΩrnam par bskyod nas sems can gyi ;
analyzed: zhi ba'i dbyings ni de dag las // rnam par bskyod nas sems can gyi ;
translated: from that peaceful realm,üîΩhaving shaken them,

original: / don spyad dag la sbyor bar mdzad //
analyzed: / don spyad dag la sbyor bar mdzad //
translated: they engage in the practice of benefiting sentient beings.

original: chos kyi sgo'i rgyun de la gnas pas /
analyzed: chos kyi sgo'i rgyun de la gnas pas /
translated: Abiding in that stream of the door of Dharma,

original: mngon par dga' ba gang yin pa de tsam gyis chog par 'dzin pa de bzlog par mdzad do //
analyzed: mngon par dga' ba gang yin pa de tsam gyis chog par 'dzin pa de bzlog par mdzad do //
translated: He turns them away from the mere satisfaction of being pleased.

original: ji lta zhe na /
analyzed: ji lta zhe na /
translated: How does he do that?

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes nye bar bsgrubs pas te //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes nye bar bsgrubs pas te //
translated: By bringing them near to the knowledge of a Tathagata.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes nye bar sgrub pa mdzad de zhes gsungs pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes nye bar sgrub pa mdzad de zhes gsungs pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: He brings them near to the knowledge of a Tathagata.

original: byas pa bsngags pa ni legs so legs so zhes bya ba la sogs pa byas pa bsngags par mdzad pa ste /
analyzed: byas pa bsngags pa ni legs so legs so zhes bya ba la sogs pa byas pa bsngags par mdzad pa ste /
translated: He praises what has been done. He praises what has been done well with such words as ‚ÄúExcellent! Excellent!‚Äù

original: yon tan thob pa rnams la yang dag par gzengs bstod pa mdzad ces bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: yon tan thob pa rnams la yang dag par gzengs bstod pa mdzad ces bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: He extols those who have attained good qualities.

original: mi byed pa la bskul pa zhes bya ba la mi byed pa ni yon tan ma thob pa rnams mngon sum du mi byed pa ste /
analyzed: mi byed pa la bskul pa zhes bya ba la mi byed pa ni yon tan ma thob pa rnams mngon sum du mi byed pa ste /
translated: He urges those who have not done so to do it. Those who have not done so are those who have not attained good qualities and are not practicing them.

original: de la gang nged kyi stobs bcu la sogs pa phun sum tshogs pa de khyod la med kyi phun sum tshogs pa de yongs su btsal ba'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsoms shig ces bskul ba mdzad do //
analyzed: de la gang nged kyi stobs bcu la sogs pa phun sum tshogs pa de khyod la med kyi phun sum tshogs pa de yongs su btsal ba'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsoms shig ces bskul ba mdzad do //
translated: The Buddha exhorts them, You do not have my perfection of the ten powers, etc. Exert yourselves in striving for that perfection!

original: bzod pa'i sgo 'di nyid kyang mdor cig ces bya ba 'dis ni mi dor bas de nus pa nyid du ston par byed do //
analyzed: bzod pa'i sgo 'di nyid kyang mdor cig ces bya ba 'dis ni mi dor bas de nus pa nyid du ston par byed do //
translated: This very door of patience is the means for attaining the perfection of the powers, etc. In brief shows that it is capable of doing that.

original: sems can gyi don bya bas don che ba nyid ces bya ba sems can ji lta bu dag cig gi zhe na /
analyzed: sems can gyi don bya bas don che ba nyid ces bya ba sems can ji lta bu dag cig gi zhe na /
translated: The greatness of benefit is from the performance of benefit for sentient beings. What kind of sentient beings?

original: kun nas nyon mongs par gyur ba rnams kyi'o //üîΩji lta zhe na /
analyzed: kun nas nyon mongs par gyur ba rnams kyi'o // ji lta zhe na /
translated: Those who are afflicted.

original: 'di dag la soms shig ces bya ba la sogs pas bstan te /
analyzed: 'di dag la soms shig ces bya ba la sogs pas bstan te /
translated: How? Think about these.

original: kun nas dkris par gyur pa rnams ni ma zhi bdag go //
analyzed: kun nas dkris par gyur pa rnams ni ma zhi bdag go //
translated: Those who are completely bound are those who are not peaceful.

original: bag la nyal du gyur pa rnams ni rab tu ma zhib dag go //
analyzed: bag la nyal du gyur pa rnams ni rab tu ma zhib dag go //
translated: Those who are latent are those who are not very peaceful.

original: khyim pa rnams ni nyon mongs pa sna tshogs kun du 'byung ba dag go //
analyzed: khyim pa rnams ni nyon mongs pa sna tshogs kun du 'byung ba dag go //
translated: Householders are those who have various afflictions arising. Householders are those who have not gone forth.

original: rab tu byung ba rnams ni rnam par rtog pa sna tshogs kyis g-yen spyo ba dag go //
analyzed: rab tu byung ba rnams ni rnam par rtog pa sna tshogs kyis g-yen spyo ba dag go //
translated: The renunciate is one who is harassed by various discursive thoughts.

original: smon lam @97b gyi 'bras bu med pa ni sngon gyi smon lam dran par gyis shig ces gsungs pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: smon lam @97b gyi 'bras bu med pa ni sngon gyi smon lam dran par gyis shig ces gsungs pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: The result of aspiration is the recollection of former aspirations.

original: sems can yongs su smin par bya ba 'bras bu med pa ni sems can gyi don thob par bya ba zhes gsungs pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: sems can yongs su smin par bya ba 'bras bu med pa ni sems can gyi don thob par bya ba zhes gsungs pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: The result of the maturation of sentient beings is the attainment of the benefit of sentient beings.

original: ye shes kyi tshogs 'bras bu med pa ni ye shes kyi sgo bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes gsungs pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: ye shes kyi tshogs 'bras bu med pa ni ye shes kyi sgo bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes gsungs pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: The result of the aggregate of wisdom is the inconceivable door of wisdom.

original: thun mong ma yin pa'i don du dub pa 'bras bu med pa ni chos kyi dbyings 'di ni gnas pa nyid de //
analyzed: thun mong ma yin pa'i don du dub pa 'bras bu med pa ni chos kyi dbyings 'di ni gnas pa nyid de //
translated: The result of the fatigue of the uncommon objective is the stability of the realm of Dharma.

original: 'dis ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams nyi tshe rab tu phye ba ma yin gyi nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyang rnam par mi rtog pa'i chos nyid 'di 'thob bo zhes 'byung ba'i phyir ro ;
analyzed: 'dis ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams nyi tshe rab tu phye ba ma yin gyi nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyang rnam par mi rtog pa'i chos nyid 'di 'thob bo zhes 'byung ba'i phyir ro ;
translated: This is not the case for the TathƒÅgatas alone, but all the ≈õrƒÅvakas and pratyekabuddhas also attain this nonconceptual reality.

original: /'di skad du thun mong ma yin pa'i don ni nyan thos la sogs pa'i spyod yul ma yin pa ste /
analyzed: /'di skad du thun mong ma yin pa'i don ni nyan thos la sogs pa'i spyod yul ma yin pa ste /
translated: He says, The uncommon meaning is not the domain of experience of the ≈õrƒÅvakas and so forth.

original: sangs rgyas kyi yul lo //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi yul lo //
translated: It is the domain of experience of the buddhas.

original: de thob par bya ba'i phyir khyod kyis yun ring po nas dka' ba spyod pa goms pa la sogs pa brtson 'grus brtsams pa gang yin pa de 'bras bu med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de thob par bya ba'i phyir khyod kyis yun ring po nas dka' ba spyod pa goms pa la sogs pa brtson 'grus brtsams pa gang yin pa de 'bras bu med par 'gyur ro //
translated: For the sake of attaining that, you have long been engaged in the practice of austerities, such as striving in effort. That will be fruitless.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: 'di ltar khyod kyis rnam par mi rtog pa'i chos nyid thob pa gang yin pa de ni nyan thos la sogs pas kyang thob ste /
analyzed: 'di ltar khyod kyis rnam par mi rtog pa'i chos nyid thob pa gang yin pa de ni nyan thos la sogs pas kyang thob ste /
translated: Because that nonconceptual reality that you have attained is also attained by the ≈õrƒÅvakas and so forth.

original: de lta bas na 'di thob pas chog par 'dzin pa ni rigs pa ma yin no zhes ston par byed do /
analyzed: de lta bas na 'di thob pas chog par 'dzin pa ni rigs pa ma yin no zhes ston par byed do /
translated: Therefore, it is not reasonable to be satisfied with attaining that.

original: 'di thams cad ni yang dag par gzengs bstod pa yin no //
analyzed: 'di thams cad ni yang dag par gzengs bstod pa yin no //
translated: All of this is encouragement.

original: sems can gyi don mdzad pa'i dbang du byas nas /
analyzed: sems can gyi don mdzad pa'i dbang du byas nas /
translated: With regard to the performance of the welfare of sentient beings,

original: sangs rgyas rnams kyi phun sum tshogs pa gang yin pa de lus tshad med pa la sogs pas sgrub par nus pa nyid du yongs su ston par byed de //
analyzed: sangs rgyas rnams kyi phun sum tshogs pa gang yin pa de lus tshad med pa la sogs pas sgrub par nus pa nyid du yongs su ston par byed de //
translated: The Buddha shows that the perfection of the Buddhas is capable of being achieved by means of the immeasurability of body, etc.

original: gnas gang gis zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: gnas gang gis zhes bya ba ni /
translated: By what basis?

original: lus tshad med pa nyid ces bya ba yin no //
analyzed: lus tshad med pa nyid ces bya ba yin no //
translated: By the immeasurability of body.üîΩBy what knowledge?

original: kun rdzob dang don dam pa'i ye shes gang gis zhes bya ba ni ye shes tshad med pa nyid ces bya ba yin no //
analyzed: kun rdzob dang don dam pa'i ye shes gang gis zhes bya ba ni ye shes tshad med pa nyid ces bya ba yin no //
translated: By the immeasurability of knowledge, i.e., by conventional and absolute knowledge.üîΩBy what pure field?

original: zhing yongs su dag pa gang gis zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa nyid ces bya ba yin no //
analyzed: zhing yongs su dag pa gang gis zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa nyid ces bya ba yin no //
translated: By the immeasurability of the Buddha-field.üîΩBy what knowledge of the conduct of those to be trained?

original: gdul bya'i spyod pa mkhyen pa gang gis zhes bya ba ni ye shes mngon par sgrub pa tshad med pa nyid ces bya ba yin no //
analyzed: gdul bya'i spyod pa mkhyen pa gang gis zhes bya ba ni ye shes mngon par sgrub pa tshad med pa nyid ces bya ba yin no //
translated: By the immeasurability of the realization of knowledge.üîΩBy what is it gathered?

original: gang gis bsdus te zhes bya ba ni 'od kyi dkyil 'khor tshad med pa nyid ces bya ba yin no //
analyzed: gang gis bsdus te zhes bya ba ni 'od kyi dkyil 'khor tshad med pa nyid ces bya ba yin no //
translated: By the immeasurability of the circle of light.

original: gzhan dag ni tshig gnyis bzlog ste yang 'don to //
analyzed: gzhan dag ni tshig gnyis bzlog ste yang 'don to //
translated: Others recite the verse in reverse order.

original: bshad pa gang gis zhes bya ba ni sgra skad kyi yan lag tshad med pa nyid ces bya ba yin te /
analyzed: bshad pa gang gis zhes bya ba ni sgra skad kyi yan lag tshad med pa nyid ces bya ba yin te /
translated: The explanation is ‚Äúby which‚Äù means ‚Äúby the immeasurable branches of speech and sound.‚Äù

original: khyod kyis kyang de bzhin du mngon par sgrub @98a * //üîΩpa skyed cig ces 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: khyod kyis kyang de bzhin du mngon par sgrub @98a * // pa skyed cig ces 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: You should also generate the accomplishment of that.

original: sgo tha dad pa ni rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa la ni chos snang ba'i sgo 'di 'dra ba mtha' yas par gyur te zhes bya ba yin no //
analyzed: sgo tha dad pa ni rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa la ni chos snang ba'i sgo 'di 'dra ba mtha' yas par gyur te zhes bya ba yin no //
translated: The different doors are ‚ÄúSon of noble family, the Tathagata has immeasurable such doors of the appearance of Dharma.‚Äù

original: mdzad pa tha dad pa ni mdzad pa mtha' yas shing zhes bya ba yin no //
analyzed: mdzad pa tha dad pa ni mdzad pa mtha' yas shing zhes bya ba yin no //
translated: The different deeds are ‚Äúimmeasurable deeds.‚Äù

original: gong nas gong du brten pa tha dad pa ni 'brel ba mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba yin te /
analyzed: gong nas gong du brten pa tha dad pa ni 'brel ba mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba yin te /
translated: The different supports of higher and higher are ‚Äúimmeasurable connections.‚Äù

original: de dag thob par bya ba'i phyir mngon par sgrub pa skyed ces 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de dag thob par bya ba'i phyir mngon par sgrub pa skyed ces 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: In order to attain those, generate the accomplishment.

original: tshegs chung ba zhes bya ba ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: tshegs chung ba zhes bya ba ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: What is meant by ‚Äúwith little difficulty‚Äù?

original: khyod kyis nged kyi phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa nyid la ltos te zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten gyi khams rab tu dbye ba ji ltar mthong ba lta bar sbyor ba'o //
analyzed: khyod kyis nged kyi phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa nyid la ltos te zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten gyi khams rab tu dbye ba ji ltar mthong ba lta bar sbyor ba'o //
translated: You should see my immeasurable buddha-fields in the ten directions.

original: sems can tshad med pa nyid ces bya ba ni sems can gyi khams rab tu dbye ba'o //
analyzed: sems can tshad med pa nyid ces bya ba ni sems can gyi khams rab tu dbye ba'o //
translated: The immeasurable number of sentient beings refers to the classification of the realm of sentient beings.

original: chos rnam par dbye ba tshad med pa nyid ces bya ba ni chos rab tu dbye ba ste /
analyzed: chos rnam par dbye ba tshad med pa nyid ces bya ba ni chos rab tu dbye ba ste /
translated: The immeasurable classification of phenomena refers to the classification of phenomena.

original: de dag thams cad ji lta ba bzhin du khong du chud par gyis shig ces 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de dag thams cad ji lta ba bzhin du khong du chud par gyis shig ces 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: You should understand all of them as they are.

original: ci'i phyir tshegs chung ba nyid ce na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir tshegs chung ba nyid ce na /
translated: Why is it effortless?

original: blta ba tsam zhig bya bar zad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: blta ba tsam zhig bya bar zad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is merely a matter of seeing.

original: yang ci'i phyir ye shes nye bar sgrub par mdzad ce na //
analyzed: yang ci'i phyir ye shes nye bar sgrub par mdzad ce na //
translated: Why does he establish that knowledge?

original: de'i de nyid yongs su mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur te zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de'i de nyid yongs su mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur te zhes bya ba ni /
translated: That itself is nirvana.

original: de nye bar sgrub pa'i dgos pa yin te //
analyzed: de nye bar sgrub pa'i dgos pa yin te //
translated: That is the purpose of establishing it.

original: ye shes tshad med pa nye bar sgrub pa'i rgyu yin no //
analyzed: ye shes tshad med pa nye bar sgrub pa'i rgyu yin no //
translated: It is the cause for accomplishing immeasurable intuition.

original: gnas pa de nyid kyi khyad par yongs su bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: gnas pa de nyid kyi khyad par yongs su bstan pa yin no //
translated: The distinctive feature of that very abiding is taught.üîΩThe explanation of number, portion, etc. is to be understood as a connection.

original: grangs dang cha la sogs pa bshad pa ni mtshams sbyar bar rig par bya'o zhes bya ba ni grangs ci zhe na /
analyzed: grangs dang cha la sogs pa bshad pa ni mtshams sbyar bar rig par bya'o zhes bya ba ni grangs ci zhe na /
translated: What is the number?

original: cha gang yin pa'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: cha gang yin pa'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: It is the portion, etc.

original: mtshams sbyar ba ni mthun par sbyar ba ste /
analyzed: mtshams sbyar ba ni mthun par sbyar ba ste /
translated: A connection is a conformity,

original: gzhung gi sgo nas tha dad par 'jug pa'i tshig rnams don gyi sgo nas gcig tu byed pa'o //
analyzed: gzhung gi sgo nas tha dad par 'jug pa'i tshig rnams don gyi sgo nas gcig tu byed pa'o //
translated: a making of the words that are used separately by way of text into one by way of meaning.

original: ji skad du 'phags pa blo gros mi zad pas bsam pa mi zad pa nyid las /
analyzed: ji skad du 'phags pa blo gros mi zad pas bsam pa mi zad pa nyid las /
translated: As it is said in the noble Aksayamatinirdesa,

original: ma byas pa'i phyir bcos ma ma yin pa'o zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: ma byas pa'i phyir bcos ma ma yin pa'o zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o //
translated: It is not artificial because it is not made.

original: sems can yongs su smin par bya ba la lus gang la gnas pa ni /
analyzed: sems can yongs su smin par bya ba la lus gang la gnas pa ni /
translated: As for the body in which one abides in order to develop beings,

original: lus rnam par dbye ba tshad med pas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i stobs yang dag par 'grub ces bya ba yin no //
analyzed: lus rnam par dbye ba tshad med pas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i stobs yang dag par 'grub ces bya ba yin no //
translated: Since the analysis of bodies is limitless, it is the power for accomplishing the bodhisattva practice.

original: bshad pa gang gis ni sgra skad mngon par sgrub pa tshad med pa zhes bya ba yin no //
analyzed: bshad pa gang gis ni sgra skad mngon par sgrub pa tshad med pa zhes bya ba yin no //
translated: Since the explanation is limitless, it is the accomplishment of the infinite sound of speech.

original: ye shes la rton pa gang gis ni ye shes mngon par sgrub pa chad med pa zhes bya ba yin no //
analyzed: ye shes la rton pa gang gis ni ye shes mngon par sgrub pa chad med pa zhes bya ba yin no //
translated: Since it is based on wisdom, it is the accomplishment of uninterrupted wisdom.

original: skye ba yongs su 'dzin pa gang gis ni skye ba mngon par sgrub @98b pa tshad med pa zhes bya ba yin no //
analyzed: skye ba yongs su 'dzin pa gang gis ni skye ba mngon par sgrub @98b pa tshad med pa zhes bya ba yin no //
translated: Since it is the taking of birth, it is the accomplishment of infinite births.

original: zhing gang du ni zhing yongs su dag pa tshad med pa zhes bya ba yin no //üîΩsems can gang yongs su smin par byed pa ni sems can yongs su smin par bya ba tshad med pa zhes bya ba yin te /
analyzed: zhing gang du ni zhing yongs su dag pa tshad med pa zhes bya ba yin no // sems can gang yongs su smin par byed pa ni sems can yongs su smin par bya ba tshad med pa zhes bya ba yin te /
translated: Since it is the field, it is the accomplishment of infinite pure fields.üîΩSince it is the ripening of beings, it is the accomplishment of the infinite ripening of beings.

original: de lta bu ni sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i dbang du byas pa yin no //
analyzed: de lta bu ni sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i dbang du byas pa yin no //
translated: Thus, it is in terms of the ripening of beings that the bodhisattvas‚Äô accomplishment of the infinite ripening of beings should be understood.

original: sangs rgyas la mchod pa dang // rim gro bya ba tshad med pa zhes bya ba ni bsod nams kyi tshogs so //
analyzed: sangs rgyas la mchod pa dang // rim gro bya ba tshad med pa zhes bya ba ni bsod nams kyi tshogs so //
translated: Worship and service to the Buddhas is the accumulation of merit.

original: chos kyi tshul khong du chud pa bar med pa zhes bya ba ni ye shes kyi tshogs kyi dbang du byas pa ste /
analyzed: chos kyi tshul khong du chud pa bar med pa zhes bya ba ni ye shes kyi tshogs kyi dbang du byas pa ste /
translated: The uninterrupted comprehension of the system of the Dharma is the accumulation of direct intuition, in the sense of being based on direct intuition.

original: de lta bu ni tshogs bsags pa'i dbang du byas pa yin no //
analyzed: de lta bu ni tshogs bsags pa'i dbang du byas pa yin no //
translated: Such is the accumulation of the stores in the sense of being based on the stores.

original: mngon par shes pa mngon par sgrub pa'i stobs bskyed pa tshad med pa dang / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnam par phye ba tshad med pa zhes bya ba ni mngon par shes pa la sgrib pa dang mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa la sgrib pa sbyong ba ste /
analyzed: mngon par shes pa mngon par sgrub pa'i stobs bskyed pa tshad med pa dang / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnam par phye ba tshad med pa zhes bya ba ni mngon par shes pa la sgrib pa dang mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa la sgrib pa sbyong ba ste /
translated: The power of the accomplishment of the superknowledges and the division of the circle of assembly are the purification of the obscurations to the superknowledges and the obscurations to full attainment of enlightenment.

original: de lta bu ni sgrib pa rnam par dag pa'i dbang du byas pa yin no //
analyzed: de lta bu ni sgrib pa rnam par dag pa'i dbang du byas pa yin no //
translated: Such is the purification of obscurations in the sense of being based on the purification of obscurations.

original: bcu tshan 'di thams cad du yang tshad med pa'i skabs kyis na //
analyzed: bcu tshan 'di thams cad du yang tshad med pa'i skabs kyis na //
translated: In all these sets of ten, the immeasurable refers to

original: lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las //
analyzed: lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las //
translated: the immeasurable actions of body, speech, and mind.

original: tshad med pa dang ldan par bshad //
analyzed: tshad med pa dang ldan par bshad //
translated: The immeasurable is explained as being associated with the actions of body, speech, and mind.

original: mi g-yo ba'i tshul gyis zhes bya ba ni rgyun mi 'chad par stsogs pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: mi g-yo ba'i tshul gyis zhes bya ba ni rgyun mi 'chad par stsogs pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: ‚ÄúIn a manner that is not agitated‚Äù means ‚Äúin a manner that is uninterrupted.‚Äù

original: gru chen dpe dang chos mthun par //üîΩmngon shes myur ba'i rgyu nyid kyi //
analyzed: gru chen dpe dang chos mthun par // mngon shes myur ba'i rgyu nyid kyi //
translated: The great ship is similar to the bodhisattvas in that it is the means of crossing over the ocean of transmigration.

original: khyad par yongs su bstan pa'i phyir //
analyzed: khyad par yongs su bstan pa'i phyir //
translated: The cause of the swiftness of the superknowledges is taught as a special point.

original: lhun gyis grub par 'byung ba nyid //
analyzed: lhun gyis grub par 'byung ba nyid //
translated: It is spontaneous.

original: gnas pa'i khyad par thob pa ni de lta bu yin no //üîΩsangs rgyas zhing rnam dag rnams kyi //
analyzed: gnas pa'i khyad par thob pa ni de lta bu yin no // sangs rgyas zhing rnam dag rnams kyi //
translated: This is the special quality of the bodhisattva‚Äôs station.

original: rgyu ni rnam pa gsum du 'dod //üîΩdbang rnams thob par bya ba'i phyir //
analyzed: rgyu ni rnam pa gsum du 'dod // dbang rnams thob par bya ba'i phyir //

analyzed: rnam pa gsum gyi sbyor gang yin //
translated: The application to the attainment of the powers is threefold.

original: ji lta zhe na /üîΩsnod rnams la ni dbang ba yi ;
analyzed: ji lta zhe na / snod rnams la ni dbang ba yi ;

analyzed: / sbyor ba dang po yin par bshad // sems can 'jig rten dbang ba yi //

analyzed: gnyis pa yin par mngon par brjod // ye shes rdzogs par byang chub la //

original: dbang pa'i gsum pa yin par bshad //
analyzed: dbang pa'i gsum pa yin par bshad //

original: de la snod kyi 'jig rten la //
analyzed: de la snod kyi 'jig rten la //

analyzed: dbang ba rnam pa lngar bshad de //

analyzed: gang 'dod pa de kun du ston pa'am mi snang bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i rnam pa de'i sbyor ba'o //

analyzed: gnyis pa yin zhes brjod pa yin //

analyzed: ji lta zhe na / dus ji srid du 'jig rten 'jig pa de yang rab tu shes so zhes bya ba nas /

analyzed: bzhi pa ste /

analyzed: de sa'i khams chung ba yang rab tu shes so zhes bya ba nas /

analyzed: 'jig la sogs par mthong ba nas //

analyzed: zhing las mi g-yo'i bar gang yin //

analyzed: rnam pa lnga pa ste /
translated: The fifth aspect is

analyzed: ji snyed 'dod pa de snyed ston par byed bya ba 'di'i sbyor ba yin no //

original: ji lta zhe na /
analyzed: ji lta zhe na /
translated: How is that?

original: de ltar rdul phra rab kyi rdul phra rab tu dbye ba shes pa la zhugs pa de 'dod pa'i khams 'jig pa yang rab tu shes so zhes bya ba nas /
analyzed: de ltar rdul phra rab kyi rdul phra rab tu dbye ba shes pa la zhugs pa de 'dod pa'i khams 'jig pa yang rab tu shes so zhes bya ba nas /
translated: Thus, one who has entered the knowledge of the analysis of the subtle particles of the subtle particle also knows the destruction of the desire realm, up to

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med @99b pa rnams dang 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnams na yang snang bar 'gyur ba yin no /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med @99b pa rnams dang 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnams na yang snang bar 'gyur ba yin no /
translated: and appears in the assemblies of the retinues in the inexpressible buddha-fields.

original: zhes bya ba'i bar 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i bar 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because it is stated.

original: chung ba ni mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i sa pa'i rnam par shes pa'i yul te //
analyzed: chung ba ni mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i sa pa'i rnam par shes pa'i yul te //
translated: The small is the object of consciousness on the non-concentrated level,

original: sa'i khams chung ba yang zhes 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sa'i khams chung ba yang zhes 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is stated that the earth element is also small.

original: chen por gyur pa ni mnyam par gzhag pa'i rnam par smin pa'i rnam par shes pa'i yul te //
analyzed: chen por gyur pa ni mnyam par gzhag pa'i rnam par smin pa'i rnam par shes pa'i yul te //
translated: The great is the object of the consciousness of maturation in concentration,üîΩbecause it is stated that the earth element is also great.

original: rgya chen por gyur pa yang zhes gsungs pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: rgya chen por gyur pa yang zhes gsungs pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúAnd the vast‚Äù is as stated:

original: tshad med pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul te //
analyzed: tshad med pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul te //
translated: ‚ÄúThe immeasurable is the domain of the TathƒÅgatas.

original: tshad med pa dang zhes gsungs pa gang yin pa'o //üîΩlus rags pa dang phra ba ni gzugs can dang gzugs can ma yin pa'i sems can /
analyzed: tshad med pa dang zhes gsungs pa gang yin pa'o // lus rags pa dang phra ba ni gzugs can dang gzugs can ma yin pa'i sems can /
translated: ‚ÄúThe immeasurable‚Äù is as stated:

original: rnams kyi lus te //üîΩlus rags pa dang lus phra ba yang rab tu shes so zhes gsungs pa gang yin pa ste //
analyzed: rnams kyi lus te // lus rags pa dang lus phra ba yang rab tu shes so zhes gsungs pa gang yin pa ste //
translated: ‚ÄúThe gross and subtle bodies‚Äù are the bodies of sentient beings with form and without form.üîΩ‚ÄúThe gross and subtle bodies‚Äù is as stated:

original: go rims bzhin no //
analyzed: go rims bzhin no //
translated: ‚ÄúOne understands the gross and subtle bodies.‚Äù

original: 'di nyid rang dang spyi'i mtshan nyid rnam par dbye ba'i sgo nas lus rnam par phye ba yin par shes par bya ste /
analyzed: 'di nyid rang dang spyi'i mtshan nyid rnam par dbye ba'i sgo nas lus rnam par phye ba yin par shes par bya ste /
translated: This should be understood as the analysis of the body through the analysis of its specific and general characteristics,

original: ji ltar na mtshan nyid kyis shes na rang dang spyi'i mtshan nyid rnam par dbye ba'i sgo nas te zhas bya ba yin no //
analyzed: ji ltar na mtshan nyid kyis shes na rang dang spyi'i mtshan nyid rnam par dbye ba'i sgo nas te zhas bya ba yin no //
translated: as stated: ‚ÄúHow is it known through its characteristics? Through the analysis of its specific and general characteristics.‚Äù

original: sems can rnams kyi lus rab tu dbye ba shes pa la mkhas pa dang lus rnam par dbye ba shes pa la mkhas pa ni rigs gzhan dang rang gi rigs kyi bye brag gis rig par bya'o //
analyzed: sems can rnams kyi lus rab tu dbye ba shes pa la mkhas pa dang lus rnam par dbye ba shes pa la mkhas pa ni rigs gzhan dang rang gi rigs kyi bye brag gis rig par bya'o //
translated: Skill in knowing the classification of the bodies of sentient beings and skill in knowing the classification of bodies should be understood in terms of the differences of other families and one's own family.

original: 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor na sems can ci 'dra bdag cig 'khod pa de 'dra ba de lta bu'i lus ston pa'o //
analyzed: 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor na sems can ci 'dra bdag cig 'khod pa de 'dra ba de lta bu'i lus ston pa'o //
translated: He displays a body that is similar to whatever kind of sentient being is present in the circle of the assembly.

original: re zhig snod kyi 'jig rten la dbang ba'i sbyor ba ni de lta bu yin no //
analyzed: re zhig snod kyi 'jig rten la dbang ba'i sbyor ba ni de lta bu yin no //
translated: This is the application of mastery over the physical cosmos.

original: sems can gyi 'jig rten la dbang ba'i sbyor ba ji lta bu zhe na /üîΩde 'gugs pa la dbang ba ste de'i sbyor ba ni /
analyzed: sems can gyi 'jig rten la dbang ba'i sbyor ba ji lta bu zhe na / de 'gugs pa la dbang ba ste de'i sbyor ba ni /
translated: What is the application of mastery over the cosmos of sentient beings?üîΩIt is the mastery of attracting sentient beings.

original: de dag dang mthun pa'i lus dang sems ston pa'o //
analyzed: de dag dang mthun pa'i lus dang sems ston pa'o //
translated: The application of that is the display of a body and mind that are in harmony with them.

original: ji lta zhe na /
analyzed: ji lta zhe na /
translated: How is that?

original: de sems can rnams kyi lus rnam par dbye ba dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas /
analyzed: de sems can rnams kyi lus rnam par dbye ba dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas /
translated: He displays a body that is similar to whatever kind of sentient being is present in the circle of the assembly.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang kha dog dang gzugs rnam par dbye ba kun du ston to zhes bya ba'i bar 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang kha dog dang gzugs rnam par dbye ba kun du ston to zhes bya ba'i bar 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: and the TathƒÅgata‚Äôs body, color, and form are all revealed.

original: sems can gyi 'jig rten la dbang ba'i sbyor ba ni de lta bu yin no //
analyzed: sems can gyi 'jig rten la dbang ba'i sbyor ba ni de lta bu yin no //
translated: This is the application to the mastery of the world of sentient beings.

original: ye shes mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa la dbang ba'i sbyor ba ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: ye shes mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa la dbang ba'i sbyor ba ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: What is the application to the mastery of the complete clear knowledge of gnosis?üîΩThe verse says:üîΩThat which is accepted as the ultimate gnosis

original: de la don dam ye shes dang // kun rdzob shes par 'dod pa gang //üîΩye shes mngon rdzogs byang chub la //
analyzed: de la don dam ye shes dang // kun rdzob shes par 'dod pa gang // ye shes mngon rdzogs byang chub la //
translated: and the conventional knowledge

original: dbang ba'i sbyor ba nyid yin no //
analyzed: dbang ba'i sbyor ba nyid yin no //
translated: is the application to the masteryüîΩof the complete clear knowledge of gnosis.

original: don dam ye shes gang yin pa //
analyzed: don dam ye shes gang yin pa //
translated: That which is the ultimate gnosisüîΩis the application to the mastery of the complete clear knowledge of gnosis.

original: lus su rnam rtog bral ba dang // mtshan nyid ni gzugs @100a * //
analyzed: lus su rnam rtog bral ba dang // mtshan nyid ni gzugs @100a * //
translated: The characteristic of the body is the manifestation of form.üîΩWhat is the characteristic of the body?

original: kyi lus kyis mngon par gsal bar byed pa nyid ces bya ba yin no //
analyzed: kyi lus kyis mngon par gsal bar byed pa nyid ces bya ba yin no //
translated: It is the manifestation of the body through form.

original: ji lta zhe na /
analyzed: ji lta zhe na /
translated: How is that?

original: gzugs kyi go 'byed pa'i mtshan nyid yin pas gzugs kyis de mngon pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzugs kyi go 'byed pa'i mtshan nyid yin pas gzugs kyis de mngon pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the characteristic of the body is the manifestation of form, the body is manifested through form.

original: 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag par byed pa ye shes mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa la dbang ba'i sbyor ba gsum pa ste /
analyzed: 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag par byed pa ye shes mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa la dbang ba'i sbyor ba gsum pa ste /
translated: This is the third application to the full accomplishment of the clear knowledge that purifies the Buddha-land.

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag pa ni de lta bu yin no //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag pa ni de lta bu yin no //
translated: Such is the purification of the Buddha-land.

original: de ltar rab tu sbyor ba na //
analyzed: de ltar rab tu sbyor ba na //
translated: Thus engaged,

original: gnod pa rnams kyi gnyen po ni //üîΩrnam bcu rnam par gnas pa'i phyir //
analyzed: gnod pa rnams kyi gnyen po ni // rnam bcu rnam par gnas pa'i phyir //
translated: the antidotes to the injuriesüîΩare the ten masteries,

original: dbang ni rnam pa bcu thob po //
analyzed: dbang ni rnam pa bcu thob po //
translated: because of the tenfold stability.

original: 'chi ba'i gnod pa de'i gnyen por 'di ltar tshe la dbang ba 'thob po zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: 'chi ba'i gnod pa de'i gnyen por 'di ltar tshe la dbang ba 'thob po zhes gsungs so //
translated: The antidote to the injury of death is the mastery over life, as it is said,

original: ji lta zhe na /
analyzed: ji lta zhe na /
translated: How is that?

original: dbang de nyid bskal pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa tshig gnyis rab tu rnam par 'byed de /
analyzed: dbang de nyid bskal pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa tshig gnyis rab tu rnam par 'byed de /
translated: That mastery is analyzed into two parts: ‚Äúincalculable eons‚Äù and so on.

original: de bzhin du gzhan la yang gnyis pa ni rab tu rnam par 'byed pa'i yan lag nyid yin par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du gzhan la yang gnyis pa ni rab tu rnam par 'byed pa'i yan lag nyid yin par shes par bya'o //
translated: The second part should be understood as the analysis of the first part.

original: kun nas nyon mongs pa'i gnod pa'i gnyen por sems la dbang 'thob bo //
analyzed: kun nas nyon mongs pa'i gnod pa'i gnyen por sems la dbang 'thob bo //
translated: He obtains mastery over his mind as an antidote to the injury of the defilements.

original: lhag ma ni sbyar sla ba nyid pas rnam par mi dbye'o //
analyzed: lhag ma ni sbyar sla ba nyid pas rnam par mi dbye'o //
translated: The rest is easy to understand and so does not need to be analyzed.

original: ye shes kyis ni che ba nyid //üîΩ'dir ni mi gnas lam nyid yin //
analyzed: ye shes kyis ni che ba nyid // 'dir ni mi gnas lam nyid yin //
translated: The greatness of his knowledgeüîΩis that he has the inconceivable knowledge of the three kinds of object.

original: don rnam gsum ni smos pa'i phyir //
analyzed: don rnam gsum ni smos pa'i phyir //
translated: The three kinds of object are mentioned

original: de nyid ye shes bsam mi khyab //
analyzed: de nyid ye shes bsam mi khyab //
translated: and that itself is the inconceivable knowledge.

original: ji lta zhe na /
analyzed: ji lta zhe na /
translated: How is it so?

original: ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa yin zhes bya ba ni dgod pa'i tshig go //üîΩye shes dpag tu med pa zhes bya ba ni bsgom pa khyad zhugs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid do //
analyzed: ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa yin zhes bya ba ni dgod pa'i tshig go // ye shes dpag tu med pa zhes bya ba ni bsgom pa khyad zhugs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid do //
translated: He has the inconceivable knowledge is the summary statement.üîΩHe has the immeasurable knowledge is the inconceivable excellence of his meditation.

original: ye shes shin tu rgyas pa zhes bya ba ni shes bya bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid do //
analyzed: ye shes shin tu rgyas pa zhes bya ba ni shes bya bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid do //
translated: He has the extensive knowledge is the inconceivable object of his knowledge.

original: ye shes mi 'phrogs pa zhes bya ba ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs bstsal ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid do //
analyzed: ye shes mi 'phrogs pa zhes bya ba ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs bstsal ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid do //
translated: He has the unassailable knowledge is the inconceivable elimination of his resistant tendency.

original: las rnams kha na ma tho med //
analyzed: las rnams kha na ma tho med //
translated: His actions are irreproachable

original: kun du 'byung la sogs mtshan nyid //
analyzed: kun du 'byung la sogs mtshan nyid //
translated: and have the characteristics of being spontaneous and so on.

original: rgyu bzhi dag dang ldan pa'i phyir //
analyzed: rgyu bzhi dag dang ldan pa'i phyir //
translated: Because of the four causes,

original: las kyi che ba nyid du 'dod //üîΩlus kyi las dang ngag gi las dang yid kyi las kha na ma tho ba shin tu med pa kun du 'byung ba rab tu 'byung zhes bya ba ni las kyi che ba nyid do //
analyzed: las kyi che ba nyid du 'dod // lus kyi las dang ngag gi las dang yid kyi las kha na ma tho ba shin tu med pa kun du 'byung ba rab tu 'byung zhes bya ba ni las kyi che ba nyid do //
translated: the greatness of action is accepted.üîΩThe greatness of action is the arising of the action of body, speech, and mind, which is absolutely irreproachable.

original: kun du 'byung bar byed pa dang // kun du 'byung ba'i dus na zhes bya ba ni //
analyzed: kun du 'byung bar byed pa dang // kun du 'byung ba'i dus na zhes bya ba ni //
translated: The arising of the action of body, speech, and mind, which is absolutely irreproachable, is the arising of the action of body, speech, and mind, which is absolutely irreproachable.

original: ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba zhes 'byung ba'i phyir /
analyzed: ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba zhes 'byung ba'i phyir /
translated: Because it is said that ‚Äúit is preceded by intuition and follows after intuition,‚Äù

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas dbang byed pa zhes bya ba ni kun nas nyon mongs pa med @100b pa'i lam gyis so //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas dbang byed pa zhes bya ba ni kun nas nyon mongs pa med @100b pa'i lam gyis so //
translated: it is the mastery of the perfection of wisdom.üîΩBecause it is said that ‚Äúit is preceded by great compassion and is well analyzed by skill in liberative art,‚Äù

original: snying rje chen po sngon du 'gro ba'i thabs la mkhas pas shin tu rnam par phye ba zhes bya ba ni sems can gyi don byed pa'i lam gyis so //
analyzed: snying rje chen po sngon du 'gro ba'i thabs la mkhas pas shin tu rnam par phye ba zhes bya ba ni sems can gyi don byed pa'i lam gyis so //
translated: it is the path of activity for the benefit of living beings.

original: bdag dang gzhan gyi sbyor ba'i rgyu gnyis kyis zhes bya ba la smon lam gyis shin tu mngon par sgrub pa zhes bya ba ni bdag gi rgyus so //
analyzed: bdag dang gzhan gyi sbyor ba'i rgyu gnyis kyis zhes bya ba la smon lam gyis shin tu mngon par sgrub pa zhes bya ba ni bdag gi rgyus so //
translated: The two causes of one's own and others' application means that the cause of one's own application is the very accomplishment of the perfections through the power of aspirational prayer.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis shin tu byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba ni gzhan pa'i sbyor ba'i rgyus so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis shin tu byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba ni gzhan pa'i sbyor ba'i rgyus so //
translated: The cause of others' application is the very consecration of the Tathagata through the consecration of the Tathagata.

original: sems can gyi don dang sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos yang dag par bsgrub pa'i bya bas bya ba sgrub pa ste de ltar na kha na ma tho ba shin tu med pa nyid rgyu ba zhes yongs su bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: sems can gyi don dang sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos yang dag par bsgrub pa'i bya bas bya ba sgrub pa ste de ltar na kha na ma tho ba shin tu med pa nyid rgyu ba zhes yongs su bstan pa yin no //
translated: The accomplishment of action is the action of accomplishing the benefit of sentient beings, the purification of the Buddha-field, and the accomplishment of the Buddha-qualities. Thus, the absence of the slightest basis for criticism is taught as the cause of the absence of the slightest basis for criticism.

original: nyon mongs pa kun du 'byung ba thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir bsam pa'i stobs la shin tu gnas pa yin zhes bya ba ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs rnam par nyams pa'o //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa kun du 'byung ba thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir bsam pa'i stobs la shin tu gnas pa yin zhes bya ba ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs rnam par nyams pa'o //
translated: The very stability of the power of intention means the destruction of the counteragent, because it is free from all the occurrences of moral defilement.

original: lam dang mi 'bral ba'i phyir lhag pa'i bsam pa'i stobs la shin tu gnas pa yin zhes bya ba ni gnyen po brtan pa'o //üîΩsems can gyi don mi gtong ba'i phyir snying rje chen po'i stobs la shin tu gnas pa yin /
analyzed: lam dang mi 'bral ba'i phyir lhag pa'i bsam pa'i stobs la shin tu gnas pa yin zhes bya ba ni gnyen po brtan pa'o // sems can gyi don mi gtong ba'i phyir snying rje chen po'i stobs la shin tu gnas pa yin /
translated: He is well-established in the power of superior intention, because he is never separated from the path. This is the firm antidote.üîΩHe is well-established in the power of great compassion, because he does not abandon the welfare of sentient beings.

original: 'gro ba thams cad yongs su skyob pa'i phyir byams pa chen po'i stobs la shin tu gnas pa yin te /
analyzed: 'gro ba thams cad yongs su skyob pa'i phyir byams pa chen po'i stobs la shin tu gnas pa yin te /
translated: He is well-established in the power of great love, because he protects all beings.

original: de lta bu ni sems can la lta ba rnam pa gnyis so ;
analyzed: de lta bu ni sems can la lta ba rnam pa gnyis so ;
translated: These are the two kinds of regard for sentient beings.

original: / brjed pa med pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir gzungs kyi stobs la shin tu gnas pa yin zhes bya ba ni brjed pa med pa nyid kyi yon tan no //
analyzed: / brjed pa med pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir gzungs kyi stobs la shin tu gnas pa yin zhes bya ba ni brjed pa med pa nyid kyi yon tan no //
translated: He is well-established in the power of retention, because he possesses the Dharma of non-forgetfulness. This is the quality of non-forgetfulness.

original: gzungs ni yi ge'i gzungs dang / don gyi gzungs te de la shin tu gnas pa'o //
analyzed: gzungs ni yi ge'i gzungs dang / don gyi gzungs te de la shin tu gnas pa'o //
translated: Retention is the retention of words and the retention of meaning. He is well-established in that.

original: brjed par mi 'gyur bas na brjed pa med pa nyid kyi yon tan no //
analyzed: brjed par mi 'gyur bas na brjed pa med pa nyid kyi yon tan no //
translated: Because he does not forget, he has the quality of non-forgetfulness.

original: spobs pa'i stobs la shin tu gnas pa yin no //
analyzed: spobs pa'i stobs la shin tu gnas pa yin no //
translated: He is well-established in the power of eloquence.

original: ji lta zhe na /
analyzed: ji lta zhe na /
translated: How so?

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rab tu rnam par 'byed pas rnam par dbye ba la mkhas pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rab tu rnam par 'byed pas rnam par dbye ba la mkhas pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because he is skilled in the analysis of the differentiation of all the qualities of the Buddha.

original: de ltar na chos ston pa la spobs pa mi 'dor ba'i phyir spobs pa'i stobs la shin tu gnas pa yin te /
analyzed: de ltar na chos ston pa la spobs pa mi 'dor ba'i phyir spobs pa'i stobs la shin tu gnas pa yin te /
translated: Thus, he is well established in the power of eloquence, because he never loses his eloquence in teaching the Dharma.

original: ngag phun sum tshogs pa'i yon tan no //
analyzed: ngag phun sum tshogs pa'i yon tan no //
translated: This is the quality of his perfect speech.

original: mngon par shes pa'i stobs la shin tu gnas pa yin no //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa'i stobs la shin tu gnas pa yin no //
translated: He is well established in the power of the superknowledges.

original: ji lta zhe na /
analyzed: ji lta zhe na /
translated: How so?

original: 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas pa'i spyod pa rnams kyi rnam par dbye ba tha dad pa nyid la mkhas pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas pa'i spyod pa rnams kyi rnam par dbye ba tha dad pa nyid la mkhas pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because he is skilled in the different analyses of the conduct of beings in infinite world-realms.

original: sems phun sum tshogs pa'i yon tan no //üîΩbyang chub sems dpa'i bya ba @101a * //
analyzed: sems phun sum tshogs pa'i yon tan no // byang chub sems dpa'i bya ba @101a * //
translated: This is the quality of his perfect mind.

original: thams cad mi gtong ba'i phyir smon lam gyi stobs la shin tu gnas pa yin te /
analyzed: thams cad mi gtong ba'i phyir smon lam gyi stobs la shin tu gnas pa yin te /
translated: He is well established in the power of vows, because he never abandons any of the activities of the bodhisattvas.

original: rgyu'i yon tan no //
analyzed: rgyu'i yon tan no //
translated: This is the quality of his cause.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par sgrub pa na pha rol tu phyin ba'i stobs la shin tu gnas pa yin pas sbyor ba'i yon tan no //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par sgrub pa na pha rol tu phyin ba'i stobs la shin tu gnas pa yin pas sbyor ba'i yon tan no //
translated: Since he is well-established in the power of the perfections when he is accomplishing all the qualities of a Buddha, this is the quality of application.

original: rnam pa thams cad kun du mkhyen pa'i ye shes mngon du gyur ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs gang yin pa de la shin tu gnas pa yin pas nye bar sgrub pa'i yon tan no //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad kun du mkhyen pa'i ye shes mngon du gyur ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs gang yin pa de la shin tu gnas pa yin pas nye bar sgrub pa'i yon tan no //
translated: Since he is well-established in the power of the blessings of the Tathagatas, which is the direct realization of the knowledge of all the modes, this is the quality of establishment.

original: bya ba thams cad kyang kun du ston la zhes bya ba ni so so'i skye bo nyon mongs pas theg pa rnams kyi bya ba ji lta bu kun du spyad pa dang / kun du spyod pa ltar byang chub sems dpa' yang de kho na bzhin du kun du ston to zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: bya ba thams cad kyang kun du ston la zhes bya ba ni so so'i skye bo nyon mongs pas theg pa rnams kyi bya ba ji lta bu kun du spyad pa dang / kun du spyod pa ltar byang chub sems dpa' yang de kho na bzhin du kun du ston to zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: He manifests all activities means that just as the activities of the vehicles of the common people are practiced and performed, the Bodhisattva manifests just that.

original: de las sa 'og ma ba'i mngon par 'du byed pa'i gnyen por mi g-yo ba yin te mi 'phrogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de las sa 'og ma ba'i mngon par 'du byed pa'i gnyen por mi g-yo ba yin te mi 'phrogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The immovability is the antidote to the over-exertion of the lower stages, because it is unassailable.

original: theg pa dman par smon lam 'debs pa dang / bdud kyi las dang nyon mongs pa kun du 'byung ba'i gnyen por mi ldog pa yin te /
analyzed: theg pa dman par smon lam 'debs pa dang / bdud kyi las dang nyon mongs pa kun du 'byung ba'i gnyen por mi ldog pa yin te /
translated: The antidote to the arising of the activities of Mara and the defilements is the stage of nonregression,

original: ye shes mi bzlog pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ye shes mi bzlog pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because one's intuition becomes irreversible.

original: de'i phyir nye ba'i nyon mongs pa rnam pa gnyis yin pa'i phyir nye ba'i nyon mongs pa'i gnyen po'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir nye ba'i nyon mongs pa rnam pa gnyis yin pa'i phyir nye ba'i nyon mongs pa'i gnyen po'o //
translated: Therefore, it is the antidote to the secondary defilements, because it is the antidote to the two kinds of secondary defilements.

original: zab pa nyid ni rnyed par dka' ba'o //
analyzed: zab pa nyid ni rnyed par dka' ba'o //
translated: Depth means difficult to attain.

original: spyod pa rnam par dag ba ni gzhon nu'i sa'o ;
analyzed: spyod pa rnam par dag ba ni gzhon nu'i sa'o ;
translated: The purity of practice is the stage of youth.

original: / gnas pa rnam par dag pa ni skye ba'i sa'o //
analyzed: / gnas pa rnam par dag pa ni skye ba'i sa'o //
translated: The purity of abiding is the stage of birth.

original: 'jig rten pa'i 'dus byas rnam par dag pa'i khyad par ni yongs su grub pa'i sa'o //
analyzed: 'jig rten pa'i 'dus byas rnam par dag pa'i khyad par ni yongs su grub pa'i sa'o //
translated: The special purity of the conditioned things of the world is the stage of total.

original: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i de bzhin mnyam pa nyid thob pa dang / rnam pa gnyis su rab tu bstan //
analyzed: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i de bzhin mnyam pa nyid thob pa dang / rnam pa gnyis su rab tu bstan //
translated: The attainment of the equality of the supramundane suchness is taught as twofold.

original: 'dis ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams dang thun mong ma yin pa'i don dam pa'i ye shes bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: 'dis ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams dang thun mong ma yin pa'i don dam pa'i ye shes bshad pa yin no //
translated: This explains the intuition of the ultimate truth, which is not common to the disciples and hermit buddhas.

original: ji lta zhe na /
analyzed: ji lta zhe na /
translated: How is that?

original: de lus su rnam par rtog pa thams cad dang bral zhing lus mnyam pa nyid thob pas zhes 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
