original: 'bras bu gnas skabs nges pa yin //
analyzed: 'bras bu gnas skabs nges pa yin //
translated: Karma is determined in terms of its result, its time, and its place.üîΩKarma is determined in terms of its result, its time, and

original: bshad pa'i snod rab tu dbye bas ni dbang po tha ma dang 'bring dang rab nyid kyang zhes 'byung ba'i phyir te /
analyzed: bshad pa'i snod rab tu dbye bas ni dbang po tha ma dang 'bring dang rab nyid kyang zhes 'byung ba'i phyir te /
translated: The classification of the vessel for the explanation is also the classification of the faculties as lesser, middling, and great.

original: dbang po dang 'tsham par bshad pa 'jug pas so //
analyzed: dbang po dang 'tsham par bshad pa 'jug pas so //
translated: The explanation is engaged in accordance with the faculties.

original: snga ma 'bogs pa nyid ces bya ba ni de la dbang po sbyong ba na dbang po snga ma 'bogs pa nyid khyad par du 'phags pa nyid du 'pho ste /
analyzed: snga ma 'bogs pa nyid ces bya ba ni de la dbang po sbyong ba na dbang po snga ma 'bogs pa nyid khyad par du 'phags pa nyid du 'pho ste /
translated: The term ‚Äúexchanging the former‚Äù means that when one cultivates the faculties, one exchanges the former faculty for a superior one.

original: 'di ltar dad pas rjes su 'brang ba sbyangs na lam gzhan la mthong bas thob par 'gyur ro zhes 'byung ba lta bu'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar dad pas rjes su 'brang ba sbyangs na lam gzhan la mthong bas thob par 'gyur ro zhes 'byung ba lta bu'o //
translated: For example, it is said that if one who follows faith cultivates the path, one becomes one who obtains by insight.

original: de bzhin du dbang po gzhan yang sbyangs na mchog tu 'gyur ba'i phyir snga ma 'bogs pa nyid du rig par bya ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du dbang po gzhan yang sbyangs na mchog tu 'gyur ba'i phyir snga ma 'bogs pa nyid du rig par bya ste /
translated: In the same way, if one cultivates the other faculties, one becomes superior. Thus one should understand that one exchanges the former.

original: de ltar na sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' zhes bya ba'i sgra rnam par bkrol ba yin no //
analyzed: de ltar na sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' zhes bya ba'i sgra rnam par bkrol ba yin no //
translated: This is the explanation of the terms ‚Äúformer‚Äù and ‚Äúlater.‚Äù

original: snga ma rnams las phyi ma rnams dma' ba dang khyad par du 'phags pa nyid dang zhes bya ba la de la dma' ba nyid ni dper na chos kyis rjes su 'brang bas dad pas mos pa dang dus kyis rnam par grol ba lta bu'o //
analyzed: snga ma rnams las phyi ma rnams dma' ba dang khyad par du 'phags pa nyid dang zhes bya ba la de la dma' ba nyid ni dper na chos kyis rjes su 'brang bas dad pas mos pa dang dus kyis rnam par grol ba lta bu'o //
translated: Lower means, for example, one who follows the teachings and one resolute in faith are lower than one liberated according to circumstances.

original: khyad par du 'phags pa nyid ni de nyid dang dad pas rjes su 'brang ba bas mthong bas 'thob pa dang / dus dang mi sbyor bas rnam par grol ba dag lta bu ste /
analyzed: khyad par du 'phags pa nyid ni de nyid dang dad pas rjes su 'brang ba bas mthong bas 'thob pa dang / dus dang mi sbyor bas rnam par grol ba dag lta bu ste /
translated: Superior means, for example, one who obtains results by insight is superior to one resolute in faith and one liberated regardless of circumstances is superior to one liberated according to circumstances.

original: gcig pas ni rtogs pas khyad par du 'phags la cig shos pas ni dbang po dang rtogs pas khyad par du 'phags so //
analyzed: gcig pas ni rtogs pas khyad par du 'phags la cig shos pas ni dbang po dang rtogs pas khyad par du 'phags so //
translated: The former is superior by realization and the latter is superior by both faculty and realization.

original: 'di ni tha dad pa zhes bya ba'i sgra 'brel ba yin te gcig tu gyur pa ma yin pa'i phyir tha dad pa ni so so ba kho na yin no //
analyzed: 'di ni tha dad pa zhes bya ba'i sgra 'brel ba yin te gcig tu gyur pa ma yin pa'i phyir tha dad pa ni so so ba kho na yin no //
translated: This is the meaning of the term different because they are not the same.

original: mtshungs pa nyid ni dad pas rjes su 'brang ba bas dad pas mos pa dang dus kyis rnam par grol ba dag dbang po'i sgo nas mtshungs kyi rtogs pas ma yin pa dang / chos kyis rjes su 'brang ba bas mthong bas thob pa dang dus dang mi sbyor bas rnam par grol ba dag snga ma bzhin pa lta bu ste /
analyzed: mtshungs pa nyid ni dad pas rjes su 'brang ba bas dad pas mos pa dang dus kyis rnam par grol ba dag dbang po'i sgo nas mtshungs kyi rtogs pas ma yin pa dang / chos kyis rjes su 'brang ba bas mthong bas thob pa dang dus dang mi sbyor bas rnam par grol ba dag snga ma bzhin pa lta bu ste /
translated: Those resolute in doctrine and those obtaining results by insight and those liberated regardless of circumstances are similar to the former.

original: de nyid kyi phyir snga phyi lam tha dad pa ma yin pa kho nas tha dad pa ma yin pa nyid ces bya ba ni sgra rnam par bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir snga phyi lam tha dad pa ma yin pa kho nas tha dad pa ma yin pa nyid ces bya ba ni sgra rnam par bshad pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, the etymology of ‚Äúnondistinct‚Äù is that the former and latter paths are not distinct.

original: theg pa gsum gyi rigs rab tu dbye ba ni /
analyzed: theg pa gsum gyi rigs rab tu dbye ba ni /
translated: The classification of lineages of the three vehicles

original: rgya chen po dang 'bring dang tha ma nyid ces bya ba yin no //
analyzed: rgya chen po dang 'bring dang tha ma nyid ces bya ba yin no //
translated: is extensive, middling, and small.

original: yid dang bde ba la sogs pa'i dbang po rnams kyi nyon mongs pa kun nas dkris pa nyid ni nyon mongs pa mngon du gyur pa nyid do //
analyzed: yid dang bde ba la sogs pa'i dbang po rnams kyi nyon mongs pa kun nas dkris pa nyid ni nyon mongs pa mngon du gyur pa nyid do //
translated: The entanglements of the mental faculty and the faculties of pleasure, etc., are the manifest afflictions.

original: nyon mongs pa bag la nyal ba nyid ni sa bon gyi ngo bor gnas pa nyid de nyon @107b mongs pa dang lhan cig skyes shing tha mi dang pa nyid ces 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa bag la nyal ba nyid ni sa bon gyi ngo bor gnas pa nyid de nyon @107b mongs pa dang lhan cig skyes shing tha mi dang pa nyid ces 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: The latent afflictions are the seeds of the afflictions, because they are born together with the afflictions and are not separate from them.

original: theg pa dang theg pa ma yin pa la nges pa dang ma nges pa dang yongs su smin par nges pa dang ma nges pa nyid ces bya ba ni bshad pa nyid las gsal bar zad do //
analyzed: theg pa dang theg pa ma yin pa la nges pa dang ma nges pa dang yongs su smin par nges pa dang ma nges pa nyid ces bya ba ni bshad pa nyid las gsal bar zad do //
translated: As for the certainty and uncertainty of the vehicles and the certainty and uncertainty of complete maturation, these are clear in the explanation.

original: rten 'byung ba ni skye mched drug po dag phan tshun 'brel bar rjes su 'brang ba'o //
analyzed: rten 'byung ba ni skye mched drug po dag phan tshun 'brel bar rjes su 'brang ba'o //
translated: The support is the six sense spheres, which are mutually related and follow one another.

original: myur du 'jig pa ni skyes ma thag tu 'jig pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: myur du 'jig pa ni skyes ma thag tu 'jig pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Rapid destruction is because they are destroyed immediately after arising.

original: dmigs pa la 'byung ba ni skyes pa dang bud med la sogs pa mtshan mar 'dzin pa ste dbang po'i dra ba'i rjes su 'brang ba dang myur du 'jig pa dang / mtshan mar 'dzin pa nyid ces gsungs pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: dmigs pa la 'byung ba ni skyes pa dang bud med la sogs pa mtshan mar 'dzin pa ste dbang po'i dra ba'i rjes su 'brang ba dang myur du 'jig pa dang / mtshan mar 'dzin pa nyid ces gsungs pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: Arising from the objective support is the apprehension of signs of women and men, etc., which is the following of the net of the sense faculties, rapid destruction, and the apprehension of signs.

original: lam gyi dbang gis mi mthun pa'i phyogs las rgyal ba'i don zhes bya ba la lam smos pas ni kun shes pa la sogs pa'i dbang po gsum ston par byed de /
analyzed: lam gyi dbang gis mi mthun pa'i phyogs las rgyal ba'i don zhes bya ba la lam smos pas ni kun shes pa la sogs pa'i dbang po gsum ston par byed de /
translated: The meaning of victory over adverse factors by the power of the path is stated by the word path, which indicates the three faculties of understanding all, etc.

original: dbang po'i dbang gis mi rdzi ba nyid ces gsungs pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: dbang po'i dbang gis mi rdzi ba nyid ces gsungs pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: The meaning of not being crushed by the power of the faculties is stated by the word faculty.

original: phyir ldog pa ni sa gang las phyir ldog pa'i srid pa'o //
analyzed: phyir ldog pa ni sa gang las phyir ldog pa'i srid pa'o //
translated: Retrogression is the possibility of falling from any stage.

original: phyir mi ldog pa ni gang las 'gal ba'i rkyen rnams kyis kyang mi bzlogs pa ste /
analyzed: phyir mi ldog pa ni gang las 'gal ba'i rkyen rnams kyis kyang mi bzlogs pa ste /
translated: Nonretrogression is the state of not being turned back by adverse conditions.

original: dbang po bzlog tu rung ba dang / bzlog tu mi rung ba rab tu rnam par dbye ba nyid ces gsungs pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: dbang po bzlog tu rung ba dang / bzlog tu mi rung ba rab tu rnam par dbye ba nyid ces gsungs pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: The meaning of the distinction of faculties that can be turned back and those that cannot be turned back is stated by the word faculty.

original: sbyor ba las byung ba ni dad pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: sbyor ba las byung ba ni dad pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: Faculties derived from preparation are faith, etc.

original: rnam par smin pa ni mig la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par smin pa ni mig la sogs pa'o //
translated: Faculties derived from maturation are the eyes, etc.

original: de gnyis smos pa ni ring du song ba dang lhan cig skyes pa rnam pa sna tshogs tha dad pa nyid ces 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de gnyis smos pa ni ring du song ba dang lhan cig skyes pa rnam pa sna tshogs tha dad pa nyid ces 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: The statement of these two is because the Abhidharmakosa states, The distant and the innate are of various types.

original: bag la nyal ni rjes su 'brang ba'i don du rig par bya zhes bya ba ni rims nyin bzhi pa bzhin te /
analyzed: bag la nyal ni rjes su 'brang ba'i don du rig par bya zhes bya ba ni rims nyin bzhi pa bzhin te /
translated: Latent afflictions should be understood as following, like the four-day fever.

original: bsam pa dang lhan cig skyes pa dang sems dang lhan cig skyes pa nyid kyang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te zhes gang gsungs pa ste /
analyzed: bsam pa dang lhan cig skyes pa dang sems dang lhan cig skyes pa nyid kyang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te zhes gang gsungs pa ste /
translated: It is said that one knows exactly the intention and the innate nature of the mind and its innate nature.

original: sbyor ba las byung ba dang / rnam par smin pa las rjes su 'brang ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sbyor ba las byung ba dang / rnam par smin pa las rjes su 'brang ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because they follow the mind arisen from karma and the mind arisen from karmic maturation.

original: gang du rjes su 'brang zhe na /
analyzed: gang du rjes su 'brang zhe na /
translated: Where do they follow?

original: rnam par smin pa'i sems la ste /
analyzed: rnam par smin pa'i sems la ste /
translated: They follow the mind of karmic maturation.

original: sems dang mtshungs par ldan pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa ma yin par dbye ba zhes gsungs pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: sems dang mtshungs par ldan pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa ma yin par dbye ba zhes gsungs pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: The mind is classified as associated and not associated.

original: bag la nyal rnam par smin pa'i sems gang dang mtshungs par ldan pa de ni bsgo bar bya ba yin pa'i phyir la /
analyzed: bag la nyal rnam par smin pa'i sems gang dang mtshungs par ldan pa de ni bsgo bar bya ba yin pa'i phyir la /
translated: The latent afflictions are associated with the mind of karmic maturation because they are to be abandoned.

original: rnam par smin pa'i sems gang dang mtshungs par ldan pa ma yin pa de ni bsgo bar bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam par smin pa'i sems gang dang mtshungs par ldan pa ma yin pa de ni bsgo bar bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the mind that is not associated with the maturation of karma is not to be commanded.

original: 'o na go ji ltar de la rjes su 'brang @108a * //
analyzed: 'o na go ji ltar de la rjes su 'brang @108a * //
translated: How then does it follow?

original: zhe na des byas pa'i las rjes su 'brang ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zhe na des byas pa'i las rjes su 'brang ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the karma that it creates follows it.

original: bar chad med par rnam pa sna tshogs yun ring po nas rjes su 'brang ba ni ring nas rjes su zhugs pa zhes 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bar chad med par rnam pa sna tshogs yun ring po nas rjes su 'brang ba ni ring nas rjes su zhugs pa zhes 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: It is said that it follows for a long time, for a long period, because it follows various types of karma without interruption.

original: thog ma med pa'i dus nas ma bstsal ba nyid de ma bton pa dang / de la yang rjes su 'brang ba'i phyir bsam gtan la sogs pa thams cad kyis kyang mi mjed pa nyid de 'di gnyis kyis na dbang po nyid du rjes su 'brang ba yin no //
analyzed: thog ma med pa'i dus nas ma bstsal ba nyid de ma bton pa dang / de la yang rjes su 'brang ba'i phyir bsam gtan la sogs pa thams cad kyis kyang mi mjed pa nyid de 'di gnyis kyis na dbang po nyid du rjes su 'brang ba yin no //
translated: It is not expelled from beginningless time, because it is not expelled, and because it follows it, it is not destroyed by any meditative development, etc. These two are the reason it follows as a faculty.

original: khams gsum pa'i mtshams sbyor bas shin tu sbrel bar byed pa nyid dang / thog ma med pa'i dus nas sems bcings par kun du 'byung ba nyid dang skye mched kyi sgo nas rnam par rig pa 'byung ba nyid ces bya ba tshig gsum gyis ni go rims bzhin du khams dang sems dang yul thams cad du song bas rjes su 'brangüîΩba bstan to //
analyzed: khams gsum pa'i mtshams sbyor bas shin tu sbrel bar byed pa nyid dang / thog ma med pa'i dus nas sems bcings par kun du 'byung ba nyid dang skye mched kyi sgo nas rnam par rig pa 'byung ba nyid ces bya ba tshig gsum gyis ni go rims bzhin du khams dang sems dang yul thams cad du song bas rjes su 'brang ba bstan to //
translated: The three phrases, ‚Äúit is the bond of the three realms,‚Äù ‚Äúit arises as the fetter of the mind since beginningless time,‚Äù and ‚Äúit is the source of the arising of consciousness through the sense bases,‚Äù indicate that it is the universal because it pervades the realms, the mind, and all objects, respectively.

original: gnyen po yod pa'i don yin pa ni gnyen po thob pa rdzas su gyur pa nyid ces gsungs pa gang yin pa ste /
analyzed: gnyen po yod pa'i don yin pa ni gnyen po thob pa rdzas su gyur pa nyid ces gsungs pa gang yin pa ste /
translated: The phrase, ‚Äúit is the universal because it is the object of the antidote,‚Äù means that it is the universal because it is the object of the antidote that has been attained.

original: bag la nyal ni rnam par rtog pas kun nas bslang ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bag la nyal ni rnam par rtog pas kun nas bslang ba'i phyir ro //
translated: The latent afflictions are not universal because they are aroused by conceptualization.

original: phra ba rjes su 'brang ba la skye mched drug la zhes bya ba ni de'i 'bras bu rnam par shes pa rnams la bya'o //
analyzed: phra ba rjes su 'brang ba la skye mched drug la zhes bya ba ni de'i 'bras bu rnam par shes pa rnams la bya'o //
translated: The phrase, ‚Äúit is the universal because it is subtle and pervasive,‚Äù means that it is the universal because it is the object of the six sense bases, which is the result of the universal.

original: nyon mongs pa'i bdag nyid bag la nyal gyi bdag nyid du mi phrad la kun nas dkris pa'i bdag nyid du ni ma phrad pa ste nyon mongs bag la nyal gyi bdag nyid dang kun nas dkris pa'i bdag nyid du gnas pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: nyon mongs pa'i bdag nyid bag la nyal gyi bdag nyid du mi phrad la kun nas dkris pa'i bdag nyid du ni ma phrad pa ste nyon mongs bag la nyal gyi bdag nyid dang kun nas dkris pa'i bdag nyid du gnas pa'i phyir te /
translated: It does not contact the dormant state of the afflictions, but it does contact the state of the entanglements.

original: sa dang skye mched dang phrad pa dang ma phrad pa nyid ces gsungs pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: sa dang skye mched dang phrad pa dang ma phrad pa nyid ces gsungs pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: It is said that it contacts the elements and sense bases, but it does not contact them.

original: 'jig rten las 'das pa ma yin pa'i lam gyis spangs par bya ba ma yin pa ni gzhan ma yin pa 'phags pa'i lam gyis gsal ba zhes gsungs pa gang yin pa ste /
analyzed: 'jig rten las 'das pa ma yin pa'i lam gyis spangs par bya ba ma yin pa ni gzhan ma yin pa 'phags pa'i lam gyis gsal ba zhes gsungs pa gang yin pa ste /
translated: It is said that it is not eliminated by the mundane path, but it is eliminated by the supramundane path.

original: gzhan ma yin pa ni 'phags pa'i lam mo //
analyzed: gzhan ma yin pa ni 'phags pa'i lam mo //
translated: The supramundane path is not other than it.

original: skye ba'i rgyu ba thibs pos rab tu dbye ba ni mdo las ji skad 'byung bar zad pa'i phyir shes par sla'o //
analyzed: skye ba'i rgyu ba thibs pos rab tu dbye ba ni mdo las ji skad 'byung bar zad pa'i phyir shes par sla'o //
translated: It is said that it is distinguished by the thickets of the causes of birth, but it is easy to understand because it is as stated in the sutras.

original: 'bras bu 'byin par nye bar gnas pa dang nye bar mi gnas pa'i bye brag ces bya ba la /
analyzed: 'bras bu 'byin par nye bar gnas pa dang nye bar mi gnas pa'i bye brag ces bya ba la /
translated: It is said that it is distinguished by the difference between the near and far in terms of producing results.

original: bag chags ni sa bon no //
analyzed: bag chags ni sa bon no //
translated: Habit energy is a seed.

original: bag chags gang dag 'bras bu 'byin par kun du 'byung ba de dag ni nye bar btags pa ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: bag chags gang dag 'bras bu 'byin par kun du 'byung ba de dag ni nye bar btags pa ma yin pa'o //
translated: Those habit energies that are ready to produce results are not imputed.

original: ji lta zhe na /
analyzed: ji lta zhe na /
translated: How is that?

original: 'di ltar de dag ni 'bras bu dngos su mngon par bsgrub pa'i phyir nye bar btags pa ma yin te dngos su sa bon nyid yin zhing bag chags nyid yin no //
analyzed: 'di ltar de dag ni 'bras bu dngos su mngon par bsgrub pa'i phyir nye bar btags pa ma yin te dngos su sa bon nyid yin zhing bag chags nyid yin no //
translated: They are not imputed because they directly produce the result, and they are seeds and habit energies in the direct sense.

original: gang @108b dag 'bras bu 'byin par nye bar mi gnas pa de dag ni btags pa'i bag chags nyid yin pas sa bon tshig pa bzhin du nye bar btags pa yin te /
analyzed: gang @108b dag 'bras bu 'byin par nye bar mi gnas pa de dag ni btags pa'i bag chags nyid yin pas sa bon tshig pa bzhin du nye bar btags pa yin te /
translated: Those that are not ready to produce results are imputed habit energies, like seeds that have been burned.

original: bag chags rnams kyi nye bar gtags pa dang nye bar btags pa ma yin pa nyid du gsungs pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: bag chags rnams kyi nye bar gtags pa dang nye bar btags pa ma yin pa nyid du gsungs pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: This is the explanation of the difference between the habit energies that are ready to produce results and those that are not.

original: 'gro ba'i bag chags kyi bye brag gis zhes bya ba ni 'gro ba gang dang nyon mongs pa'i bag chags gang du 'brel ba des bsgos pa nyid ces de ston par byed do //
analyzed: 'gro ba'i bag chags kyi bye brag gis zhes bya ba ni 'gro ba gang dang nyon mongs pa'i bag chags gang du 'brel ba des bsgos pa nyid ces de ston par byed do //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúby the various habit energies of the world‚Äù shows that the habit energies of a certain world and the habit energies of a certain passion are connected, and that the world is perfumed by the passions.

original: sems can dang bstan pa'i bag chags kyi bye brag gis zhes gang smras pa ni sems can ji lta bur gyur pa dag dang 'grogs pa'i rgyus spyod pa spyad pa des bsgos pa nyid ces bya ba yin no //
analyzed: sems can dang bstan pa'i bag chags kyi bye brag gis zhes gang smras pa ni sems can ji lta bur gyur pa dag dang 'grogs pa'i rgyus spyod pa spyad pa des bsgos pa nyid ces bya ba yin no //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúdue to the specific latent impressions of sentient beings and the teaching‚Äù means that the perfuming is due to the practice of the bodhisattva‚Äôs conduct in association with sentient beings of a certain kind.

original: bzo'i las kyi nyon mongs pa'i bag chags kyi bye brag gis zhes bya ba ni 'di skad du /
analyzed: bzo'i las kyi nyon mongs pa'i bag chags kyi bye brag gis zhes bya ba ni 'di skad du /
translated: ‚ÄúDue to the specific latent impressions of the afflictions of the activities of craftsmanship‚Äù means that the perfuming is due to the practice of the bodhisattva‚Äôs conduct in association with sentient beings of a certain kind.

original: las ni 'dir bzo'i las yin gyi dge ba la sogs pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: las ni 'dir bzo'i las yin gyi dge ba la sogs pa ni ma yin no //
translated: Here, action refers to the activities of craftsmanship and not to virtue and so on.

original: nyon mongs pa yang 'dir de bslab pa'i phyir yongs su dub pa yin gyi 'dod chags la sogs pa ni ma yin no zhes bshad pa yin te /
analyzed: nyon mongs pa yang 'dir de bslab pa'i phyir yongs su dub pa yin gyi 'dod chags la sogs pa ni ma yin no zhes bshad pa yin te /
translated: And here, affliction refers to the fatigue of training and not to passion and so on.

original: las ji lta ba bzhin du nyon mongs pa goms par byas pas bsgos pa nyid ces gsungs pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: las ji lta ba bzhin du nyon mongs pa goms par byas pas bsgos pa nyid ces gsungs pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: This is what is being said: the perfuming is due to the cultivation of the afflictions in accordance with the action.

original: las ni 'di yin gyi gzhan ni ma yin no zhes bya ba 'di la gtan tshigs ni dge ba la sogs pa'i las mjug thogs su ston pa yin no //
analyzed: las ni 'di yin gyi gzhan ni ma yin no zhes bya ba 'di la gtan tshigs ni dge ba la sogs pa'i las mjug thogs su ston pa yin no //
translated: The reason that the action is just this and not something else is that the teaching is immediately after the action of virtue and so on.

original: bar ma do'i srid pa'i bag chags kyi bye brag gis ni bar ma don yod pa'i srid pa des yang srid par 'gro ba ste /
analyzed: bar ma do'i srid pa'i bag chags kyi bye brag gis ni bar ma don yod pa'i srid pa des yang srid par 'gro ba ste /
translated: By the specific latent impressions of the intermediate existence, one goes to the next existence by means of that intermediate existence.

original: de bzhin du mdo las 'byung bar zad do //üîΩ'bras bu 'byin pa'i rim gyi bye brag gis zhes bya ba ni goms pa gang yin pa dang zhes bya ba la sogs pas khong du chud par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du mdo las 'byung bar zad do // 'bras bu 'byin pa'i rim gyi bye brag gis zhes bya ba ni goms pa gang yin pa dang zhes bya ba la sogs pas khong du chud par bya'o //
translated: It is just as it appears in the sutra.

original: 'jig rten pa'i nges par 'byung ba'i bag chags kyi bye brag gis zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs pa'i rgyun mi 'chad pa ste /
analyzed: 'jig rten pa'i nges par 'byung ba'i bag chags kyi bye brag gis zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs pa'i rgyun mi 'chad pa ste /
translated: By the specific stages of the evolution of the result, one should understand by the specific latent impressions of the mundane emergence, the uninterrupted continuum of the afflictions.

original: ji lta zhe na /
analyzed: ji lta zhe na /
translated: How is that?

original: bag chags ring du song ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bag chags ring du song ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the latent impressions are far advanced.

original: dus re zhig rnam par mnan pa'i phyir nyon mongs pa 'grib par byed pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: dus re zhig rnam par mnan pa'i phyir nyon mongs pa 'grib par byed pa ni ma yin te /
translated: The afflictions are not diminished because they are temporarily suppressed.

original: de bzhin du mdo las 'byung bar zad do //
analyzed: de bzhin du mdo las 'byung bar zad do //
translated: It is just as it appears in the sutra.

original: chos 'di pa rnams kyi thar pa'i tshogs gyi bag chags ni rdzas su gyur pa ste /
analyzed: chos 'di pa rnams kyi thar pa'i tshogs gyi bag chags ni rdzas su gyur pa ste /
translated: The latent impressions of the accumulation of the liberation of those who are in this Dharma are substantial.

original: thar pa yang dag pa 'thob pa'i thabs yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: thar pa yang dag pa 'thob pa'i thabs yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is the means of attaining true liberation.

original: gzhan mu stegs can rnams kyi ni de lta ma yin pas rdzas su ma gyur pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: gzhan mu stegs can rnams kyi ni de lta ma yin pas rdzas su ma gyur pa zhes bya'o //
translated: But this is not so for the other tƒ´rthikas, so they are said to be not substantial.

original: theg pa'i bag chags kyi bye brag gis ni mdo las ji skad 'byung bar zad pa'i @109a * //üîΩphyir gsal lo //
analyzed: theg pa'i bag chags kyi bye brag gis ni mdo las ji skad 'byung bar zad pa'i @109a * // phyir gsal lo //
translated: The three vehicles are definitely distinguished by the seeds of the three vehicles, as stated in the s≈´tras.

original: yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos can rnams ni theg pa gsum la gcig tu nges pa ste /
analyzed: yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos can rnams ni theg pa gsum la gcig tu nges pa ste /
translated: Those who have the quality of attaining nirvana are definitely fixed in the three vehicles,

original: sems can gyi tshogs yang dag pa nyid du nges pa nyid ces gsungs pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: sems can gyi tshogs yang dag pa nyid du nges pa nyid ces gsungs pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: as stated in the s≈´tras: ‚ÄúThe assembly of sentient beings is definitely fixed in reality.‚Äù

original: yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' ba'i chos can rnams ni ;üîΩlog pa nyid du nges pa'i phyir //
analyzed: yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' ba'i chos can rnams ni ; log pa nyid du nges pa'i phyir //
translated: Those who have the quality of not attaining nirvana

original: gcig tu ma nges pa yin te //üîΩlog pa nyid du nges pa nyid //
analyzed: gcig tu ma nges pa yin te // log pa nyid du nges pa nyid //
translated: are not definitely fixed in one vehicle,üîΩbecause they are definitely fixed in error.

original: ces 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ces 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: As it is said, ‚ÄúThey are definitely fixed in error.‚Äù

original: de gnyis kar ma nges pa nyid ni gang dag rkyen ji lta ba bzhin du dam pa dang dam pa ma yin pa'i chos mnyan pa'i rgyus theg pa gsum la gcig tu nges pa'am gcig tu ma nges pa gcig tu bsgrub par 'gyur ba ste /üîΩgnyi gar ma nges pa nyid ces 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de gnyis kar ma nges pa nyid ni gang dag rkyen ji lta ba bzhin du dam pa dang dam pa ma yin pa'i chos mnyan pa'i rgyus theg pa gsum la gcig tu nges pa'am gcig tu ma nges pa gcig tu bsgrub par 'gyur ba ste / gnyi gar ma nges pa nyid ces 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: The definite are those who are definitely one or the other through the specific causes of good or bad action.üîΩThe definite are those who are definitely one or the other through the specific causes of good or bad action.üîΩThe definite are those who are definitely one or the other through the specific causes of good or bad action.üîΩThe definite are those who are definitely one or the other through the specific causes of good or bad action.üîΩThe definite are those who are definitely one or the other through the specific causes of good or bad action.

analyzed: log par lta bas de dang 'dra'o //
translated: The definite are those who are definitely one or the other through the specific causes of good or bad action.üîΩThe definite are those who are definitely one or the other through the specific causes of good or bad action.üîΩThe definite are those who are definitely one or the other through the specific causes of good or bad action.üîΩThe definite are those who are definitely one or the other through the specific causes of good or bad action.üîΩThe definite are those who are definitely one or the other through the specific causes of good or bad action.üîΩThe definite are those who are definitely one or the other through the specific causes of good or bad action.üîΩThe definite are those who are definitely one or the other through the specific causes of good or bad action.üîΩThe definite are those who are definitely one or the other through the specific causes of good or bad action.üîΩThe definite are those who are definitely one or the other through the specific causes of good or bad action.üîΩThe definite are those who are definitely one or the other through the specific causes of good or bad action.

original: ngan 'gro'i rgyu'i bye brag gis ni mtshams med pa lnga po dag gang yang rung ba zhig tu log par nges pa ste /
analyzed: ngan 'gro'i rgyu'i bye brag gis ni mtshams med pa lnga po dag gang yang rung ba zhig tu log par nges pa ste /
translated: By the specific causes of unfortunate rebirth, one is definitely destined for any of the five heinous actions.

original: log pa kho na log pa nyid yin la der nges pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: log pa kho na log pa nyid yin la der nges pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Only the wrong is the wrongness, because one is definitely destined for that.

original: bde 'gro'i rgyu'i bye brag gis ni dad pa la sogs pa dbang po lnga la yang dag par nges pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: bde 'gro'i rgyu'i bye brag gis ni dad pa la sogs pa dbang po lnga la yang dag par nges pa'i phyir te /
translated: By the specific causes of fortunate rebirth, one is definitely destined for the five faculties such as faith.

original: 'dir yang yang dag pa kho na yang dag pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: 'dir yang yang dag pa kho na yang dag pa nyid yin no //
translated: Here, only the right is the rightness.

original: de gnyi ga dang bral bas nges pa med pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: de gnyi ga dang bral bas nges pa med pa nyid yin no //
translated: One is not definitely destined for either of those two.

original: mi dal bar skye ba brgyad du log par nges pa ni mu stegs can rnams so //
analyzed: mi dal bar skye ba brgyad du log par nges pa ni mu stegs can rnams so //
translated: Those who are destined for the wrong in eight births as non-humans are the tƒ´rthikas.

original: yang dag par mya ngan las 'das pa la yang dag par nges pa nyid ni 'phags pa nyan thos rnams so //
analyzed: yang dag par mya ngan las 'das pa la yang dag par nges pa nyid ni 'phags pa nyan thos rnams so //
translated: Those who are definitely destined for the right nirvƒÅ·πáa are the noble ≈õrƒÅvakas.

original: yang byar med pa ni log pa nyid dang / yang dag pa nyid dag dang go rims bzhin te spangs zin pa'i phyir dang / thob zin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: yang byar med pa ni log pa nyid dang / yang dag pa nyid dag dang go rims bzhin te spangs zin pa'i phyir dang / thob zin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: Again, the absence of activity is both the false and the real, respectively, because of the abandonment and the attainment.

original: nges pa med pa ni snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: nges pa med pa ni snga ma bzhin no //
translated: The absence of certainty is as before.

original: ser sna ma bzlog pas don du gnyer ba'i sems can rnams yal bar 'dor ro //
analyzed: ser sna ma bzlog pas don du gnyer ba'i sems can rnams yal bar 'dor ro //
translated: Because of the absence of the abandonment of stinginess, one abandons the sentient beings who are in need.

original: phrag dog ma bzlog pas sems can gzhan dag 'byor bar mi 'dod do //
analyzed: phrag dog ma bzlog pas sems can gzhan dag 'byor bar mi 'dod do //
translated: Because of the absence of the abandonment of envy, one does not wish for the success of other sentient beings.

original: ngan pa nye bar spyod pa ma bzlog pas gzhan dag la sdug bsngal nye bar bsgrub ste /
analyzed: ngan pa nye bar spyod pa ma bzlog pas gzhan dag la sdug bsngal nye bar bsgrub ste /
translated: Because of the absence of the abandonment of bad conduct, one establishes others in suffering.

original: ngan pa ni smad pa'o //
analyzed: ngan pa ni smad pa'o //
translated: Bad is contemptible.

original: de spyod pa ni yul te /
analyzed: de spyod pa ni yul te /
translated: Conduct is the object.

original: sems can la gnod @109b par zhugs pa'i lus dang ngag gi las dag go //
analyzed: sems can la gnod @109b par zhugs pa'i lus dang ngag gi las dag go //
translated: It is the volitional action of body and speech that is engaged in harming sentient beings.

original: de gnyis ni dam pa rnams kyis smad par bya ba yin pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: de gnyis ni dam pa rnams kyis smad par bya ba yin pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because those two are to be despised by the holy ones.

original: de'i phyir tshul 'dis byang chub sems dpa' log pa nyid du nges pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir tshul 'dis byang chub sems dpa' log pa nyid du nges pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, by this method, the bodhisattva is determined to be false.

original: rgyu gnyis pa bshad pa bsgrub pas ni yang dag pa nyid du nges par 'gyur te /
analyzed: rgyu gnyis pa bshad pa bsgrub pas ni yang dag pa nyid du nges par 'gyur te /
translated: The second cause, the cause of the certainty of the right, is the practice of the teaching.

original: 'phags pa bla na med pa'i lam sgom pa nye bar sgrub pas yang dag par nges pa nyid ces 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'phags pa bla na med pa'i lam sgom pa nye bar sgrub pas yang dag par nges pa nyid ces 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: The noble path is practiced and accomplished, and so it is called the certainty of the right.

original: gnyi ga med pas ma nges pa yin te /
analyzed: gnyi ga med pas ma nges pa yin te /
translated: The third cause, the cause of the uncertainty of the wrong, is the non-practice of the teaching.

original: de bzhin du mdo las 'byung bar zad do //
analyzed: de bzhin du mdo las 'byung bar zad do //
translated: The S≈´tra explains it in the same way.

original: spyod pa la 'jug pa phun sum tshogs pa de lta bu yin no //
analyzed: spyod pa la 'jug pa phun sum tshogs pa de lta bu yin no //
translated: This is the perfection of the practice of the bodhisattva.

original: ci zhig shes nas ston zhe na //
analyzed: ci zhig shes nas ston zhe na //
translated: What is taught by knowing what?

original: rnam grol snod ces bya ba dang // rnam par grol ba'i mtshan nyid dang // theg pa gsum po rab ston phyir //
analyzed: rnam grol snod ces bya ba dang // rnam par grol ba'i mtshan nyid dang // theg pa gsum po rab ston phyir //
translated: The vessel of liberation, the characteristics of liberation, and the teaching of the three vehicles,

original: rnam grol rab tu dbye ba'o //
analyzed: rnam grol rab tu dbye ba'o //
translated: are the divisions of liberation.

original: yongs su smin par gyur pas zhes bya ba la yongs su smin pa ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs bstsal ba ste /
analyzed: yongs su smin par gyur pas zhes bya ba la yongs su smin pa ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs bstsal ba ste /
translated: Having become mature, means having eliminated the adverse elements.

original: rma yongs su smin pa bzhin no //
analyzed: rma yongs su smin pa bzhin no //
translated: It is like a wound that has matured.

original: skal ba dang ldan pa nyid du byed pas gnyen po bskyed pa ste ;
analyzed: skal ba dang ldan pa nyid du byed pas gnyen po bskyed pa ste ;
translated: It is the generation of the antidote, because it makes one fit.

original: zas yongs su smin pa bzhin no //
analyzed: zas yongs su smin pa bzhin no //
translated: like food that is fully digested.

original: 'dul bas zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: 'dul bas zhes bya ba ni /
translated: By means of the Vinaya,

original: sems can rnams 'dul ba'i rgyu nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dag 'dul bar byed pa ste /
analyzed: sems can rnams 'dul ba'i rgyu nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dag 'dul bar byed pa ste /

original: de'i rang bzhin ni de dag nye bar zhi ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin ni de dag nye bar zhi ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Its nature is the pacification of those.

original: gdul bya rnams kyi snod brtags nas //üîΩgnyen po nye bar ston pa'i phyir ;üîΩ/ dbang du byas nas bshad pa ni //
analyzed: gdul bya rnams kyi snod brtags nas // gnyen po nye bar ston pa'i phyir ; / dbang du byas nas bshad pa ni //
translated: Having examined the vessel of the disciples,üîΩthe antidote is taught.

original: tshig bcu dag gis shes par bya //
analyzed: tshig bcu dag gis shes par bya //
translated: The explanation in terms of the disciples is to be understood by means of ten terms.

original: rnam par dbye ba ni gnyen po'i bye brag ste /üîΩde yang bsam pa ji lta ba dang / bag la nyal ji lta ba zhes bya ba yin no //
analyzed: rnam par dbye ba ni gnyen po'i bye brag ste / de yang bsam pa ji lta ba dang / bag la nyal ji lta ba zhes bya ba yin no //
translated: The analysis is the differentiation of the antidotes,üîΩwhich is twofold: according to the inclinations of the disciples and according to their latent proclivities.

original: gnyis kyis ni gnyen po bstan pa'i snod nyid 'os nyid kyi dbang du byas nas zhes bya ba yin no //
analyzed: gnyis kyis ni gnyen po bstan pa'i snod nyid 'os nyid kyi dbang du byas nas zhes bya ba yin no //
translated: The two terms, vessel and worthiness, refer to the disciples in terms of the antidotes.

original: dbang po dang mos pa dang mthun pa'i dbang du byas nas chos ston pa'i phyir spyir chos bshad pa'i snod nyid yin te de yang tshig gnyis kyis bstan to //
analyzed: dbang po dang mos pa dang mthun pa'i dbang du byas nas chos ston pa'i phyir spyir chos bshad pa'i snod nyid yin te de yang tshig gnyis kyis bstan to //

translated: The one who is fit to be a vessel for obtaining the meaning that is desired is described as ‚Äúendowed with the discernment of the element just as it is.‚Äù
